Property.OneLiner: This beautiful updated Condo in Soda Springs is in a quiet area but still very close to the slopes!
Property.RoomDescription1: Turn on the fire and snuggle up on this cozy couch for a movie in this warm living room. The forest views will remind you what a beautiful place you're in.
Property.RoomDescription2: This newly updated kitchen has plenty of counter space and all the amenities you will need for cooking. Granite counter tops and newer appliances will satisfy everyone!
Property.RoomDescription3: This dining area has enough space to sit and enjoy a delicious family meal. The brightness and cheer will make this room come alive at any meal!
Property.RoomDescription4: This bedroom will have you feeling like your'e in the Heaven with all of the natural wood furniture and elegant decor. Stretch out and relax in this giant king bed to get ready for the next days activities!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: At this Soda Springs unit, you get it all! You will have peace and quiet but still have easy access to the slopes. This newly updated unit is well decorated and has beautiful furniture. It is the perfect unit to come back to after a long day of Keystone activities!

Property.OneLiner: Walk to the lifts! This newly remodeled condo is slope side at Keystone and features a loft perfect for kids. With a top floor balcony, there is a great view of the surrounding peaks and ski runs.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Key Condo is situated right at the base of the Keystone ski slopes and right on the banks of the Snake River. Simply get dressed in your condo and walk 100 yards to the ski lifts at either Mountain House or a quick 5 minute jaunt to River Run. Nestled among mature tall pine trees, Key Condo central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. Key Condo offers covered parking and a clubhouse with a pool, sauna and jacuzzi tub.
Property.RoomDescription1: The kitchen is fully equipped with all of the necessities and then some. Enjoy home cooked meals while on vacation and save your money for recreation.
Property.RoomDescription2: The cozy gas log fireplace is the centerpiece of the living room. What can be better than sitting near the fire after a day in the snow. Updated furniture features a sofa sleeper which provides extra sleeping for two and tasteful art decor creates an inviting modern atmosphere. The new flat screen TV is also a great addition to this living room!
Property.RoomDescription3: Features a King size bed, and a view of the Snake River right outside. Cozy log cabin furnishings give this room very unique appeal. The master is equipped with a TV, just in case you are too tired to get to the living room after a day of play!
Property.RoomDescription4: If you are traveling with a large group, this room has you covered. With a full size bed on the bottom and a twin on the top, you can comfortably sleep 3 in this room alone.
Property.RoomDescription5: The loft is only accessible by a ladder and has a low clearance ceiling. It is only recommended for children 8 or older. With a queen bed and TV/VCR, your kids might not want to come down.
Property.RoomDescription6: Features broken views through the tall spruce trees of the Continental Divide to the East and ski slopes to the South.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Key Condo #2935A is a skiers and Mtn Bikers paradise. It's close to the slopes, and relaxing and cozy on the inside with all the mountain and skiing decor. Newly remodeled in 2005, it has everything you need for a perfect vacation. The owners are an active family that live in Golden Colorado and visit frequently during all seasons and enjoy snowboarding and biking.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Free Wireless Internet Access is available in the Clubhouse, which is open from 10 A.M. to 10 P.M.
Property.FeatureDescription2: It's hard to get much closer to the slopes than this. Walk a short distance and you're at the lift.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Key Condo is located at the banks of the Snake River that starts in the mountains, goes through Keystone, and drains into Lake Dillon. Fly fish right out the door!
Property.FeatureDescription4: An outside ski locker is provided along with the condo to store your skis and other gear that normally clutters the inside of the condo.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Only 100 feet away, Indoor heated pool, Sauna, Workout Room, Lougne with TV, Outdoor Hot tub / Jacuzzi, Laundry facilities, Vending / Ice machines.

Property.OneLiner: Located on the top floor (3rd floor) of Key Condo, this unit has amazing views of the Divide, Snake River and of the Mountain House slopes. Walk to Mountain House lifts. A beautifully finished knotty pine interior makes this condo one of the best we have to offer!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Key Condo is situated right at the base of the Keystone ski slopes and right on the banks of the Snake River. Simply get dressed in your condo and walk 100 yards to the ski lifts at either Mountain House or a quick 5 minute jaunt to River Run. Nestled among mature tall pine trees, Key Condo central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. Key Condo offers covered parking and a clubhouse with a pool, sauna and jacuzzi tub.
Property.RoomDescription1: This unit has FREE Wireless INTERNET inside the condo!! 42" Flat Screen TV. Beautifully furnished and VERY spacious. The first thing you'll notice is the knotty pine ceiling and modern updates to this property. You actually feel like you're in a mountain cabin in Keystone. The living room has a NEW Leather sectional sleeper sofa, and a gas log fireplace. Sliding glass doors with a balcony that face some of the Mountain House slopes, which are lit up at night for night skiing.
Property.RoomDescription2: Located in the same room as the living room, there is a separate dining area that seats 6 people. Additional seating space is just footsteps away at the breakfast bar that seats 3. Views directly out the patio door of the ski slopes will get you motivated in the morning.
Property.RoomDescription3: Full size kitchen, fully equipped with everything you need. Opens to the living room too, so the cook won't feel left out. The granite counter tops give this kitchen a gourmet look.
Property.RoomDescription4: Features a King size bed, Flat Screen Color TV with Cable, DVD player, alarm clock, extra blankets/pillows, dresser. Has a sliding glass door that leads to a balcony that overlooks the Snake River and the Continental Divide. The view is downright stunning. Don't forget to open that sliding door in the summertime to allow the sound of the Snake River to creep in and put you to sleep.
Property.RoomDescription5: This large bedroom has two twin beds, a desk, and a dresser. The view is also the Snake River and the Continental Divide. Has extra blankets, pillows and a 25" Color TV with Cable. This room is perfect for kids or if you need to quiet space to do some work. Go ahead and bring your computer....this is the place to be if you really have to work while you're on vacation.
Property.RoomDescription6: Features a Queen Size Bed. Flat Screen Color TV with Cable. Has a dresser and extra blankets and pillows. This room has views of the Key Condo common area and Snake River.
Property.RoomDescription7: Right off the living areas, the outside deck has views of the ski slopes at the Mountain House base area of Keystone Resort. Several chairs will provide a relaxing atmosphere for you to kick back and enjoy the sounds of the wind blowing through the tops of the trees.
Property.RoomDescription8: Off the master bedroom is a second deck that has stunning views of the Snake River, the Continential Divide and River Run Village.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Key Condo #2958C is one of those places you'll never want to leave. The views are incredible and the location is perfect an central to everything by foot. One of the best features of this place is the location overlooking the beautiful Snake River. A master bedroom balcony opens up to the Snake River Valley and wetlands. Crack the sliding glass door at night to allow the sound of the river flowing into the room. The balcony in the front off the dining/living room looks out onto some of the Mountain House ski runs and you can see the slopes lit up when there is night skiing.
Property.FeatureDescription1: This top floor unit has views from the living room and dining room of some of the Mountain House slopes, and these are lit up at nights for night skiing. There is a sliding glass door with a balcony. In the Master Bedroom, there is also a sliding glass door with views of the Snake River and the Continental Divide.
Property.FeatureDescription2: It's hard to get much closer to the slopes than this. Walk a short distance and you're at the Mountain House lifts. It's just a few more minutes to get to the River Run Gondola....simple walk up the heated driveway of the Lone Eagle complex and you're there in no time. Since the driveway is heated, the snow doesn't stick!
Property.FeatureDescription3: Key Condo is located at the banks of the Snake River that starts in the mountains, goes through Keystone, and drains into Lake Dillon.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Free Wireless Internet Access in the condo
Property.FeatureDescription5: An outside locked ski locker is provided along with the condo to store your skis and other gear that normally clutters the inside of the condo.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Only 50 feet away, indoor heated pool, Sauna, Workout Room, Lounge with TV, Outdoor Hot Tub / Jacuzzi, Laundry Facilities, Vending/Ice Machines.

Property.OneLiner: This one bedroom two bath condo is perfect for a family getaway. The location can't be beat! With all the benefits of River Run Village and the price of a hotel room in Keystone. Walk to the lifts. Swim in the indoor pool. Enjoy a dip in the hot-tub.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Key Condo is situated right at the base of the Keystone ski slopes and right on the banks of the Snake River. Simply get dressed in your condo and walk 100 yards to the ski lifts at either Mountain House or a quick 5 minute jaunt to River Run. Nestled among mature tall pine trees, Key Condo central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. Key Condo offers covered parking and a clubhouse with a pool, sauna and jacuzzi tub.
Property.RoomDescription1: You will truly enjoy unwinding in this condo after a day on the slopes. The wood burning stove will keep you toasty warm every night. With a 32" flat screen TV, this living room is made for relaxation. A sofa sleeper allows this unit to accommodate six.
Property.RoomDescription2: With a King size bed and a queen size futon, this room is furnished to accommodate four. Walk out the sliding glass door to the back deck and enjoy the view as well as the comforting sound of the Snake River.
Property.RoomDescription3: Loaded with everything you will need for preparing home cooked meals! The breakfast bar seats 4 persons.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
Walk to the lifts from Key Condo 2964D! This condo overlooks the Snake River, has great views the slopes and is surrounded by tall pine trees. With a pool and hot tub at the clubhouse, you will love every minute you spend here. The covered parking means you won't have to scrape your windshields at all.
NEW IN MAY 2009! The owner of this property completely refurnished and redecorated this property from top to bottom. Entirely new living room set, bedroom and more! Fully repainted and ready for guests, you will not be disappointed in the least bit.
Property.FeatureDescription1: This unit has views of some of the Mountain House slopes, and these are lit up at nights for night skiing.
Property.FeatureDescription2: It's hard to get much closer to the slopes than this. Walk a short distance and you're at the Mountain House lifts. It's just a few more minutes to get to the River Run Gondola....simple walk up the heated driveway of the Lone Eagle complex and you're there in no time. Since the driveway is heated, the snow doesn't stick!

Property.OneLiner: Enjoy this brand newly remodeled property. Completely new kitchen and all new furnishings make this the perfect getaway for a couple or small family.
Property.RoomDescription1: Completely remodeled and brand new, the full kitchen has everything you need to cook a full meal for your group. Featuring a small half-size refrigerator, you've got plenty of room for all your food to cook meals at home. The kitchen is efficiently laid out as a walk-up kitchen, which saves space allows for more than 1 person to cook at the same time.
Property.RoomDescription2: The living area is completely brand new with tile floor, new furniture, flat screen TV, and more. The fold out sofa sleeper allows for extra sleeping capacity if needed. The huge flat screen TV makes for a relaxing environment after a hard day on the ski slopes.
Property.RoomDescription3: The bedroom features a Queen sized bed on an authentic log frame. The modern rustic appeal of this room alone makes you feel like you're in a quaint cabin in the woods, yet you have the complete modern amenities. The gas fireplace makes for a cozy night in on a snowy evening.
Property.RoomDescription4: The deck is accessed through the bedroom. The deck faces to the West for some spectacular views and sunsets. Sit out on the deck and enjoy the amazing views among the tall pine trees.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Modern and newly remodeled, this 1 bedroom at Key Condo in Keystone is perfect for a couple or small family. With all brand new appliances, cupboards, and furnishings, you will be delighted at the rustic elegance of this condo!

Property.OneLiner: A spacious modern condo with breathtaking mountains views to the West. Nestled in tall pine trees and overlooking one of Keystones golf courses, this condo is Keystone at it\\\'s finest. FREE Wireless Internet and Long Distance in the US.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: "The Pines" is situated right at the East end of one of Keystones fine golf courses. With easy access to golf, skiing, the Snake River, horseback riding, and bike trails, The Pines is Keystone at it's finest! Free shuttles leave every 20 minutes and drop off right at the Mountain House base area of Keystone. Nestled among mature tall pine trees, The Pines has those million dollar mountain views that are typically Colorado. Being one of Keystone's best, the clubhouse features a large pool, sauna, jacuzzi tub, sun deck, locker rooms, laundry facilities and vending. Just down the hill and into a small valley is the Snake river and the bike trail. It's easy walk up to Keystone Lake for dining and other activities.is central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. The Pines offers some of the best views in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: This unit is stocked with kitchen tools and everything you need for creating a one of a kind meal for your family. The dining room table seats eight.
Property.RoomDescription2: The decor in here is "ski lodge" comfortable. With a queen sleeper sofa, love seat and an additional chair, there is plenty of seating space for the whole group. A large stone fireplace and entertainment center are the focal point of this unit! The view from the large windows might make you forget entirely about the TV. Who needs sitcoms when you have a golf course view?
Property.RoomDescription3: This large master bedroom has all of the comforts of home. With an attached bathroom, a king sized bed, a large chest of drawers and a TV/DVD player, you will find this the best spot for unwinding with a movie.
Property.RoomDescription4: This room is perfect for the kids, with two sets of bunk beds. The TV and VCR are ready to go, so if Mom and Dad are looking for some downtime, set the movie to play and adjourn to the living room!
Property.RoomDescription5: This bedroom opens to the living room below, so it is easy to participate in the conversation while you are getting ready in the morning. A Queen bed, dresser and 3/4 bath are just what you need to make this feel like your second home. With views of 12,000 ft peaks, you will love it here!
Property.RoomDescription6: Furnished with four chairs and a bistro style table, this balcony overlooks the golf course. Enjoy your lunch outdoors!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: The Pines #2163 is a mountain vacationers paradise. With over 1600 sqft, you will not feel crowded in this updated and beautifully decorated condo. The highlight is the amazing view out the front window...you'll be in awe of the snow capped peaks and tall pines everywhere.
Property.FeatureDescription1: A free shuttle stop is right in the middle of the parking lot and comes by every 20 minutes to take you anywhere in the keystone area.
Property.FeatureDescription2: It's hard to get a better view of the Gore Mtn Range than this. Unobstructed views and stunning sunsets are common right from the living room!
Property.FeatureDescription3: The Pines is located at the banks of the Snake River that starts in the mountains, goes through Keystone, and drains into Lake Dillon. Fly fish right out the door!
Property.FeatureDescription4: An outside ski locker is provided along with the condo to store your skis and other gear that normally clutters the inside of the condo.
Property.FeatureDescription5: One of the largest and well equipped in all of Keystone. Although the pool is indoors, the massive glass wall on one side yields stunning mountain views. Towels are suppiled at the pool as well, so you don't have to bring your room towels!

Property.PictureCaption2: Incredible Snow Capped Mountain Views
Property.PictureCaption3: Enjoy your secluded mountain retreat!

Property.OneLiner: Enjoy a stay in a top-notch property. Recently remodeled by an interior designer for both comfort and style. Your family will enjoy Colorado at it\'s finest.

Free shuttles leave every 20 minutes and drop off right at the Mountain House base area of Keystone. Nestled among mature tall pine trees, The Pines has those million dollar mountain views that are typically Colorado. Being one of Keystone's best, the clubhouse features a large pool, sauna, jacuzzi tub, sun deck, locker rooms, laundry facilities and vending. Just down the hill and into a small valley is the Snake river and the bike trail. It's easy walk up to Keystone Lake for dining and other activities.is central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. The Pines offers some of the best views in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: That is a real buffalo head on the wall! What a perfect touch to bring the west alive. With a queen size sofa sleeper, wood burning fireplace, flat screen T.V., and more windows than you can count, this is the perfect place to relax after a long day on the slopes.
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining room table seats 5 and the breakfast bar has room for two more, so you can enjoy a relaxing meal in the condo rather than stand in lines at the restaurants.
Property.RoomDescription3: Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, and a slate tile floor create the perfect place for you to make a masterpiece!
Property.RoomDescription4: The look and feel of camping in the woods, but so much better! A king size bed, TV, and a walk in closet provide all of the comforts of home. The row of windows look right into the pine trees and maybe one of the best views in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription5: This huge deck allows you to get some fresh air and take in the views of the tall pine trees. A small patio heater will keep you warm on those crisp winter evenings as you grill your burgers. A table that seats four and two additional chairs will allow you to enjoy dinner outside.
Property.RoomDescription6: Two single beds are configured to create a "sofa." A TV and DVD player make this the perfect hideaway for kids.
Property.RoomDescription7: The designer's touch carries throughout this room. The muted colors create an atmosphere of relaxation. The bowl of pine cones and antler lamp bring the outdoor in, constantly reminding you of all of the beauty Colorado has to offer. With the bank of windows above the bed, the sun glistens in through the trees. Shutters open to the living room below.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This unit is simply spectacular! Completely remodeled by an interior designer, every detail coordinates with the Colorado mountain theme. Spacious and comfortable, the Pines 2045 is perfect for a large family who truly appreciates mountain getaways. While it is a 2 bedroom 2 bath, it has a loft area that sleeps teenagers with ease and provides enough room for a decent sized group.

Property.OneLiner: This large unit is perfect for families who want to enjoy a vacation with all of the amenities but without the high price of ski-in/ski-out. With excellent views of the mountains and a swimming pool and hot tub this unit is an excellent choice!

Nestled among mature tall pine trees, The Pines has those million dollar mountain views that are typically Colorado. Being one of Keystone's best, the clubhouse features a large pool, sauna, jacuzzi tub, sun deck, locker rooms, laundry facilities and vending. Just down the hill and into a small valley is the Snake river and the bike trail. It's easy walk up to Keystone Lake for dining and other activities.is central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge. The Pines offers some of the best views in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: This well equipped kitchen is set up to help you prepare that special meal for your group. What is better than a large breakfast before hitting the slopes! More coffee mugs and wine glasses than you will ever need. Perfect for entertaining! Dining room table seats six and the breakfast bar seats three.
Property.RoomDescription2: The pine wood paneling and wood burning fireplace create a cabin-like ambiance in this living room. The sectional couch is large enough for the entire family to sit and enjoy a movie after a day on the slopes. Additional reclining chairs provide seating for seven! The comfy sofa is a fold out sleeper. The entertainment center includes a TV, DVD player and stereo system. With plenty of board games, your family will not be bored!
Property.RoomDescription3: This deck is enormous! With a grill and a table and chairs, you have everything you need to fix some burgers and bask in the sun while enjoying the amazing views of the Keystone area!
Property.RoomDescription4: This bunk room will be perfect for the kids! The huge dresser allows you to unpack and keep the room neat and tidy.
Property.RoomDescription5: This king sized bed is dressed in a super soft comforter! Just try to refrain from taking an afternoon nap. With a private TV, catch up on the next day's weather before going to bed. A walk in closet and large chest of drawers makes it easy to unpack and get settled in. A spacious attached full bathroom means you can get ready for the day without leaving your room. A real bonus if you are traveling with friends.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: You will be amazed by the amount of space in this two bedroom two bath Pines condo! With plenty of seating and sleeping space, your group will feel right at home! The large deck extends the living space into the great outdoors. Breathe in the fresh air and enjoy views of the tall pines.

Property.OneLiner: Enjoy your Keystone Resort Vacation at the Pines Keystone Condominiums. This large unit will accommodate your entire family with space and sleeping for up to 10.
Property.RoomDescription1: This large living room is a great place to bring everyone together. Want to ski the day away, come home and relax by the wood burning fireplace with friends and family, you wont be disappointed when you stay here. The couch pulls out into a queen sofa sleeper as well.
Property.RoomDescription2: With a king size bed, TV, VCR, DVD, and two seating areas, you will only have to leave this room for meals. A large walk in closet, and private bath are also nice features of this room.
Property.RoomDescription3: This room has two sets of twin bunks for a great way to sleep 4 comfortably.
Property.RoomDescription4: This guest bedroom has two twin beds, great for a couple or a couple of kids.
Property.RoomDescription5: Another great feature of this condominium is the large dining room table, there is seating for eight at the main table, seating for three more at the breakfast bar and four more at the second dining table.
Property.RoomDescription6: This keystone condominium has two decks out back, overlooking the river and bike trail, take advantage of this corner units great views. You will also find a BBQ grill and picnic table out here for great summer meals.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Pines #2038 is one of the largest condominiums we offer. With sleeping for ten you can bring the whole family together for your Keystone Resort Vacation. This Keystone condominium also has an amazing view of the snake river, perched up on the hill you can enjoy the large back patio and wonderful views.

Property.RoomDescription1: A beautiful, full sized kitchen that provides everything you need to cook meals at home and save a little money. Open counter to the dining area is convenient for hosting family meals.
Property.RoomDescription2: Large, open living room with lots of seating for the whole gang. Enjoy a warm fire, or watch a movie at the end of your day. A sofa sleeper allows for two additional sleepers.
Property.RoomDescription3: Beautiful master bedroom with large king size bed to get lost in, along with plenty of storage will make you feel at home.
Property.RoomDescription4: Nice guest bedroom with two twin beds make it easy to invite guests or a room for the kids. Plenty of space throughout the room.
Property.RoomDescription5: Take in the views of Keystone from your private balcony. A great space to enjoy reading a book, kicking back or just enjoying the sunrise! Property.OneLiner: Best lodging available in West Keystone Resort is right here at the Pines. Your group will fall in love with this 2 bedroom vacation condo!
Property.RoomDescription1: Solid surface granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and beautiful cherry wood cabinets are just a few features that make this kitchen exceptional! The center island with breakfast bar seating creates an inviting place for friends and family to gather. Plan to dine in one evening because you will want to cook in this kitchen!
Property.RoomDescription2: Gather around this lovely tile inlay table where there is seating for six to share a meal, tell favorite stories of the day or enjoy a board game!
Property.RoomDescription3: You'll appreciate the coziness this condo offers from the moment you walk through the door. Warm up by the crackling fireplace and unwind with the large flat screen TV. A Queen sleeper sofa is available for added sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription4: Look forward to a great night sleep in this Master bedroom, featuring a King bed, private TV and private deck access. The attached master bathroom features his-and-her sinks and a walk-in closet.

Property.OneLiner: Space and views are the name of the game with this extremely well furnished condo. With direct mountain views to the West and the Keystone River Golf Course in the foreground, you'll be sure to come back again.
Property.RoomDescription1: Open to the downstairs living room, and featuring 2 Queen beds and a skylight. There is a private 3/4 bath with separated room for the toilet and shower., as well as a single sleeper bed in this loft area. The bathroom has been recently upgraded with new cabinets, granite counter tops and a new vanity area with upgraded mirrors, sinks and more! You will also find the washer and dryer up here, along with a humidifier, iHome alarm clock, and fan!
Property.RoomDescription2: Featuring beautiful wood furniture and a King bed. There is an attached bath that has also been recently renovated with new cabinets, granite counter tops, sinks, faucets and mirrors. The TV in the master bedroom allows you a glimpse of the weather before you head out in the morning. Truly the best place for mom and dad!
Property.RoomDescription3: Spacious and fully equipped with everything you need for a full gourmet meal! This feature is an attractive draw for our long time visitors. You will find a dishwasher, oven, and refrigerator all of which are stainless steel and brand new! There are other supplies including: Microwave, Toaster, Coffee Maker, Ice Maker in the freezer, Crock pot, and all utensils and pots and pans.
Property.RoomDescription4: Featuring breathtaking views of the Gore Mountain Range to the West and the Keystone River golf course. Books, games, a wood burning fireplace along with TV and DVD player will keep everyone entertained! A queen fold out sofa sleeper is supplied for extra sleeping capacity.
Property.RoomDescription5: Features a beautiful table and chairs to seat 6, with additional seating at the large breakfast bar. Plenty of extra room in the living area for everyone to sit down. A breakfast bar provides an easy way for the cook to serve everyone a hot meal.
Property.RoomDescription6: This Pines condo includes a private washer and dryer in the loft area. This amenity makes packing for your Keystone vacation a lot simpler.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Nestled in a secluded pines forest, this property is the perfect accommodation for a quiet mountain getaway. Spacious and comfortable, this condo is perfect for a large group. During your stay, enjoy the Pines clubhouse with large pool and massive glass wall. You still feel like you're outdoors! And if you need a break from skiing or hiking, you are only minutes from Keystone Resort's bike paths and Keystone Lake.

Property.OneLiner: Comfortable 2 bedroom accommodations in Keystone Resorts Pines Condos. This is a well furnished and comfortable place with lots of room for your Keystone Vacation! Reservations available 24/7 call us today for assistance or book online!
Property.RoomDescription1: This pines condo has a huge living room complete with a massive wrap around couch, fantastically appointed fireplace and a big flat screen TV! Not to mention the personal computer ready for you and a telescope (you won't find this anywhere else)! You'll also have access to the deck and the amazing views of Keystone!
Property.RoomDescription2: This condo features a full kitchen and all the equipment that you need to cook a full meal for your family, not to mention new appliances! The kitchen features a breakfast bar for quick eats and a full dining room table to fit your whole family!
Property.RoomDescription3: The master bedroom is adorned with a gorgeous queen sized bed and seating area! The attached master bath makes this room the complete deal! The master bathroom features his-and-her sinks and a walk-in closet.
Property.RoomDescription4: A rarity in Keystone, this guest room features two twin beds! That's right, that means you're full grown teenagers don't have to share a bed! This room also features a television with great views of the Pines courtyard.
Property.RoomDescription5: The balcony features seating and spectacular views of Keystone and the West Keystone area!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit has everything your family needs! With plenty of seating and sleeping space, your family will never feel cramped here. The large deck extends the living space into the great outdoors where you can breathe the fresh air and appreciate the views of the tall pines and gorgeous mountain range.

Property.RoomDescription1: The Entryway offers space to hang up everyone's jackets. Relax on the windowsill bench and take off your boots after a long ski day.
Property.RoomDescription2: This fully equipped kitchen is centrally located. Its perfect for the chef that needs all the counter space but can still socialize with the group!
Property.RoomDescription3: Kick back and relax here. Enjoy views of Snake River and Keystone Gulch. Or watch the big flat screen TV next to the roaring fireplace. Couch pulls out to a Queen sofa sleeper.

Property.OneLiner: Nestled in the tall pines of West Keystone your family will love this spacious and beautifully updated condo. With access to the free shuttle, a pool and hot tub, and enough sleeping space for 7 you will love every minute of your Keystone vacation when you stay at Pines #2133!
Property.RoomDescription1: Enjoy the golf course view from the living room while you relax in front of the wood burning fireplace or watch a movie with the kids on the flat screen TV. The vaulted ceilings in this room make this space well lit and an inviting place to gather after a long day of fun in the outdoors.
Property.RoomDescription2: Solid surface granite counter tops, custom tile back splash and beautiful dark wood cabinets are a few things you will love about this updated kitchen. The center island with breakfast bar seating creates an inviting central place for friends and family to gather any time of the day! This kitchen is complete with all the utensils and dishes you will need to prepare a great home cooked meal.
Property.RoomDescription3: Gather around this unique tile inlay table where there is seating for six to share a meal, share your favorite story of the day or play a few board games during your stay.
Property.RoomDescription4: With an upstairs bathroom of its own, this lofted bedroom provides comfortable sleeping with a Queen bed, Twin bed and Twin sofa sleeper. With skylights and a private TV, this bedroom is a great place to start and end your day in the CO mountains!
Property.RoomDescription5: Located on the main floor, this Master bedroom has a King bed and a comfortable sofa chair for relaxing in the privacy of your room. You'll also find a private TV and dresser for all your things!
Property.RoomDescription6: With a separate room for the dual sink vanity and shower, this Master bathroom is ideal for 2 people to quickly get ready each morning.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
This beautiful 1,200 sq. foot Pines vacation condo is a smart choice for your Keystone lodging accommodations!
With multiple upgrades inside and a fabulous location on the Pines landscaped property, you will be proud to call this place home during your next Keystone vacation. Amenities include an indoor pool, premium cable channels, wireless internet and floor to ceiling windows. Take a stroll on the lawn or to Keystone Lake. Or just kick back in the comfortable living room in front of the fire and flat screen TV.
There is something to delight everyone here at Pines #2133!

Property.OneLiner: GOLD RATED CONDO! This spacious and newly renovated town home features brand new everything. Nestled in beautiful blue spruce trees and overlooking the ski slopes of Keystone Colorado, this town home will leave an impression. FREE Wireless Internet. Close to Keystone Colorado Conference Center!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: The Tennis Townhomes are situated right at the base of Tenderfoot Mountain, facing the ski slopes of Keystone across the narrow valley. Nestled among mature blue spruce trees, Tennis Townhomes is the quiet mountain sanctuary your're looking for! Just outside is a shuttle stop, so you can easily get dressed inside the condo, and hop on the shuttle and be skiing within minutes. Just 1/2 mile down the road is a small grocery store and shopping center. Right next to the property is the Keystone Conference Center in case you're in town on business. Tennis Townhomes are central to everything in Keystone including restaurants, shops and entertainment. Nearby bike trails lead down the hill to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge.
Property.RoomDescription1: Remodeled in 2009 with new cabinets, counters, and appliances, including a glass top range and convection oven, you might enjoy preparing that meal you never have time for at home!
Property.RoomDescription2: The whole family can gather round the full size dining table that seats eight. Enjoy a special meal or a heated round of Pictionary!
Property.RoomDescription3: Bonus! This large deck features seating and a gas grill. Even in the dead of winter you can have the perfect BBQ'd steaks! Did we mention mountain views as well?
Property.RoomDescription4: Relax by the gas log fireplace in the sunken living room, which is central to the downstairs. With a 42" HDTV, the owners have covered everything! The queen sofa sleeper adds to the sleeping capacity in this unit.
Property.RoomDescription5: A King sized bed and large walk in closet allow you to move in! TV and DVD player in the armoire. Wether you are here for the weekend or a well deserved extended stay, this master has everything you need.
Property.RoomDescription6: Two full sized beds allow for four people to sleep comfortably in this unit. The large walk in closet is the perfect place to store your gear. TV and VCR on the dresser
Property.RoomDescription7: A king sized bed and TV/VCR allow for a very comfortable retreat! Let the crowd stay up all night, you will enjoy your own space away from it all in this room!
Property.RoomDescription8: Open to the sunken living room area, this office doubles as a 4th bedroom. With a queen size fold-out futon, and desk, this room will accommodate you for work or fun.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Tennis Townhomes #1323 is perfect for the large group. With sleeping capacity for 12 and 3 bathrooms, there is plenty of room for everyone. This Keystone Townhome was freshly remodeled in the fall of 2009 and features new tile, appliances, and carpet. Best of all...relax in front of the brand new gas log fireplace on the brand new comfortable leather sofas. Everything from the decor to the bedding to all the furniture in this property is brand new. This townhome is perfectly suited for families with children. Included with the condo are a pack-n-play, high chair and booster seat. There are games, crayons, a train set, books, puzzles and more all in the townhome. Cable with HBO, wireless high-speed Internet, local and long distance phone are all available for no charge. Movies and games for both young and old are provided. The owners are an active family that live in Colorado and visit frequently during all seasons and enjoy the outdoors any time of year.
Property.FeatureDescription1: A free shuttle stop is right at the edge of the property and comes by every 20 minutes to take you anywhere in the Keystone area. Transferring busses at Keystone Mountain House, you can take another free shuttle anywhere in Summit County including other resorts such as Breckenridge, Arapahoe Basin, and Dillon. Shuttles run throughout the year and are always free.
Property.FeatureDescription2:
What could be better than swimming in a heated pool outside in the mountains? The large outdoor pool is open during the spring, summer and fall seasons and allows the unique experience of swimming in a warm heated pool during cold weather. Locker rooms are nearby so you won't get cold heading back to your condo.

+++ WINTER SEASON RENTERS +++

The outdoor pool closes for the winter season from October to June. The sauna and hot tub are still open and available for guest use.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Tennis Townhomes are up the side of hill, so you can only imagine the views from the large deck. You can see the slopes of Keystone right from the front door.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Internet access is provided within the condo via Ethernet Cable

Property.RoomDescription1: This sunken living room is furnished in the attractive mission style. The corner fireplace adds to the cozy feel of this condo. The entertainment center is equipped with a TV, DVD player, VCR and stereo system.
Property.RoomDescription2: A queen sleeper sofa provides extra sleeping space. The mural behind the sofa adds character to this unique property.
Property.RoomDescription3: A dedicated dining room is furnished with a large table that seats eight in addition to the two bar stools at the breakfast bar.
Property.RoomDescription4: The large kitchen has updated appliances. There is plenty of workspace for the whole family to help prepare that special meal.
Property.RoomDescription5: This corner room has two windows providing an award winning view. With a queen size bed and dresser this room is ready to be moved into! A TV and VCR round out the furnishings, allowing you to have some downtime.
Property.RoomDescription6: Four twin beds make this the perfect room for kids! All with knotty pine bed frames, the kids will love pretending they are in a "cabin" while the adults socialize amongst themselves.
Property.RoomDescription7: You might forget you are in a modern condo versus a cabin in the woods when you sleep in this room. With a knotty pine bed frame and the cutest black bear quilt, this is true "mountain style" decor.

Unobstructed views to west are an added bonus. The huge deck and yard allow you to appreciate the 180 degree Colorado mountain view.

Property.RoomDescription1: This large Master has a comfortable and welcoming King bed. Enjoy the private bath and TV. A unique feature of the room is the loft sleeping area that the kids will want to claim. It contains two twin mattresses, accessible by a steep ladder. So please make sure the kids are able to climb up and down safely.
Property.RoomDescription2: This Guest room features two twin beds, private TV with DVD player and plenty of space. AND has a private bath!
Property.RoomDescription3: Looking for a great place to bring together the family? You will enjoy the comforts of this living room, with a flat screen TV, PlayStation, fireplace, and views over to the slopes you will enjoy the space and comforts of this living room. The couch also pulls out to a queen sized sleeper sofa and there is a single sleeper sofa as well!
Property.RoomDescription4: This fully equipped kitchen will have everything you need to create your favorite baking and cooking recipes. The modern appliances help make cooking a breeze!
Property.RoomDescription5: The dining table is set to hold six with space for four more at the breakfast bar. With mountain views out the window, you can dine in style!
Property.RoomDescription6: Another great and convenient feature of this Tennis Townhouse is the private washer and dryer.
Property.RoomDescription7: If you plan on coming to an event at the Keystone Conference Center, you will want to stay at Tennis Town homes. You are a 5 min. walk away!

There is a 47" flat screen TV, a Blu Ray player, a Sonos internet radio player which lets you listen to music and news from around the world, and a gas fireplace to relax around a roaring fire with family and friends.

Property.OneLiner: SKI-IN / SKI-OUT!!! You seriously can\'t get any closer to the Keystone ski lifts than this! Lone Eagle is luxury all the way down to the last detail. Inside the condo features a large flagstone fireplace to relax in front of, while watching all the skiers slide or the Mtn Bikers come down River Run. It doesnt get any better than this at Keystone Ski Resort Lone Eagle!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview:
Built right on the River Run ski slope, Lone Eagle is the Crme de la Crme of all places to stay in Keystone. No walking required since you are literally 50 yards uphill from the ski lift. Situated directly on the slopes and only a 1 minute walk to River Run Villiage, you'll never forget a vacation at Keystone's Lone Eagle!

Built only a few years ago, everything is brand new at Lone Eagle. Heated driveway and sidewalks is only the start to many high-end upgrades throughout the complex and the condo itself.
Property.RoomDescription1: Prepare a delicious meal on the gas range. With a view of the night skiers on the slopes, your meal will be more entertaining than if you had eaten out!
Property.RoomDescription2: This living room is the height of comfort. With a gas log fireplace, TV, VCR, DVD player and CD player, this room is set up to entertain. The leather couch is also a sleeper sofa, providing additional sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription3: Beautiful rustic furniture decorate this room. The king sized bed is as comfortable as can be after a long day on the slopes. The attached master bath has a jetted tub and stand alone shower. The dual sinks allow 2 people to get ready quickly each morning.
Property.RoomDescription4: This bedroom is almost as nice as the Master in Lone Eagle 3000! What could be more inspiring than a view of the slopes right from your bedroom window? Furnished with a queen sized bed and extra closet space, you can move right in.
Property.RoomDescription5: Grab your warmest sweater and pull up a seat, because you are front row to all of the Keystone Ski Resort action when staying in Lone Eagle! Watch the kids at ski school from this ground level patio.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: When entering Lone Eagle #3000, you can feel the luxury and quality. Centered in the living room, is a stunning flagstone fireplace. Just to the left, is a wall of windows with a full view of the River Run ski slope. Go ahead; take a seat and relax...THIS is Keystone Colorado at it's very best! Don't forget - Lone Eagle is ski - in/ski - out.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Lone Eagle Condos in Keystone are the ONLY true ski-in / ski-out lodging in Keystone. This condo offers a 1st floor balcony, so you'll feel like you're right on the snow!
Property.FeatureDescription2: A full fitness center is provided free of charge to get warmed up in the morning for a full day of skiing or biking. Treadmills, weight machines, and everything you need is right here. A steamy sauna is also part of the fitness center to relax those muscles after a workout. Towels are provided.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Among the best features for you is luxury outdoor pool and hot tub. Situated right at the base of the slopes, you can watch all the other skiers or Mtn Bikers coming down River Run while sitting in the hot tub. The patio itself is heated, so you dont need to worry about walking through any snow or cold tile to or from your condo.
Property.FeatureDescription4: The only parking available at Lone Eagle is under the building. Since this condo is ski-in ski-out, you dont need to worry about driving anywhere or scraping ice from your car windows. However, if you do want to drive somewhere, youll be able to get into a warm car.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Internet access is provided within the condo via Ethernet Cable.

Property.OneLiner: If you are looking for the best of the best, you have found it! Lone Eagle building at Keystone Ski Resort is Ski in/Ski out and is located in the River Run Village. Make this vacation the most memorable by choosing prime lodging for your family.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Built right on the River Run ski slope, Lone Eagle is the Crme de la Crme of all places to stay in Keystone Resort. No walking required since you strap on your skis and slide on down to the ski lift. Situated directly on the slopes and only a 1 minute walk to River Run Village, you'll never forget a family vacation at Keystone's Lone Eagle! Built only a few years ago, everything is brand new at Lone Eagle. Heated driveway and sidewalks are only the start to many high-end upgrades throughout the complex.
Property.RoomDescription1: Upgraded in every way! With cherry cabinets, granite counter tops and a gas stove, you may want to remodel your kitchen at home after staying in this Lone Eagle Condo in Keystone Colorado. Stainless appliances include a microwave and a convection oven. This kitchen even includes a trash compactor. Some guests have hired a chef while staying here, but they missed the fun of creating their own wonderful masterpieces!
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining room table seats six and the breakfast bar seats two. With a flat screen right in the dining room, you won't miss a minute of the game or have a hard time viewing the main LCD TV in the living room at this Lone Eagle Condominium.
Property.RoomDescription3: This room is entertainment central! The flat screen above the stone fireplace is connected to an unbelievable surround sound system that will make you feel as if you are in the theater and it makes it hard to want to leave Lone Eagle. The sofa sleeper creates overflow sleeping space and the love seat folds out into a single bed.
Property.RoomDescription4: The king sized bed is dressed to the nines! You will find it hard to resist crawling into bed with a good book. Don't forget about the jetted tub in the attached bath before calling it a night. The attached bath has dual sinks with plenty of space for both people to get ready for an evening of dining and entertainment in River Run Village.
Property.RoomDescription5: With two queen beds, this Lone Eagle room will comfortably sleep 4. What better place to send the kids after a long day in the snow? This room overlooks the Snake River, so open up the window in the summer time and listen to the calming trickle of water.
Property.RoomDescription6: The patio of Lone Eagle 3001 overlooks the tall pines and driveway in front of the Lone Eagle building. This is truly the perfect place to enjoy a mug of hot chocolate as you "people watch." Take a break at lunch time to enjoy the beauty of ski in ski out! You will enjoy your own gourmet meal in less time than it would take you to order an inferior burger an fries at the lodge! Book your Lone Eagle Condominium online today!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Keystone's premier luxury accommodations will wow you from the minute you step inside the building until the minute you depart! Lone Eagle 3001 is simply fabulous. The custom paint sets this unit apart and the owners have put some TLC into every room in order to create the vacation of your dreams.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Lone Eagle Condos in Keystone are one of the ONLY two true ski-in / ski-out buildings in Keystone. You simply cannot get any closer to the ski lifts than this. Strap on your skis right outside the patio where to pool is, and glide on down to the ski lifts just a few feet away.
Property.FeatureDescription2: A full fitness center is provided free of charge to get warmed up in the morning for a full day of skiing or biking. Treadmills, weight machines, and everything you need is right here. A steamy sauna is also part of the fitness center to relax those muscles after a workout. Towels are provided for all guests.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Among the best features for you is luxury outdoor pool and hot tub. Situated right at the base of the slopes, you can watch all the other skiers or Mountain Bikers coming down River Run while sitting in the hot tub. The patio itself is heated, so you dont need to worry about walking through any snow or cold tile to or from your condo.
Property.FeatureDescription4: The only parking available at Lone Eagle is under the building. Since this condo is ski-in ski-out, you dont need to worry about driving anywhere or scraping ice from your car windows. However, if you do want to drive somewhere, youll be able to get into a warm car.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Just walk over the bridge and you'll be in River Run within just a few minutes. River Run has lots of shops and restaurants to appease any person or appetite. Lone Eagle is located slightly away from the crowds and noise of River Run Village, but you'll be in the middle of the action during the daytime and night time ski sessions.

Property.OneLiner: Gateway is located right off of US Hwy 6, is easy to find and is within walking distance to River Run Village in Keystone. Why would you settle for Keystone Hotels when you can enjoy the slope view of Keystone and the ease of just walking down the hall to catch a bite to eat at the Haywood Cafe here at Gateway?
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Built in 1998, Gateway Lodge is one of the newest and most convenient places to stay in all of Keystone Colorado. Directly off of US Hwy 6, and just 3 MINUTES walking distance to ski lifts and all the shops and excitement of River Run, the building is easy to find and features many on-site retail shops and services.
Property.RoomDescription1: Features a king size bed, and a queen sleeper sofa. A spacious, efficiently laid-out unit with extra closet space and room to accommodate four people. Comes with cable TV and a VCR and high speed internet. In-room safe is supplied and free of charge. Family friendly and equipped with a pack-n-play crib. Larger than most Keystone Hotels. Full mountain view right out the window.
Property.RoomDescription2: Features a sink, 1/4 size refrigerator, microwave oven, coffee pot, George Foreman grill, hot pot burner and everything you need for a quick meal. This is going to be larger than most of your Keystone Hotels.
Property.RoomDescription3: Features a full bathtub and shower. Your bathroom will be similar to many Keystone Hotels. A hairdryer is in the unit for your convenience.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Don't be fooled. Although this is a studio condo, the space is very efficiently used and larger than most Keystone Hotels. There is plenty of space for gear, and 4 people.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Park in the underground heated garage. No more scraping the ice off your car in the morning!
Property.FeatureDescription2: There's a storage room with lockers right in the garage so you don't have to clutter your condo with ski gear or bikes!
Property.FeatureDescription3: Only a short 1/4 mile walk away is the River Run base area, featuring easy access to the slopes via gondola and many restaurants and shops. Don't want to walk? Catch the free shuttle that operates throughout Summit County.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Probably the best feature of any condo complex in all of Keystone, the ground floor of Gateway has a day spa, restaurant, video game arcade, and liquor store....ALL RIGHT IN THE SAME BUILDING!!
Property.FeatureDescription5: Large indoor heated pool and hot tub right down the hall.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Just down the hallway in case skiing for 12 full hours isn't enough for you. Gateway has a full fitness center, with complimentary access during your stay.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Located just down the hall from this condo. Features outstanding food, big screen TV's everywhere, a bar, and free internet access. Also right next to the Haywood Cafe is a video game arcade room with just about any game imagineable.
Property.FeatureDescription8: Free in-room wireless Internet access.

Enjoy a movie on television with local and premium channels or surf the internet using the high-speed wireless connection. There is a fully-stocked kitchenette so you can cook if you choose to, but there are excellent restaurants within walking distance.

Property.RoomDescription1: Imagine waking up, opening the blinds, looking out over the mountain ranges and knowing that you have yourself another wonderful day in Keystone Colorado! With the comfortable king bed in here, and large Master with Jacuzzi tub separate shower and dual vanities you have a lot of space to get ready.
Property.RoomDescription2: This bedroom has a queen sized bed but king sized views, wake up and look outside at the mountains and realized this is perfect. This bedroom has an attached bedroom as well. Perfect place for a good nights sleep in Keystone Colorado!
Property.RoomDescription3: This bedroom has a double bed and a single bed in here, great for the kids or a couple of folks who want there own bed or a couple. There is an attached bathroom in here as well.
Property.RoomDescription4: The guest bedroom has a queen bed and has a full bathroom off the hallway, great views from in here as well! Great place to wake up for a day in Keystone resort.
Property.RoomDescription5: At the top of the stairs in this Gateway lodge penthouse condo you have a single bed tucked away, access to everyone is a snap and your not out in the living room.
Property.RoomDescription6: Private stacked washer and dryer are available on the main floor. Makes packing much easier for your longer stays.
Property.RoomDescription7: This Gateway penthouse has a large living area with a big screen TV, gas fireplace, comfortable seating, views of the peaks, ski runs, and more! Vaulted ceilings really open up this unit and you will love being with your friends and family in here.
Property.RoomDescription8: Tucked next to some westerly facing windows you can bring the group together for a home cooked meal or a friendly card game! If you want to check the weather just look outside or head off to the balcony to check the conditions, views for miles from up here!
Property.RoomDescription9: There is a fully equipped kitchen with all of the basics provided. Preparing everything from a quick bite to a full on hearty meal should be a breeze in here!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: With four large bedrooms and four full bathrooms within walking distance to the River Run Village gondola and many shops and restaurants, you can not beat this place. This is a Penthouse, corner unit at Gateway Lodge so you have views on three sides and no one above you. With two decks one off the living area and one off of he kitchen you will really enjoy the views wow!

Property.OneLiner: A Gateway to relaxation: This spacious four bedroom condo invites peace and tranquility with its cathedral ceilings and warm furnishings.
Property.RoomDescription1: This master bedroom and bathroom is sure to warm your body after a long day of mountain mayhem. Whether you are soaking in the over sized garden tub, or surrounding yourself with plush, king sized, bedding, there is no excuse for being uncomfortable.
Property.RoomDescription2: Upon entry, the first eye catching feature is the spacious living rooms stone fireplace. Snuggle up near the hearth in your queen sleeper sofa that redefines pullout sofa, or the soft love seat for two. This cozy gathering place is a wonderful setting for sleeping in, planning the day's activities, or dining at your handcrafted table for eight.
Property.RoomDescription3: A queen bed and natural wood furnishings, along with private access to your second bathroom make for a pleasant and secluded second bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription4: You just thought you were dining out! This culinary haven's marble counter tops and completely furnished kitchen will bring out the chef in anyone. Featuring a handy bar to pass across food and an open floor plan, the cook is not away from the action.
Property.RoomDescription5: Another great queen sized bedroom that can sleep two offers yet another private entryway to another full sized bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription6: Features another pullout sofa, leather recliner, two twin trundle beds that can turn into queens. How easy is this to give the kids or even another family their own living space.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: With on site dining, day spa pampering, and free Keystone shuttle, Gateway 5092 exudes convenience in the heart of Keystone Colorado. Its beautiful inviting furnishings and vaulted ceilings make it the perfect mountain getaway for as many as 14 people or as few as you wish.

Property.OneLiner: This is a very well decorated and nicely furnished studio in The Gateway Lodge. With convenient access to Keystone Resort, Arapahoe Basin, and the Keystone conference center this is perfect for your next trip to Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: Large studio condo with a comfortable queen sized bed and a second queen futon so you have two separate sleeping areas for up to 4 people.
Property.RoomDescription2: Convenient kitchenette with microwave, coffee maker, and refrigerator. There is a small dining area to grab a quick bite before hitting the mountains too!
Property.RoomDescription3: Features a full bathtub and shower and hairdryer for your convenience. Your bathroom will be similar to many Keystone Hotels.

Property.OneLiner: Gateway Lodge condominium number 5094 is a very well done 3 bedroom condo in Keystone Colorado. You will love that Gateway Lodge is so close to River Run Village, shops and restaurants but you get an amazing amount of space compared to smaller condominiums.
Property.RoomDescription1: Large living room with stone gas fireplace, vaulted ceilings, TV and DVD player provide entertainment in the evenings. A queen sofa sleeper allows you to invite another couple along on vacation or add more family members.
Property.RoomDescription2: Modern, updated, full size kitchen that is equipped with everything you need. Plenty of counter space to make cooking easy.
Property.RoomDescription3: The Master Bedroom has the largest bed of the condo... a spacious king size bed. With plenty of room and multiple TV's throughout the unit, you'll be able to kick back and relax at the end of the day.
Property.RoomDescription4: The two guest bedrooms both have nicely sized queen size beds, one located downstairs and one upstairs. Plenty of space to spread out in both of these rooms.
Property.RoomDescription5: The loft bunk bedroom will sleep up to five people, with 3 single beds and a queen futon. A great room to put the kids in. Features a private washer and dryer.
Property.RoomDescription6: Enjoy the mountain and ski slope views from your private balcony. A great place to read and relax or just take in the scenery.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This lovely, spacious three bedroom, three bath Gateway condo comfortably sleeps a large group and is within walking distance to the slopes. Great location provides convenient access to all the action in River Run Village. Gateway Lodge is the perfect location for your Keystone vacation!

Property.OneLiner: Gateway Mountain Lodge 5090 is a very nice large condo that is perfect for your Keystone Vacation. If you are looking for a nice clean, comfortable, modern place for your trip to Colorado then Gateway Lodge is perfect for you!
Property.RoomDescription1: Perfect for putting together a quick bite to eat, you have a microwave, coffee maker, small refrigerator and counter space.
Property.RoomDescription2: This Gateway condo in Keystone has a full bath tub with shower and place to get ready.
Property.RoomDescription3: This is a real nice feature, come back from a day on the slopes and warm your feet up by the fire. Enjoy sitting by the fire and reading a good book, the perfect way to boost your Keystone Vacation.
Property.RoomDescription4: This property has a new flat screen TV above the gas fireplace and a built in desk for any work that you might be doing. This is one of the nicer studios in Gateway Lodge.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Gateway Lodge Condos at Keystone Resort. Enjoy your Keystone Vacation from the comfort of this Keystone Condominium. Property.OneLiner: Rent this ground level awesome studio in the Gateway building. plenty of storage space and and conveniently located in the Gateway building in keystone resort. This is the perfect unit for small families looking for a good time
Property.RoomDescription1: The entryway features a large closet which is perfect for storing any and all wet, snowy or muddy things.
Property.RoomDescription2: Adjacent to the entryway is the spacious bathroom with a toilet, and a shower/tub.
Property.RoomDescription3: Next to the entryway is the galley kitchen, and although it isnt very big, there is still a lot which can be done with a microwave.
Property.RoomDescription4: In the living room and bedroom there is a Murphy bed and a pull out sofa sleeper. The great part about the sleeping arrangement is that since both beds fold away, there is a lot of room for everything else during the day. The flat screen TV is in an ideal spot for sitting, watching the TV and looking out the window towards keystone mountain.

Property.OneLiner: Vacation Rentals in Keystone make your ski holiday that much better. This condo offers some real amenities for your vacation, including an indoor pool, on site check in, restaurant and lounge and heated parking. Perfect for an affordable place to stay in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: Features a queen size bed and a queen sofa sleeper. Nice open homey feel mountain decor. Great booth style dining table for meals and hanging out playing games or just catching up on the days events. Ipod dock and free wireless internet. Cable tv included. TV and DVD in armoire
Property.RoomDescription2: Features a sink, microwave, dishwasher and a 3/4 size refrigerator, coffee pot, toaster oven and toaster. You will be able to come home and fix some meals to hang around the nice booth style dining table.
Property.RoomDescription3: Features a full bathtub and shower. Your bathroom will be similar to many Keystone hotels. A hairdryer is included for convenience.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Very cozy first floor studio. Beautifully decorated with a mountain view. A perfect place to relax and even includes a 3/4 size refrigerator in with the efficiency kitchen. A great studio choice.

Property.OneLiner: Gateway Mountain Lodge #5036 is a premier 4 bedroom luxury mountain condo located in Gateway Lodge. This vacation rental can comfortably sleep 12 adults in beds and allow you to spread out and enjoy ski slope views of River Run Village and Mountain House Base area.
Property.RoomDescription1: The master is a spacious open bedroom with a king sized bed and wonderful furnishings including a brand new Sleep number dual control mattress! Relax with a large television and great views to the slopes. Step outside for a breath of fresh air with your own separate entrance to the balcony. Soak in the large jacuzzi bath in the newly redecorated master bath.
Property.RoomDescription2: In the entry, you'll find tile floors and plenty of hooks for winter coats to keep the clutter of winter gear at bay.
Property.RoomDescription3: High vaulted ceilings complement this spacious living room! Relax in luxury and comfort, in front of the gas fireplace, or lounge on the brand new leather sofas (with motorized recliners). The living room features new furnishings including brand new lamps, coffee tables and entertainment center. Technology upgrades include a large 46" flat screen, WIFI enabled BluRay disc player, and Dolby Digital surround sound.
Property.RoomDescription4: Attached to the large living room, the dining area also features the vaulted ceilings and also has a door to the porch attached, with large windows to take in the view during meals
Property.RoomDescription5: Guests will enjoy the use of a fully operational granite-tiled kitchen, loaded with all the conveniences and comforts of home, with a large fridge, dishwasher and microwave oven. With the recent addition of brand new cutlery, a brand new convection toaster oven, and a new electric kettle, guests will feel more comfortable than ever! Be sure to take advantage of the brand new electric grill located on the patio for cookouts!
Property.RoomDescription6: Located on the first floor, this beautiful second master bedroom features a redecorated bathroom with a shower and attached vanity. Relax at the end of a long day of skiing on the brand new dual-control Sleep Number Bed.
Property.RoomDescription7: The upper guest bedroom comfortably sleeps 4 and is perfect for that 2nd or 3rd family traveling with you!! Featuring a queen sized Sealy Posturepedic bed and single over single bunk beds, there is plenty of space for everyone.
Property.RoomDescription8: As if it couldnt get any better Another Queen and bunk room makes it perfect for all the kids and even some older kids staying here! Yet again a Sealy Posturepedic helps everyone get to sleep better.
Property.RoomDescription9: Relax in the spacious and beautifully decorated lobby, the indoor pool and hot tub. If you still have energy, take advantage of the fitness room! If you should have work that needs to be done, take advantage of free WIFI available in Gateway Lodge. Shops and restaurants conveniently located on the first floor include Serenity Spa, Breeze Ski Rental, Haywood Cafe, a Grocery/Liquor store and of course our SummitCove office.
Property.RoomDescription10: Convenient underground parking will ensure that you don't have to scrape snow and ice on chilly days!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Gateway Lodge 5036 is a premier 4 bedroom condo that provides guests the best that Keystone has to offer. Featuring spectacular views of Keystone, you can enjoy the most stunning and breathtaking view of Keystone Mountain and ski runs right from the comfort and warmth of your own living room! This is the most recently renovated unit at the Gateway Lodge with plenty of space to sleep 12 in beds. It has been redecorated under the supervision of a team of professional interior designers with fresh custom paint along with custom bedding and draperies.

Property.RoomDescription1: The entryway has a hook for ski locker keys and a small area to take your boots off after a day on the hill
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen is directly adjacent to the entryway and features granite countertops and updated appliances for all your cooking needs
Property.RoomDescription3: In the living room, you will find a gas fireplace, hearth, as well as a large flat screen TV. There is a queen sleeper sofa for additional sleeping capacity.
Property.RoomDescription4: In the guest bedroom, is a queen bed, with a lofted bed above, intended for kids only as it supports around 300lbs.
Property.RoomDescription5: In the master bedroom you will find 2 queen beds. One with a bunk above for enhanced sleeping capacity.
Property.RoomDescription6: The porch of the unit has a phenomenal view of Keystone Mountain.
Property.RoomDescription7: Both bathrooms feature jetted Jacuzzi tubs - ultimate relaxation after a day full of skiing powder!
Property.RoomDescription8: Large dining table seats the whole group! Extra company would be welcome at the breakfast bar!

Property.OneLiner: Ski Run 501 is a two bedroom condo located only 200 yards from the slopes, plenty of sun streams in as a wall of windows faces South.
Property.RoomDescription1: The welcoming entryway gives space for removing shoes and coats after a day out and about.
Property.RoomDescription2: This fully equipped kitchen features all Stainless Steel Appliances and solid granite counter tops.
Property.RoomDescription3: To the left of the entryway is the Master bedroom, complete with a comfortable King bed and a wall mounted flat screen. This is the perfect location to rest after a long day on the slopes.
Property.RoomDescription4: Kids will love this bunk room with Twin over Queen beds. The kids may feel spoiled, having their very own flat screen TV to watch in bed!
Property.RoomDescription5: This attractively decorated living area features a cozy fireplace, large TV and Queen Sofa Sleeper for extra sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription6: Great dining space with a built in eating nook. Gather the group for a family style meal!

Property.OneLiner: Located in the Mountain House area of Keystone, this 3 bedroom at Ski Run offers one of the best ski slopes views in Keystone. Enjoy easy access to skiing, easy access to restaurants, all topped off with an amazing top floor deck and view!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Ski Run condos are situated on the North side of the Snake River and have some of the easiest access to the ski lifts in all of Keystone. Simply walk across the foot bridge and hop on the lift. Featuring close proximity to slopes, Ski Run condos are perfect for the small family or professional couple.
Property.RoomDescription1: This fully stocked kitchen makes it a snap to prepare breakfast, lunch and diner. The breakfast bar seats three and the dining room table seats six. Your party can enjoy a delicious dinner in less time than it would take to be seated at any restaurant in town. What a bonus: more time for night skiing!
Property.RoomDescription2: Maybe the most unique room in Keystone! The vaulted ceilings create that feeling of spaciousness. The owners have given this place a true Colorado feel by using snowshoes, sleds, skis and an animal skin in their decor. A wood fireplace adds to the cozy ambiance. The queen sleeper sofa provides sleeping space for two. A 42" flat screen TV with a DVD player is the perfect way to enjoy some downtime.
Property.RoomDescription3: Retreat to the comfort of this master bedroom after a long day on the slopes. This master bedroom is equipped with a king sized bed, a TV and VCR and has an attached bath.
Property.RoomDescription4: With two twin beds, this bedroom is ideal for kids! They can even peak out the window and choose the first ski run they plan on making. A TV is also included in this room.
Property.RoomDescription5: The spiral staircase leads to a loft bedroom. This room is furnished with a queen sized bed and a chest of drawers. The large closet allows you to stow your luggage away and settle in. Convenient attached bathroom and private TV also included with this room.
Property.RoomDescription6: The large balcony is equipped with a gas grill and a patio table that seats four. The sweeping view of the ski runs at Keystone is incredible! On a clear day, you will also enjoy a glimpse of the Ten Mile Range and the continental divide.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Ski Run #302 is spacious and inviting! With a large top floor deck, you will enjoy a world class view of the ski runs at River Run as well as the Ten Mile Range and Continental Divide. This unit is truly a home away from home! With an indoor pool and hot tub, Ski Run has it all.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Walk across the foot bridge right to the lifts. Only a few hundred yards away. Ski Run enjoys one of the most direct routes to the ski slopes in Keystone.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Situated right off of US Hwy 6, you simply can't miss this place! Located right in the middle of several very good restaurants in Keystone, you don't need to drive anywhere.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Only a short 4-5 minute walk away from all the restaurants and alpine village feel of River Run. Hop on the free shuttle and join in all the festivities of River Run Village
Property.FeatureDescription4: The indoor pool and hot tub are where you will want to be after a day on the slopes! Just downstairs from the main condo....easy quick access to the pool area.
Property.FeatureDescription5: The Snake River is stocked with brook trout and offers some of the best fishing in all of Summit County right out the door of the condo. Keystone is a fly fisherman's heaven!

Property.OneLiner: With amazing mountain and ski slope views off your private patio, a real wood burning fireplace, and lots of space and sleeping for up to 8 people you will enjoy your Keystone vacation when you stay here! Call us today to book this one now!
Property.RoomDescription1: This beautiful Master bedroom offers sleeping space for 4 people! Features a King bed, as well as a Day bed with a pullout trundle.
Property.RoomDescription2: Beautifully tiled counter tops and wood cabinetry make this kitchen perfect for preparing a gourmet meal. It is fully equipped to handle any meal you'd like to create.
Property.RoomDescription3: Cozy up in the Queen bed while you watch some late night TV on the private flat screen.
Property.RoomDescription4: Relax to the sound of the crackling fireplace while you make plans for the next day's adventures. Plenty of wood is provided, along with fire starters. The Queen Sleep Sofa provides more sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription5: Step out and enjoy a cup of hot cocoa while you grill some burgers and gaze at Keystone's Dercum Mountain. This unit has amazing views of many gorgeous ski runs right from the balcony.
Property.RoomDescription6: This Keystone Vacation rental also has a full size private washer and dryer for your convenience. Returning home with dry clean clothes is always a pleasure!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This large Ski Run condo in Keystone offers everything your family needs to enjoy a incredible vacation in the Colorado mountains! Ski Run is located in the Mountain House Base Area at Keystone Resort, so you are only steps away from the ski lifts!

Property.OneLiner: Come and Enjoy a spectacular ski vacation by staying in Ski Run Condos number 503. Ideally located just a short walk from the mountain house base area. This condo has everything you would need for a ski vacation
Property.RoomDescription1: Convenient ground floor condo makes for easy access after a long day of skiing. The nice tiled entryway has space for boots and to hang coats.
Property.RoomDescription2: Look forward to a good night's sleep in the cozy King bed! Enjoy your private attached bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription3: Enjoy the bright, fully stocked kitchen with nice views over the living room and plenty of space for cooking and preparation
Property.RoomDescription4: Unwind here with the gas fireplace, flat screen TV and plenty of lounging space. The comfy couch is a sleeper sofa. This condo also comes equipped with a Play Station 2 video game console, so bring your games along!
Property.RoomDescription5: Attached to the Living Room is the porch with amazing mountain views. Listen to the Snake River out here in the summer time.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Perfectly located in the Mountain House Base Area, this Ski Run 1 bedroom condo is steps away from the lifts. Features great views, King bed, fully stocked kitchen and flat screen TV.
