Property.OneLiner: With three bedrooms plus a roomy loft staying in this Ski Run Condo puts you right in center of the Mountain House Village. At 350 yards to the lifts you will find shops, restaurants and skiing is all right at your fingertips. An pool and hot tub on sight means that when the lifts close for the day your fun doesn\\\'t have to end. Make your vacation memorable and get a great value when you stay in Keystone at Ski Run #411.
Property.RoomDescription1: Gather the group in the living room to tell your favorite stories from the day! This welcoming, large living room features a comfy L-shaped couch, vaulted ceilings and fireplace beside the flat screen TV. The spiral staircase leading upstairs is an artful addition to the decor of the room.
Property.RoomDescription2: Great for entertaining any size group! The dining table seats 8 and the nearby bar counter top has space for 4 more. Complimented by warm lighting, you'll feel right at home!
Property.RoomDescription3: The spacious layout of this well furnished kitchen will make any chef feel at home. You'll find everything needed to prepare and present a great meal.
Property.RoomDescription4: At the top of the spiral staircase, you'll find a loft sleeping area with a Twin over Full bunk bed and a private TV. The closet and attached bathroom make this loft a fully functional bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription5: This room is next to the loft bedroom features an inviting Queen bed and seating area. The vaulted wood paneled ceiling gives this room a cozy mountain cabin feel.
Property.RoomDescription6: This Guest room features a Queen bed set among rustic cabin decor. When it's time to retreat from the crowd and relax, you will also enjoy the private TV.
Property.RoomDescription7: Located on the main floor, your have a King bed to retire to after a powder day on the slopes! Recently updated furniture and vaulted ceilings compliment each other in this inviting suite. This room also has it's own TV and DVD player.
Property.RoomDescription8: Large sliding doors lead from the living area onto the private covered balcony. Its the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or evening beer. And the gas grill is a huge PLUS!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
You don't want to pass up an opportunity to stay at this great Ski Run Condo! There are 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms in this large 1454 SqFt second floor condo. It is easy walking distance to the lifts at Mountain House Village in Keystone!
A quick walk to the slopes and a welcoming pool and hot tub when you return make this vacation getaway at Ski Run #411 a great choice for your next Keystone adventure!

Property.OneLiner: There is nothing low-end about this beautiful condo. All brand new furniture in this model home right next to the Snake River. Flat screen TVs in every room, private heated garage, and decked out with features to please any group.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview:
The Seasons is a condo complex situated right on the banks of the Snake River and only a 2 minute walk across a foot bridge to Keystone Lake. Nestled among mature spruce trees, The Seasons is one of the most beautiful properties in Keystone. While being a quiet mountain getaway, it is a mere 1/4 mile walk to The Keystone Conference Center and Keystone Lake are literally just a couple minutes away by foot along a well lighted trail through the tall trees, where you can find activites such as ice skating, paddle boats, bike trails, playgrounds, restaurants, shops, and much much more.
The bike path is across the Snake River which leads down the scenic valley to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge.
A unique common area features 2 hot tubs and a fire pit with wood supplied, and is only a few steps away from every property at The Seasons. Towels are included for the hot tubs and steam room.
Property.RoomDescription1:
Breathtaking vaulted ceilings and central gas log fireplace with stunning rock mantel. If you're up for a quiet night inside, sit next to the cozy gas log fireplace and play your favorite movie with full surround sound on a 42" LCD wide screen TV.
Featuring a leather sofa and chairs, as well as an incredible view from all the windows.
Property.RoomDescription2: Featuring high-end GE profile appliances throughout, you will enjoy being the chef here. Kitchen is fully equipped to make all your favorite meals. The bar height dining table seats eight.
Property.RoomDescription3: Located on the main floor, this inviting Master bedroom features a Queen bed, private TV and full bath featuring double sinks.
Property.RoomDescription4: Located on the main floor, this room features 2 full bunk beds along with 2 pull out single mattresses to sleep a total of 6 people. With a 24" LCD flat screen TV with DVD / VCR combo, coral the kids in here and get them set up with a movie to unwind at day's end.
Property.RoomDescription5: Located upstairs, this Guest room features a Queen bed and 24" LCD flat screen TV with DVD / VCR combo. This bedroom is a perfect retreat from the crowd. The bathroom is located right across the hallway.
Property.RoomDescription6: Dual bunk beds along with trundle beds sleep a total of 6 people comfortably. Attached bathroom features double sinks and full size bathtub. Sliding glass door yields a zero-clearance balcony to let in fresh air and the sound of the Snake River right below. Incredible mountain view from this room that give you a "tree house" feel.
Property.RoomDescription7: Single car garage for ski gear storage and keeping all the ice and snow off your car. Lots of extra space for storage here.
Property.RoomDescription8: Enjoy the sights and sounds of Snake River and Keystone Lake. Just into the distance, the continental divide can be seen.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
If you are traveling with a large group, this gorgeous 4 bed vacation condo is for you! The Seasons #1851 has sleeping capacity for 16 and 4 full bathrooms. The Seasons has true mountain ambiance and many luxurious amenities including a single car heated garage, upper level deck, 42" wide screen TV with surround sound, and high quality kitchen appliances.
The Seasons was built in 2002, and is one of the newest properties in Keystone. The upper level deck features incredible mountain views above the tall spruce trees that surround the property. The sound of the Snake River is mesmerizing! The fireworks display on Sat evenings during ski season is close enough you can almost touch it.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Just a couple minutes of walking on a well lit pathway and over a walking bridge you'll find paddle boats, ice skating, shops, restaurants, and much more.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Right over the embankment. You can even hear the Sname River while sitting on the patio. Next to the river is the bike path that leads both up and down the valley to Lake Dillon, Frisco, and Breckenridge.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Less than 1/3 mile from the Keystone Conference Center. Just a quick walk over the bridge and around the lake. There is even a tunnel under US Hwy 6 so you don't have to cross the road! Less than a 5 minute walk.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Literally about 25 feet from the front door. take the FREE shuttle anywhere in Keystone. The ride to the ski lifts is less than 5 minutes. No walking in ski boots!
Property.FeatureDescription5: The common area is about 75 feet away from the front door. 2 large outdoor hot tubs, locker rooms, sauna, and a large BBQ fire pit with supplied fire wood. Have a campfire right here! Towels are also supplied for all guests.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Unassagined parking and plenty of it. If you have more than 1 car, no problem. Park one car in the single car heated garage and the rest of the cars outside.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Internet access is provided within the condo via Ethernet Cable.

Property.OneLiner: Luxury accommodations in a quiet setting pretty much describes this unique property. Located right on the banks of the Snake River and decked out with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops, this IS the place to call home for your vacation.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview:
The Seasons is a condo complex situated right on the banks of the Snake River and only a 2 minute walk across a foot bridge to Keystone Lake. Nestled among mature spruce trees, The Seasons is one of the most beautiful properties in Keystone. While being a quiet mountain getaway, it is a mere 1/4 mile walk to The Keystone Conference Center and Keystone Lake. Both of these are literally just a couple minutes away by foot along a well lighted trail through the tall trees, where you can find activities such as ice skating, paddle boats, bike trails, playgrounds, restaurants, shops, and much much more.
The bike path is across the Snake River which leads down the scenic valley to the Keystone golf courses, Lake Dillon and eventually to Frisco and Breckenridge.
A unique common area features 2 hot tubs and a fire pit with wood supplied, and is only a few steps away from every property at The Seasons. Towels are included for the hot tubs and steam room.
Property.RoomDescription1: If you're up for a quiet night inside, get cozy by the gas fireplace and watch a movie with full surround sound on a 32" LCD wide screen TV mounted right above the fireplace. Want even more privacy? A 19" flat screen awaits you in the Master bedroom!
Property.RoomDescription2: With stainless appliances and granite counter tops, this kitchen is a chef's DREAM! Well lit and open to the living room, the cook will never feel left out of the conversation. Completely stocked with the pans and dishes needed to cook a full meal.
Property.RoomDescription3: As soon as you open the front door, you'll be impressed by the slate entryway and solid wood doors.
Property.RoomDescription4: This room provides a Single over Full bunk bed. The "California Closet" design features a built in dresser. An attached bath gives easy access for anyone staying in this room. A VCR and variety of "G" rated movies are also provided.
Property.RoomDescription5: The head of the group will love getting settled in this room. A Queen bed awaits at the end of your ski day. Beautiful mountain and ski decor welcome you to the Colorado Rockies. Unwind with the flat screen TV or just hit your pillow and dose off. The private bathroom features a sunken bathtub and dual sinks.
Property.RoomDescription6: It's worth mentioning due to the sheer size of this room. Originally slated to be a bathroom, it was decided to make a large storage closet instead. Not a bad idea considering that most condos are cramped and small. NOT HERE! Everyone's skis, boots, luggage and more will all easily fit into this monster closet.
Property.RoomDescription7: A sliding glass door in the living room leads outside onto the raised wooden deck. Sit and relax while you hear and see the Snake River below the embankment. A set of stairs allows easy access to the trail leading to Keystone Lake. Close to everything, yet with a secluded feel!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Built in 2002, The Seasons is one of the newest vacation properties in Keystone. Featuring mountain decor, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a private laundry, your group will fall in love with this beautiful Colorado getaway! The outside deck leads to the walking path over the Snake River, which takes you to Keystone Lake and River Run Village. Enjoy a spectacular view of fireworks right from your deck, occurring on July 4th and New Year's Eve.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Less than 1/3 mile from the Keystone Conference Center. Just a quick walk over the bridge and around the lake. There is even a tunnel under US Hwy 6 so you don't have to cross the road! Less than a 5 minute walk.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Literally about 25 feet from the front door. Take the FREE shuttle anywhere in Keystone. The ride to the ski lifts is less than 5 minutes. No walking in ski boots!
Property.FeatureDescription3: Just a couple minutes of walking on a well lit pathway and over a walking bridge you'll find paddle boats, ice skating, shops, restaurants, and much more. Don't forget to dine at the world class Champeaux restaurant.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Right over the embankment. You can even hear and see the Snake River while sitting on the patio. Next to the river is the bike path that leads both up and down the valley to Lake Dillon, Frisco, and Breckenridge.
Property.FeatureDescription5: The common area is about 75 feet away from the front door. 2 large outdoor hot tubs, locker rooms, sauna, and a large BBQ fire pit with supplied fire wood. Have a campfire right here! Towels are also supplied for all guests.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Unassigned parking and plenty of it. If you have more than 1 car, no problem.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Internet access is provided within the condo via Ethernet Cable.

Property.OneLiner: Sit back and relax and take in the sheer beauty of this condo that is right next to the Snake River and Keystone Lake. Nestled in tall pine trees, and exceptionally furnished, this condo has easy access to everything.

Nestled among mature spruce trees, The Seasons is one of the most beautiful properties in Keystone. Property.RoomDescription1: This kitchen is fully equipped with a few extras, such as a toaster oven. The dining room table offers seating for 5. The perfect spot for sharing some down time with your family or friends.
Property.RoomDescription2: No better place for some R & R after a long day on the slopes. The gas fireplace, Flat screen TV, VCR, DVD, and movies will make it easy for you to hibernate on a cold winter evening. The stunning view includes the Snake River, Keystone Lake, and tall pine trees.
Property.RoomDescription3: With a Queen bed and attached half bath, this bedroom is the perfect retreat. Get a good night sleep because you need to get up early to catch first tracks!
Property.RoomDescription4: Your private deck has sweeping views of the Snake River and Keystone Lake. Bring along a good book and breathe in the fresh mountain air!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: The Seasons is one of the most secluded, yet convenient, locations in Keystone: nestled in the pines, yet within walking distance of the Mountain House Base Area and steps away from Keystone Lake. Enjoy the private entrance and building amenities such as hot tubs and an outdoor fire pit.

Property.OneLiner: Gorgeous three bedroom home which sleeps 8 comfortably and overlooks the Snake River. Walking distance to the attractions at the Lakeside Village and just a few moments away from the Keystone slopes! Find yourself a home away from home when you stay at Seasons 1843!
Property.RoomDescription1: Find yourself at home when you prepare a great meal in this fully equipped kitchen. You've got a full set of pans and dishes and great counter space for prepping.
Property.RoomDescription2: Enjoy dinner with a view in the separate, formal dining room!
Property.RoomDescription3: Allow yourself a little luxury and claim the Master Suite as your own! Complete with an inviting King bed, an attached master bathroom and a great view from this second story room! The vaulted ceilings and private flat screen TV is the perfect ending to your ski day!
Property.RoomDescription4: Retire to this Guest room and get settled in! Features a cozy Queen bed, private TV and a beautiful view of the surrounding forest and mountains.
Property.RoomDescription5: Perfect for a large group of friends or families traveling with kids, this third bedroom is an amazing addition to this already well equipped town home. Sleeping up to 6, there is a set of Captain's Bunks which are twin over full beds. Vaulted ceilings and large windows give this room a spacious feel so you won't feel crowded, even with a full house!
Property.RoomDescription6: On the main floor is a cozy living room with high ceilings and access to the private deck through large sliding glass doors. Comfortable couch and chairs are gathered in front of the warm gas fireplace and the TV/DVD player set up.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Your family and friends will fall in love with this 3 bedroom Keystone vacation townhouse! Just steps from the Snake River, this Seasons townhouse features vaulted ceilings, private laundry and nearby trail to Keystone Lake! Three bedrooms and plenty of space make this a welcome home for any group to call their own!

Property.OneLiner: The Seasons Townhomes in Lakeside Village are your ideal vacation rentals. Located just down the road from the ski lifts and a short walk to Keystone Lake.
Property.RoomDescription1: Curl up next to the gas fireplace in this spacious living room and enjoy some quality time with family and friends. The flat screen TV is sure to keep everyone entertained.
Property.RoomDescription2: Stainless steel appliances give this fully equipped kitchen a modern look. Included is everything the family chef will need to create an amazing dinner from scratch!
Property.RoomDescription3: With seating for 6 at the table and an additional 3 at the breakfast bar, the whole family can sit down at once and enjoy dinner together while looking out over the beautiful Colorado woods.
Property.RoomDescription4: The king size bed is perfect for mom and dad to relax in after a long day of skiing on the mountains! With an attached master bathroom, you never need to leave the privacy of your own bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription5: Equipped with two twin size beds this room is perfect for the kids! A small TV will keep them occupied in the morning and at night.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Welcome to your home away from home in beautiful Keystone! This spacious, beautifully furnished 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo is a wonderful place to return to after a long day of skiing or snowboarding on the mountains.

Property.OneLiner: Rent this perfectly located 4 bedroom 3 bathroom Condo only steps away from the Keystone lake, and very close to the lifts. This is Ideal for your ski vacation.
Property.RoomDescription1: As soon as you enter into the property you will notice the unique layout of having a lower entry with tons of space to take off all your shoes and boots.
Property.RoomDescription2: As you stand in the entrance way you will see 2 rooms ahead of you. Enter into one of them and you will find a queen bed and immediately next to it a Bunk bed. This room is perfect for a couple with 2 kids! The lofted queen bed makes it perfect for storing suitcases as well.
Property.RoomDescription3: In the other guest bedroom on the lower level you will see a queen sized bed and next to it will also see a pair of twin beds, making this room perfect for several people or a small family on your trip. Another lofted queen bed makes for easy space saving storage
Property.RoomDescription4: In the upper guest bedroom you will find a queen bed and plenty of space for everything. A flat screen TV also compliments the room
Property.RoomDescription5: In the master bedroom you will have the most spacious room in the condo complete with an ensuite bathroom for privacy
Property.RoomDescription6: as you turn around from the bedrooms walk towards the livingroom and you will find the kitchen which is fully stocked to make everything from the average meal to a full thanksgiving dinner
Property.RoomDescription7: In the dining area adjacent to the kitchen you will find a dining table which is out of the way and big enough for a large group to enjoy a hearty meal.
Property.RoomDescription8: Just past the dining area you will find the living room with a wood burning fireplace, classy wood siding walls and leather furniture. You will also notice the massive south facing window doors which allow for plenty of natural light, and a great view towards the slopes of Dercum Mountain.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This very well furnished 4 bedroom property in the Decatur buiilding is like nothing you have seen. with views of the slopes and only steps from the lakeside village it makes it the perfect location for both skiing and skating in the winter time, and hiking, biking boating, fishing and cycling in the summer. The spacious layout of this property will make you feel at home as it sleeps 12 without making use of the living room!

Property.OneLiner: One of the nicest complexes in Keystone\'s River Run Village. Central to everything you will enjoy the closeness to the slopes and buzz of the village. Perfectly furnished with the typical \"Keystone Colorado\" mountain feel and tons of space for 8 people and gear.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: Large living room with plenty of seating and space for 8 people. Central to the room is a gas log fireplace and entertainment center. Queen fold down Murphy bed and sleeper sofa, breakfast bar, and a large dining table to seat 8. 3rd bathroom is located right off the living room.
Property.RoomDescription2: King size bed and attached bathroom with double sinks and full size bathtub. Window looks out into the courtyard and onto the balcony. Lots of extra closet space, and a TV with DVD player.
Property.RoomDescription3: Features a Queen size bed, and attached bathroom with double sinks and full size bathtub. Window looks out into the courtyard and onto the balcony. Lots of extra closet space, and a TV with DVD player.
Property.RoomDescription4: Extremely spacious and central to the living room so the cook is not left out of the conversation! Features Range, Oven, TONS of cabinet space for food, toaster, coffee maker, microwave oven, pots, pans, etc. Everything you need to cook anything you want is located here.
Property.RoomDescription5: Overlooks the courtyard where the outdoor heated pool and hot tub are located. Also located in the court yard is a big climbing rock for kids and lots of grass in the summertime. View of the hills to the North of Keystone. One of the nicest views in Expedition Station!
Property.RoomDescription6: Not located in the condo itself, but just down the hall are laundry facilities if you need to do wash. Coin-op washers and dryers available.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: One of the most spacious 2 bedrooms we have in our inventory, you'll feel right at home with the beautiful furnishings and mountain appeal. Brand new furnishings make this property one of our best. The owners have gone all-out with feater tops for both beds and beautiful decor. This is the most spacious 2 bedroom we have seen in River Run Village in Keystone Colorado.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Absolutely no scraping ice or snow! Plentiful underground parking accessible by your room key.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Not only a heated pool, but a heated patio so you don't have to walk through any snow to GET to the pool or hot tub. In the summertime, the courtyard features a climbing rock, and small play area. Towels are supplied at the pool area.
Property.FeatureDescription3: One of the nicest lobby and lounges in all of River Run! Grand fireplace, bar tables, and a pool table for guest use.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Overlooking the outdoor pool and hot tub is a steam room with a big window to the outdoors.
Property.FeatureDescription5: If a long day of skiing or biking isn't enough, or if you just need a workout everything you need is on site.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Only minutes away from the River Run Gondola....stop by Starbucks or the Inxspot on your way to the lift for some coffee.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Expedition Station is right in the middle of River Run Village. Bordering other condo complexes, there is a mini golf course and huge play area for kids right outside.
Property.FeatureDescription8: Keystone's mini-golf is RIGHT outside Expedition Station along with a HUGE kids play area. Expedition Station is PERFECT for a family get together with small kids.

Property.OneLiner: Cozy with everything you need for the perfect vacation. You\'ll love the large ground level patio looking to the peaks of the continental divide.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: The living room features a gas log fireplace and a cozy setting for a small family or small group of friends. A Queen sofa sleeper in the living room adds the extra sleeping capacity you might need.
Property.RoomDescription2: A full kitchen is fully stocked with all the pots & pans that you'll ever need to cook a full meal for the gang. Open to the living room, the cook will not be left out of the conversation of the days activities. But, since you're staying in River Run Village in Keystone, you may not have to cook at all. There are plenty of nearby restaurants for any taste
Property.RoomDescription3: Located right off the living room, a bedroom features a king sized bed and a Queen futon. A TV and extra closet space is plentiful to store everyone's ski gear.
Property.RoomDescription4: A ground level patio with an awesome North and Eastern view is just steps away through the sliding glass door in the living room. Enjoy the shade in the afternoon on a warm spring day.
Property.RoomDescription5: Not located in the condo itself, but just down the hall are laundry facilities if you need to do wash. Coin-op washers and dryers available.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Expedition Station #8550 offers a rustic cabin-like experience for a fraction of the cost. Looking out to the North, you'll have a view of the snowy peaks towards Arapahoe Basin and a very large ground level patio to view them from. A full kitchen has everything you need to cook a full meal, and the extra sleeping capacity in the bedroom is perfect for smaller kids.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Absolutely no scraping ice or snow! Plentiful underground parking accessible by your room key.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Not only a heated pool, but a heated patio so you don't have to walk through any snow to GET to the pool or hot tub. In the summertime, the courtyard features a climbing rock, and small play area. Towels are supplied at the pool area.
Property.FeatureDescription3: One of the nicest lobbies and lounges in all of River Run! Grand fireplace, bar tables, and a pool table for guest use.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Overlooking the outdoor pool and hot tub is a steam room with a big window to the outdoors.
Property.FeatureDescription5: If a long day of skiing or biking isn't enough, or if you just need a workout, everything you need is on site.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Only minutes to the River Run Gondola. Get dressed in your condo and walk through River Run Village.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Expedition Station is right in the middle of River Run Village. Bordering other condo complexes, there is a mini golf course and huge play area for kids right outside.
Property.FeatureDescription8: Keystone's mini-golf is RIGHT outside Expedition Station along with a HUGE kids play area. Expedition Station is PERFECT for a family get together with small kids.
Property.FeatureDescription9: High-speed internet access is provided throughout the condo via Wi-Fi, so you can keep up no matter where you are.

Property.OneLiner: One of the most efficient condos we have. Plenty of space for 6 people and gear. A uniquely furnished property with a private ground level balcony. You'll love this one!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: The full size Murphy bed and full size sleeper sofa provide sleeping space for 4 people in this living room, making it one of the most space efficient condos in Keystone. The gas log fireplace creates a cozy feel on a cold winter night. The living room is equipped with a TV/VCR.
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen is light and functional. The maple cabinets are a nice touch, lending to the clean, modern feel throughout the unit. The dining room table seats six, providing a nice spot for a quick breakfast before hitting the fresh powder.
Property.RoomDescription3: This is a three quarter bath with a shower, stool and sink. The built in hair dryer is a convenient touch. The designers had convenience in mind when they created the toilet room separate from the shower.
Property.RoomDescription4: The bedroom has an attached full bath with dual sinks and a built in hair dryer. The king sized bed is a welcome sight after a big day on the slopes. This room is equipped with a TV, so it makes for a nice respite from the crowd at the end of the day. The bedroom window provides a partial view of the slopes.
Property.RoomDescription5: The patio has chairs for two. Snuggle under a blanket with a mug of hot chocolate and enjoy the view of the mountains.
Property.RoomDescription6: Not located in the condo itself, but just down the hall are laundry facilities if you need to do wash. Coin-op washers and dryers available.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Expedition Station #8552 offers a rustic cabin-like experience for a fraction of the cost. Looking out to the North, you'll have a view of the snowy peaks towards Arapahoe Basin and a very large ground level patio to view them from. A full kitchen has everything you need to cook a full meal, and the extra sleeping capacity with a fold down Murphy bed in the dining area. Located right next to an identical unit, you can rent both properties and be close to each other for a total sleeping capacity of 12.

Property.OneLiner: Right in River Run, Expedition Station is has a pool, hot tub and play area for the kids. This keystone vacation rental easily accommodates 6 people right in the action of River Run Village.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: The full size kitchen is stocked with everything you need to prepare a delicious meal in no time. The vaulted ceilings lend a feel of spaciousness, and with plenty of cupboard space, you can put all of your groceries away. The dining table seats six, so your whole family can have a sit down dinner.
Property.RoomDescription2: With a Murphy Bed and sofa sleeper, this living room converts into a bunk room at night! The sky light window has a view of the courtyard as well as the slopes. Furnished with a TV, DVD, VCR, you will be able to catch up on all the movies on your "to watch list." A gas log fireplace makes this condo super cozy!
Property.RoomDescription3: The bedroom is furnished with a comfortable queen size bed that will be calling your name after a long day on the slopes. The TV in the bedroom will allow you to catch the news for a weather update before going to bed. The attached bathroom has a full sized tub and dual sinks and built in hair dryers for your convenience.
Property.RoomDescription4: The sliding glass door opens onto large balcony; with two chairs and a table, this is the perfect spot for enjoying hot chocolate while watching the rest of crowd play at the pool and children's play area.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: More spacious than most one bedrooms, Expedition Station 8628 is ideal for a family vacation. This unit has views of the pool, courtyard and play area as well as the surrounding peaks. Located at the entrance to River Run, you will be able to walk to the slopes as well as to restaurants and shopping.

Property.OneLiner: By far one of the nicest properties in our inventory. This property has hardwood floors and decor that is the best we've seen anywhere. You simply have to see it to believe it.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: The gourmet kitchen is like nothing you have seen in Keystone. The chef will appreciate the premium stainless steel appliances of the latest design, recessed lighting, and an open configuration which allows for easy interaction with the rest of the crew. A breakfast bar along the counter seats four comfortably.
Property.RoomDescription2: One of the nicest living spaces in Keystone hands down. Hardwood floors lend a look of elegance, complemented by a super-comfy leather sofa sleeper and loveseat. Entertainment is available via DVD player, cable TV, and a 32 in LCD flat-screen TV above the gas-log fireplace. Alternatively, enjoy a quiet evening watching the fire burn on a cold night or, on a cool summer evening, move to the deck and view the surrounding Rocky Mountain vistas. A discreetly placed curtain may be drawn to isolate the living space, providing privacy when used as a sleeping area. This room features a fold-out single bed as well.
Property.RoomDescription3: A private suite with all you might desire for a romantic get-away. Featuring a queen bed, a private bath, a view of the Rockies, designer furniture, TV, and exquisite decor all around, this retreat will satisfy the most discriminating taste.
Property.RoomDescription4: This "Room with a View" overlooks Dercum Square and affords glimpses of Keystone's ski slopes. Comparable to the master bedroom, outfitted with a queen bed, a TV and DVD player, this bedroom is but one step from the common bath door.
Property.RoomDescription5: The 3rd floor deck, overlooking Dercum Square, provides expansive views of the Rocky Mountains to the East and to the South. Across the Snake River to the South, you see the upper reaches of the Gondola and Keystone's black and blue ski slopes. Year round, this sheltered space with southern exposure affords a cozy rendezvous for two.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This property is beautifully and uniquely outfitted with exceptional touches including hardwood floors throughout the living area. On entering, your gaze will sweep through the gourmet kitchen to a tastefully appointed living room with fireplace, a broad arched window, and sliding door access to the 3rd level deck. Simply put, professional decoration here offers the feel of a fine home.

Property.OneLiner: Right in River Run Village, Expedition Station is has a pool, hot tub and play area for the kids. This unit is easily accommodates six people in comfort. What a great place to stay in Keystone Resort Colorado.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Right in the middle of River Run Village and central to everything, Expedition Station offers all the same perks as luxury lodging without the luxury price tag. Located just 3 minutes walking distance to the ski lifts and less than 1 minute to all the shops of River Run, you won't want to leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: The vaulted ceilings really open up this condo keeping the chef in the middle of the conversation, and with plenty of space, you can store everything you get for your stay. Plenty of room for everyone to hang out and entertain your group. You will love Expedition Station #8630.
Property.RoomDescription2: This room features a comfy couch and flat screen TV to enjoy the big game or an afternoon nap. Enjoy the great company you are with while sitting next to the fire telling stories of your wonderful day. The couch pulls out into a queen sized bed and you also have a queen sized Murphy Bed to comfortably sleep 6 all together.
Property.RoomDescription3: Escape in here for a good nights sleep after a great day on Keystone Mountain. The bed will welcome your tired body. This bedroom also has a private bathroom for your use. With a nice flat screen TV on the wall you will enjoy watching your favorite shows while tucked into bed.
Property.RoomDescription4: This condo has a very large balcony with a view of the pool area. Close enough to see everything, this is a perfect spot to relax after a long bike ride or hike in the mountains or to read a great book. Feel free to bring something to grill on your private patio.
Property.RoomDescription5: Expedition Station #8630 has a great dining area. Room for a quick meal before you head out or to sit down to a nice dinner after a long day. You will enjoy your stay in this River Run Condo.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Expedition Station 8630 is a great over sized one bedroom ideal for a family vacation. This unit overlooks the pool, courtyard and play area as well as the surrounding peaks. Walk to the slopes, restaurants, shops, and enjoy your Keystone Vacation in style.

Property.OneLiner: Expedition Station 8581 is a one bed one bath Keystone Condo right in River Run Village. The condo looks out over the playground and mini golf course in the village, sleeps four comfortably and is within walking distance to the gondola! Book it today!
Property.RoomDescription1: Expedition Station 8581 has a large and comfortable king-sized bed in the bedroom with TV. After an exciting day of mountain fun, your body will welcome a long nights rest. The large room offers plenty of space to store your luggage as well.
Property.RoomDescription2: If you would rather spend your evening in and have a home cooked meal, this condo is right for you. With a fully-equipped large kitchen, your group's chef will feel right at home.
Property.RoomDescription3: This inviting living room will welcome you home after a day in the mountains. Whether you feel like sitting by the fire laughing with old friends, or watching the large flat screen TV, you will be glad you're staying in Expedition Station 8581. The couch also pulls out to a queen sleeper for additional sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription4: The Dining Area is a perfect place for your family or group to sit down and enjoy a meal in. With comfortable seating for four adults and located right off the kitchen you can bring everyone together here.
Property.RoomDescription5: A great feature of this Keystone rental is the extra-large balcony. Enjoy the gorgeous mountain views or watch the kids on the playground below!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Expedition Station #8581 in River Run Village at Keystone Resort. This over-sized one bedroom condo is perfect for the family that wants a little extra space. You will have slope views from the balcony and the building is in a great location - just steps away from the slopes, shops, and restaurants.

Property.OneLiner: Located in River Run Village and with all of the upgrades you want you have found your mountain destination. Recently remodeled and updated your friends and family will enjoy staying here!
Property.RoomDescription1: This kitchen was just recently remodeled. All brand new stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, and tile counter tops will welcome the chef into the kitchen. With all of the necessary equipment to whip up a gourmet meal, you will find more people of your group are willing to help!
Property.RoomDescription2: After a long day of hitting the slopes or a great bike ride up the pass, you will enjoy kicking back in here. With a nice flat screen above the fireplace, no place is cozier. The couch pulls out into a queen size sleeper sofa and you will find a queen sized Murphy bed at the other end of the room.
Property.RoomDescription3: This condominium has a full size dining table that comfortably seats 6, for a great place to bring the group together for a home cooked meal.
Property.RoomDescription4: Relax... the vacation of your dreams is taking place and you have just found the best spot in the house. This comfortable king sized bed is going to do your body wonders for a great nights sleep. Feel free to watch the Flat screen from bed, perfectly located on the wall for your morning and evening viewing. The bathroom has a full tub with shower, dual vanity sinks, and a separate toilet.
Property.RoomDescription5: This bedroom features a new queen sized bed. Enjoy the comforts of a flat screen TV from this bedroom as well. This bedroom also has a private bathroom with a shower.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Expedition Station #8591 is located in River Run Village at Keystone Resort. This is a large 2 Bed 2 and 3/4 Bath condo overlooking the ski slopes, ice skating rink, playground and mini golf course. Walk to the slopes, restaurants and shops of the Village and enjoy your next vacation in Expedition Station #8591

Property.OneLiner: Expedition Station 8622 in Keystone Colorado\'s River Run Village. Enjoy your next vacation to Keystone in the comfortable setting that this property will provide. With accommodations for four and with an amazing location you will not hesitate to reserve this unit twice!
Property.RoomDescription1: Calling it a night is tough when you are having so much fun on vacation. To make it easier the owners have included a King sized pillow top mattress for you to get a good nights rest. If you want to watch TV in here turn on the wall mounted flat screen and relax!
Property.RoomDescription2: Comfortable living area including a new flat screen TV, gas fireplace, great pool views and more! The sofa sleeper has a memory foam mattress as well!
Property.RoomDescription3: This Keystone Vacation Condo has a fully equipped kitchen for putting together all of your meals.
Property.RoomDescription4: Looking out over the Expedition Station swimming pool you have a lovely view and great place to catch up or read a good book!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: When you want a great place to stay in Keystone and want to walk to the slopes and enjoy all that River Run Village has to offer, make Expedition Station 8622 your stop. Featuring a pillow top King sized bed, multiple flat screen TV's, fireplace, and full kitchen you might just make your next reservation before you leave!

Property.OneLiner: River Run Village Condos at Expedition Station. When vacationing to Keystone people prefer to stay here!
Property.RoomDescription1: This niceley furnished bedroom will welcome you in at the end of a day in Keystone Colorado. The owners have recently updated this bedroom by updating the bedding including the mattress!
Property.RoomDescription2: The living room has some great upgrades, a very nice leather couch, great seating chairs and a cozy gas fireplace. You also have a TV and DVD player in here and the couch turns into a sofa sleeper in here.
Property.RoomDescription3: There is a full kitchen which is well stocked, you have all the cooking utensils you need to prepare a home cooked meal, but if you would rather you can walk down to the local watering hole for a bite to eat with your friends!

Property.OneLiner: Want quick access to the pool and hot tub? This is the place for you. Located literally 25 feet from the hot tub and pool via the ground level patio, this is a skiers dream for end of the day relaxation.
Property.RoomDescription1: This newly remodeled kitchen is fully equipped so you can cook your favorite meals while on vacation! No need to spend extra money dining out. Upgraded features include a stainless steel coffee maker, slow cooker and a rice cooker.The casual dining table provides seating for four.
Property.RoomDescription2: Get comfy in the Queen bed while you unwind with the private TV. The view of the courtyard is the perfect way to enjoy the beauty of Keystone Resort.
Property.RoomDescription3: With a rock gas log fireplace, this is one of the coziest rooms in Summit County! The window looks out onto the court yard, so you can gauge the activity at the pool without leaving your condo. If you prefer to stay in, the TV., VCR and DVD player will be sure to entertain. A queen size sleeper sofa and a Murphy bed make this a very space efficient unit.
Property.RoomDescription4: The walk out patio is a true bonus in this property! No need to go through the locker room to get to the heated outdoor pool and hot tub. If you have children, you will appreciate the convenience of walking just a few feet to the climbing wall and courtyard. The patio has seating space for two. What better way than to enjoy a morning cup of coffee?
Property.RoomDescription5: Normally, we don't mention bathrooms because we all know what they look like. However, it is worth noting that the shower head in THIS bathroom is a huge "rain" type shower head. Experience one for yourself!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This newly remodeled vacation condo is located on the ground floor of Expedition Station. Enjoy quick access to the pool and hot tubs, not to mention River Run Village shops and restaurants! This is one of the few 1 bedroom condos that sleeps up to 6 people, thanks to a Queen Murphy bed in the living room. You will be glad you stayed at Expedition Station #8558!

Property.OneLiner: Gorgeous 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo in the heart of River Run Village. You'll have access to all the amenities of River Run like a heated garage, walk to slopes, and you'll be close to all the shops and restaurants of River Run! You'll never have to drive unless you want to!
Property.RoomDescription1: This full kitchen has everything you need to make a gourmet mountain dinner! The kitchen comes equipped to handle every pallet and you'll be the favorite of the vacation by cooking those hot meals after a long day on the mountain!
Property.RoomDescription2: The living room area is a great place to relax after a long day hitting the slopes, fishing or enjoying the cool mountain air! The cozy fireplace and plenty of seating will make this a popular place to reflect on your most glorious tricks and runs! Maybe even watch some great skiing movies on the 42" flatscreen
Property.RoomDescription3: The master bedroom is a great for Mom and Dad or the payers of the vacation. Adorned with an attached master bathroom, this is a perfect retreat for couples.
Property.RoomDescription4: The guest bedroom is ideal for a few kids or an additional traveling couple! There's plenty of space to spread out and you get a room for extra people!
Property.RoomDescription5: Enjoy a hot homecooked meal around the dining table which fits six, then slide the teflon coated table back to the side of the kitchen for more room in the living area

Walk to the slopes, restaurants and shops of the village and enjoy your next ski or summer vacation in Expedition Station 8598!

Property.OneLiner: Expedition Station #8589 is quite possibly the nicest one bedroom unit in this building. Warm colors, stylish decor along with upgraded marble counter tops in the kitchen, a large flat screen TV and a spacious balcony outside are just a few of the stand out features this condo has to offer.
Property.RoomDescription1: With unique granite counter tops, with a brushed nickle sink and faucet and tiled floors the kitchen in this Expedition condo has all necessary kitchen equipment to make a meal with ease and the style to make the experience an inviting one. Take some time to cook-in on your next vacation
Property.RoomDescription2: This upgraded living room includes a faux rock mantle over the gas fireplace, a new micro-suede couch with queen sofa sleeper a large flat screen TV on the wall as well as several tasteful art pieces, giving this room the feel of being more a home than just a condo.
Property.RoomDescription3: Featuring a king size bed with stylish furnishings and lovely natural light from the balcony facing window this bedroom provides a comfortable and inviting atmosphere for settling into and feeling at home in luxury. There is even a desk in this room so you have a place to "set up shop" if you need to keep in touch with the world back home while you're away.
Property.RoomDescription4: In the bathroom you will find a full shower and bathtub, along with toilet and pedestal sink. Hair dryers are always provided and in this spacious bathroom you will find it easy for your group to share space as you get ready before going out each day.
Property.RoomDescription5: The deck to this unit faces the east and warms quickly in the mornings. It overlooks the Keystone Mini golf course and has views towards the Montezuma lot, Buffalo and Dakota Lodges as well as the ski slopes!!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Beautiful 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom unit on the east side of expedition station facing the slopes and the mini golf course. Extremely well furnished and upgraded by the owner featuring a gas fireplace, granite countertops and a large flatscreen!

Property.OneLiner: Expedition Station condos are located right in River Run Village, within walking distance to the slopes, shops, restaurants and the action at Keystone Resort. With a nicely heated outdoor pool you will really.
Property.RoomDescription1: If you need counter space for prepping a big family meal, look no further. This fully equipped kitchen provides the space and equipment necessary to making cooking in a breeze. Slate tile floors and windows make this part of the room both functional and inviting. You will enjoy this top of the line executive kitchen in Expedition Station 8568.
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining area in this spacious condo features a large table which can seat at least 6 comfortably, and probably a few more if you need it to. Any extras you have joining you for a meal can also find a comfortable place to sit at the breakfast bar stools nearby.
Property.RoomDescription3: Accessed from the living area this private balcony/patio offers the perfect place to sit and enjoy a breath of fresh air. Nearby trees offer light shade and from here you can also see the pool.
Property.RoomDescription4: After a day of skiing, snowboarding wining and dining welcome home to this comfortable living room. Lots of upgrades and inviting gas fireplace in the large living room at this Expedition Station condo. Whether you are ready to veg after a long day on the slopes or looking for a place to gather and retell the best stories of the week this living room is the perfect place to meet. The sofa also has a pull out sofa sleeper in here.
Property.RoomDescription5: Welcoming you with warm colors and a beautiful king sized bed this Master bedroom is the perfect retreat from vacation madness. The private TV set up, the beautiful natural light from the windows and a full sized attached bathroom make a great getaway and a perfect place to settle into as your home away from home in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription6: A second bedroom in this Expedition Station condo provides comfortable sleeping arrangements with a queen over queen bunk bed and both a closet and bedside drawers for storage. Large windows give great natural light to this room.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: A stay at Expedition Station is one of the best values in River Run Village. Not only are you able to enjoy the private pool and hot tub but there are many other great attractions nearby. This excellent two bedroom is no exception, offering over 1000 sq ft, ground floor access to the pool, beautiful forest and mountain views and more!

Property.OneLiner: Be right in the middle of it all. This property is front row and center to River Run Village right at the top of Black Bear Lodge. You won't miss a thing...you'll have the best seat in Keystone for music festivals and people watching.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: The anchor of River Run Village. Black Bear Lodge is located right next to the Snake River and is extremely close to the slopes. Just downstairs is a full retail center with several restaurant and coffee shops. Lobby area features comfortable leather sofas and a pool table.
Property.RoomDescription1: Your going to need a hearty breakfast before setting out for snow cat skiing, so why not prepare it in this fully stocked kitchen? The breakfast bar seats three and the table seats three, so your entire family can have nutritious meals in the condo. Just because you are only steps away from River Run's finest restaurants doesn't mean you will want to go out for every meal.
Property.RoomDescription2: The gas log fireplace with rock facing is sure to make you feel super cozy on a cold winter night. With a leather recliner and a queen sized sofa sleeper, this is the place for comfort and relaxation. With a TV, DVD and VCR, you can enjoy your favorite movies.
Property.RoomDescription3: When you are tired of watching movies, let the live entertainment tickle your fancy. With a 360 degree view of River Run, you can people watch all day long! During the summer, there are often festivals and musicians singing their songs right below. You have the best seats in the house without ever leaving your condo!
Property.RoomDescription4: Stake your claim on this room! With a king sized bed and an attached bath, you will have all of the privacy in the world! The 32" flat screen TV and DVD player will make it easy to lounge in bed a little bit later than usual, but don't forget, you came to ski Keystone! With a view of River Run, the skiers walking past your window will motivate you to hit the snow.
Property.RoomDescription5: Bonus - dual queen bunks raise the comfortable sleeping capacity! With a dresser and a nice sized closet, you can unpack and make yourself at home.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This two bedroom two bathroom unit at Black Bear faces the courtyard at River Run. This property has the best view in the house for festivals, concerts, and especially Mardi Gras!
Property.FeatureDescription1: As close as you can possibly get to the ski slopes without the high price of the ski-in / ski-out places. You can literally SEE the ski slopes!
Property.FeatureDescription2: Heated underground parking means that you won't be scraping ice off your car. Of course, you won't be doing that anyway since the slopes are right next to Black Bear Lodge.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Just outside the complex is an outdoor hot tub. Watch the skiers right from the tub. Access to an outdoor pool is just a few steps away at Arapahoe Lodge. All towels are supplied for both pool and hot tub.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Right as you walk in to the lobby, there is ski storage so you don't have to lug all your gear up to the room.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Black Bear Lodge is right in the middle of all the excitement of river Run Village. Restaurants and shops are only a few steps away. Better yet, the Inxpot coffee shop is in the same building!
Property.FeatureDescription6: Just to reiterate, this is the closest to the slopes as you can get in River Run Village!
Property.FeatureDescription7: High-speed internet access is provided within the condo via an Ethernet Cable.

Property.OneLiner: Black Bear 8042 in River Run Village is one of Keystone Resorts nicest vacation rentals. Located in the middle of Keystone's River Run you are steps from the gondola, shops, restaurants, and more! Book your vacation today!
Property.RoomDescription1: Living area has a cozy feel, great for relaxing after a long day. Gas fireplace and flat screen TV, with DVD player, and wireless internet, for your entertainment. Dining area is great for eating in or playing games.
Property.RoomDescription2: Fully equipped kitchen with plenty of counter space to work on, with range, oven, coffee maker, and plenty of dishes to serve with you'll find everything you need while you're on vacation.
Property.RoomDescription3: There is a Queen size bed in this lovely bedroom, along with a TV for some late night news or movie. Enjoy the privacy of your own bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription4: Terrific views from your private balcony of River Run Village. You can watch all the action while relaxing on the balcony right where you're staying.

Property.OneLiner: There is no better place to be in the middle of it all than Black Bear Lodge. Unit #8033 is a premier one bedroom condo that puts you just steps from the heart of River Run Village and as close to the gondola as you can be!
Property.RoomDescription1: When it's time to cook a meal for the family or grab a quick breakfast before you hit the slopes, this Black Bear condo can make that happen. Fully equipped with all the cooking utensils and dishes you need!
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining table is a great place to gather for a meal or for a good round of story telling. River Run Village is so close to everything that coming back to the condo for a bite to eat is easy!
Property.RoomDescription3: With a great mountain facing view, an inviting gas fireplace and a queen sized sleeper sofa, this tastefully decorated living room is a wonderful place to make yourself at home.
Property.RoomDescription4: You will love coming home to this comfortable Queen bed after a long day on the slopes. With plenty of storage and a private TV, you have all you need to truly relax at the end of your day. Black Bear 8033 is one of our most popular vacation rentals in Keystone.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This beautiful 2 bed Black Bear Lodge condo is located in the heart of River Run Village! Just steps from the gondola, ski lifts and your favorite place to grab a bite to eat. You are on your way to another great day in Keystone!

Property.OneLiner: Black Bear Lodge is the perfect place to stay if you want to be right in the middle of all that River Run Village has to offer. Situated next to the court yard, this is the condo you want to choose if you like the idea of having music, coffee, shops and the gondola all within steps of your vacation home!
Property.RoomDescription1: Enjoy the West facing view of the ski slopes and surrounding mountains. Add a cozy fireplace to the scene and you have the perfect retreat after an exciting day in the Colorado Outdoors!
Property.RoomDescription2: Have a hearty breakfast before you hit the slopes or a warm bite to eat on a cozy mountain evening. You'll find all you need to prepare meals with ease in your own fully equipped kitchen!
Property.RoomDescription3: Get settled into this welcoming bedroom and take an afternoon nap on the spacious King bed. Plenty of closet space will make settling in quick and easy. Before you know it, you'll be scheming up ways to extend your stay!
Property.RoomDescription4: Convenient duel sinks in this bathroom will make getting ready in the morning a little easier. Built in hair dryer is provided.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Looking for a one bedroom condo with easy access to all that River Run Village has to offer? Black Bear Lodge #8035 is the perfect Keystone Condo for you! This one bedroom condo has both sleeping and dining for 6, so you can bring the whole family. And don't worry about taking a shuttle anywhere, you won't find a shorter walk to the gondola anywhere in River Run than from this vacation condo gem!

Property.RoomDescription1: Pop your favorite DVD in, turn the fireplace on, and cozy up on the couch to spend your evening relaxing with the family! The fireplace will warm up the entire condo quickly, there's no better way to truly enjoy a vacation in the mountains than enjoying a fire!
Property.RoomDescription2: The full size kitchen comes equipped with everything you'll need to prepare a gourmet meal for your entire family! Having a kitchen like this makes it super easy to prepare a healthy breakfast before you hit the slopes - or a warm supper after you've spent the day skiing or snowboarding.
Property.RoomDescription3: Every couple loves a king size bed, especially if you're on vacation! Well, this bedroom is sure to please anyone. Upgraded with a 32" flat screen TV, curl up next to a loved one and watch your favorite TV show as you're relaxing at night.
Property.RoomDescription4: Two twin size beds give this condo a lot of sleeping space. The kids will be entertained watching some cartoons if mom & dad need a little break.
Property.RoomDescription5: Both of the spacious bathrooms here are not adjoined with a bedroom, so there is no worry about walking through someone's bedroom when nature calls!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: With awesome access to the lifts at River Run, this 2 bedroom condo is the perfect size for a family of 6! Great views of the village mean that you'll be the first to know about everything exciting going on!

Property.OneLiner: In the heart of River Run, Silver Mill is located above all of the action. Walking distance to the gondola and just steps away from Keystone's finest restaurants, every minute of your vacation will be enjoyable. What a great place to stay in Keystone Village.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Silver Mill is the tall building that is the main feature of River Run Village. Just outside is the well-known Village campfire pit where people exchange stories of the days adventures, and the famous "Parrot Eyes" margarita and burrito bar. The lobby and game room feature TVs, bar stools, a large fireplace and a pool table. Lets not forget how close the slopes are....... this is your perfect Keystone Vacation Rental! Reserve it now!
Property.RoomDescription1: This fully equipped kitchen has everything you need to cook up a delicious meal. Enjoy the little extras that the Owners of this condo provide, including a blender and toaster oven.
Property.RoomDescription2: Get cozy after an amazing ski day on the soft sofa and two leather chairs, providing plenty of seating. Equipped with a TV, VCR and DVD combo, you will finally get a chance to catch up on all of those movies you have been meaning to watch. The view of the courtyard is excellent! Watch your friends as they enjoy the hot tubs below!
Property.RoomDescription3: Look forward to a good night's sleep on the comfy Queen bed! Relax and unwind with the private TV. There is access to the balcony from this room, so you can say good morning to the CO mountains!
Property.RoomDescription4: Watch all the fun in the Village courtyard from your own balcony. With seating for two, this is the place to be!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: If you want to be close to the slopes, shopping and restaurants at Keystone Resort, then this lovely Silver Mill condo is for you! Features amazing upper level balcony views, quality decor and furnishings and much more! You will adore this vacation condo at Silver Mill!
Property.FeatureDescription1: A quick and easy stroll to the ski slopes. Easy access to ski storage downstairs...no need to lug gear upstairs.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Go downstairs and find a place to eat at any one of the many restaurants right there in the square. Starbucks is in the same building, so grab some coffee and hit the slopes all within minutes.
Property.FeatureDescription3: 3 separate hot tubs located just outside the game room for your soaking pleasure. Outdoors with heated patio so you don't have to walk through any snow or ice. Towels are supplied.
Property.FeatureDescription4: No need to scrape ice off your car. You wouldn't have to anyways except on the day you're leaving since everything you need is right in River Run!
Property.FeatureDescription5: Located on the main retail center floor of Silver Mill is a fine margarita and burrito restaurant. Don't miss this place!
Property.FeatureDescription6: Wireless Internet access is available at Silver Mill, but you have to pay for it. Pricing starts at around $10 per day with discounts for weekly and monthly plans.

With a TV and DVD player, you will be able to catch up on some movies. If you would rather make the most of your time together, pull out the cards or boardgames and create some memories!
Property.RoomDescription4: Don't let the chill of winter night keep you inside. Grab your ski jacket and a mug of hot chocolate and sit on the balcony and count those stars! Or, if you prefer, count the night skiers as they make their way down the slope.
Property.RoomDescription5: Furnished with a queen bed and TV/VCR, this room is the perfect retreat after a fun-filled day. The queen bed has a memory foam mattress, so get a great nights rest!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: With a fabulous River Run Village location, Silver Mill 8236 is perfect for vacationers who like to be in the midst of all the action. This unit has a lovely balcony with views of the surrounding mountains and Keystone Pavilion.
Property.FeatureDescription1: A quick and easy stroll to the ski slopes. Easy access to ski storage downstairs...no need to lug gear upstairs.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Go downstairs and find a place to eat at any one of the many restaurants right there in the square. Starbucks is in the same building, so grab some coffee and hit the slopes all within minutes.

Property.OneLiner: Silver Mill is in the center of River Run Village. If you enjoy being where the action is, this is the place for you. Walk to slopes, shopping and dining. You will really enjoy staying in the Silver Mill Condos
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Silver Mill is the tall building that is the main feature of River Run Village. Just outside is the well-known Village campfire pit where people exchange stories of the days adventures, and the famous "Parrot Eyes" margarita and burrito bar. The lobby and game room feature TVs, bar stools, a large fireplace and a pool table. Lets not forget how close the slopes are...a mere 100 yards away.
Property.RoomDescription1: This private bedroom boasts a new King size bed and plenty of space for your luggage. There is a great chair for lounging and also a 32" Flat Screen TV to catch the game from the comfort of your own bed. You will enjoy this getaway in your Silver Mill Condo.
Property.RoomDescription2: This nicely appointed kitchen is fully equipped, and nicely lit. You will enjoy whipping up a hearty meal to get your group off to a great start in the mountains. If you don't care to cook, don't worry. There is a restaurant just down stairs. Enjoy all that Silver Mill has to offer you during your trip to Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription3: This is a great place to bring everyone together for a meal or game of cards. Comfortable seating for four at the dining table. Enjoy your chef's creations in the comfort of your Silver Mill Condo.
Property.RoomDescription4: Wrap up the day in the comfort of your own living room just steps away from the ski lifts. Silver Mill 8304 will welcome you back after a fun filled day into this great living room. Enjoy a view of the Divide or just sit back and enjoy the company of your group next to a nice fire. Relax while watching the 42" Flat Screen TV, or entertain each other telling stories of your adventures in the Mountains of Keystone Resort!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Silver Mill #8304 in River Run Village, Keystone Resort Colorado. This lovely 1 bed 1 bath condo is perfect for a weekend getaway! Enjoy great views of the Continental Divide while you comfortably unwind in this nicely furnished condo. Silver Mill is located in the middle of River Run Village at Keystone Resort. You can't go wrong staying here!
Property.FeatureDescription1: Only 100 yards away is the ski slopes. Easy access to ski storage downstairs...no need to lug gear upstairs.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Go downstairs and find a place to eat at any one of the many restaurants right there in the square. Starbucks is in the same building, so grab some coffee and hit the slopes all within minutes.
Property.FeatureDescription3: 3 separate hot tubs located just outside the game room for your soaking pleasure. Outdoors with heated patio so you don't have to walk through any snow or ice. Towels are supplied.
Property.FeatureDescription4: No need to scrape ice off your car. You wouldn't have to anyways except on the day you're leaving since everything you need is right in River Run!
Property.FeatureDescription5: Located on the main retail center floor of Silver Mill is a fine margarita and burrito restaurant. Don't miss this place!
Property.FeatureDescription6: Wireless Internet access is available at Silver Mill, but you have to pay for it. Pricing starts at around $10 per day with discounts for weekly and monthly plans.

Property.RoomDescription2: The living room in this condominium has a Queen sofa sleeper. The gas fireplace lends a cozy feel to the condo. Property.RoomDescription1: Fully stocked with the pots, pans, dishes, etc that you need to prepare a meal this kitchen ensures that you don't have to worry about eating out every meal. Stop at the grocery store on your way here and stock up the full sized fridge with all your favorite eats!

Property.RoomDescription3: Complete with a leather couch that pulls out to a queen bed, a brand new flat screen TV and a warm gas lit fireplace you will be relaxed and refreshed sitting by the fire or enjoying a movie in the living room after a long day on the slopes.

The distance to the gondola is just 225 yards which means you are minutes away from slope access in one of the most exciting ski resorts in Colorado. Enjoy the three outdoor hot tubs when you need to warm up and find yourself feeling very at home when you are settled into this one bedroom one bathroom condo.

Property.OneLiner: Welcome to Flying Dutchman #1164. This large and accommodating unit in Keystone Resort is ready to hold your next trip to the mountains. Leather couches and comfort for six will allow your family and friends to relax next to the fireplace and offers everyone there own space to spread out and enjoy. This unit is family friendly and offers an additional toddler mattress, high chair and booster seat for your use!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Flying Dutchman is known for it's sprawling yards and open courtyards. The open spaces are so big, in fact, that you don't have to sacrifice a mountain view from any angle! Built specifically for larger groups with the facilities to accommodate lots of people, Flying Dutchman is a place you'll never forget.
Property.RoomDescription1: This living room was recently remodeled, new hardwood floors installed, a flat screen TV, brand new comfortable leather couch, your family will love this condo, book online today.
Property.RoomDescription2: This condo is kid friendly, you will find a pack and play, toddlers mattress, booster seat, gate for the staircase, and lots of toys, kids movies, dvds, and a PS2 (bring your games)! Hardwood floors make cleaning up a snap!
Property.RoomDescription3: This great wood table seats six for the meals you will need to keep you going in the mountains. With views out to the patio and plenty of great light your trip will be full of great memories.
Property.RoomDescription4: Make sure you call this as your room first. This room features a Select Comfort Sleep number Bed to be sure you get the rest you need after a long day in the mountains. New hardwood floors in here as well. Plenty of closet space to hold your luggage and your own Flat screen TV and DVD player as well.
Property.RoomDescription5: This room is off the main entrance for additional privacy. This room has a queen bed, a private bathroom, large closet, and a flat screen TV. You will have plenty of room in here to hold your luggage and spread out.
Property.RoomDescription6: This is perfect, head up the spiral staircase and enter your own private loft. Single over Queen Bunk and an extra single bed, a flat screen TV and a PS2 await you. The views from up here are nice enough to trade the kids for this room.
Property.RoomDescription7: This unit has a large mud room for you to come in out of the snow and offers two welcoming benches to sit down and kick off your boots. Plenty of room for you to store hats and gloves and back packs around here.
Property.RoomDescription8: This ground level patio will be calling your name, snowball fights out the back door and summer time soaking up the sweet sunshine.
Property.RoomDescription9: You will find everything you need in this kitchen. Full size fridge, dishwasher, oven, range, microwave, coffee pot, blender and best of all and Espresso machine to keep your family ready to go. This kitchen is open to the living room and dining room and with the large breakfast bar you might just catch your whole group hanging out here.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Flying Dutchman #1164 offers unique accommodations in Keystone for your family and friends. This rental property offers a full kitchen, dinner table, sleeping arrangement, and room to relax for eight. The bedrooms are private and the kids can enjoy the loft experience with there own TV and games. This ground level patio offers direct access to a large yard and room to let the kids run around outside. If your group is looking for that extra space you will find it here at Flying Dutchman #1164
Property.FeatureDescription1: By far the best feature of Flying Dutchman condos is the huge court yards between each of the buildings. In the summer, there is plenty of room for a game of Frisbee. In winter get ready for the best winter wonderland of you life!
Property.FeatureDescription2: Just steps away is a huge outdoor heated pool with the huge sun deck. A hot tub and sauna is located just inside the clubhouse with locker rooms so you don't have to walk back in a wet swimsuit. Towels are supplied for all guests at the pool house.
Property.FeatureDescription3: From everywhere at Flying Dutchman is a mountain view of the surrounding valley. You'll have a direct mountain view right from every angle.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Located in a quiet neighborhood, yet close to skiing, hiking, biking, and the Keystone horse stables. Keystone Gulch is right across the street an feature tons of biking and hiking trails to please anyone.
Property.FeatureDescription5: All of Flying Dutchman is a hot spot, so you can stay connected all the time!

Property.OneLiner: Away from the crowds, yet located less than two miles from the lifts, this complex is perfect for your family vacation. Enjoy this large Keystone condominium and the sprawling greenbelt and outdoor pool/hot tub are necessities for those lazy summer days.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Flying Dutchman is known for it's sprawling yards and open courtyards. The open spaces are so big, in fact, that you don't have to sacrifice a mountain view from any angle! Built specifically for larger groups with the facilities to accommodate lots of people, Flying Dutchman is a place you'll never forget.
Property.RoomDescription1: A full size sleeper sofa and a love seat provide plenty of seating space for your group to gather round the wood burning fireplace and have a cozy evening in. A permanent partial wall sections off the downstairs bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription2: A full size table that seats six is the perfect place to enjoy a family meal. Just steps away is the sliding glass door to the patio as well!
Property.RoomDescription3: A creative way to accommodate extra guests! This loft room is a totally separate space up the spiral staircase and is furnished with a queen sized bed and TV.
Property.RoomDescription4: This efficient kitchen does not take up much space, but is equipped with everything you need to prepare delicious meals in the condo. It even has a Crockpot, so you can start a pot roast before you head out to the mountain and enjoy a hot meal the minute you return!
Property.RoomDescription5: A permanent partial wall in the living room creates this professionally crafted downstairs bedroom. While private enough for changing clothes and getting ready for the days activities, it is still open to the living room. Beautifully remodeled and decorated, it has a new queen bed that sleeps 2.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Flying Dutchman #1201 is a two bedroom that has been fully remodeled. The property has an upstairs bedroom and a closed off bedroom downstairs. The whole property accommodates six. What a value! Located just over a mile from the slopes, this complex is just a short shuttle ride from world class skiing.
Property.FeatureDescription1: By far the best feature of Flying Dutchman condos is the huge court yards between each of the buildings. In the summer, there is plenty of room for a game of frisbee. In winter get ready for the best winter wonderland of you life!

Property.RoomDescription2: Don't want to eat out every meal? No worries, enjoy the fully equipped kitchen. Have all the conveniences of your kitchen at home... dishwasher, oven, microwave and even a toaster. Easy to make a quick breakfast bite for everyone before they hit the day in Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription3: Flying Dutchman 1170 has a comfortable gas fireplace that heats the whole place.
