Property.OneLiner: Spend the weekend or a week in this comfortable one bedroom! Nestled in the trees and with gorgeous mountain views, Trapper's Crossing is the perfect getaway.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Trapper's Crossing is nestled in a small valley just East of River Run Village in Keystone. While not far from the ski lifts, it feels more like a private cabin off in the woods than a town home. With views of Settlers Creek Gulch and impressive high peaks nearby, you'll know you're right at home in Keystone Colorado. Just 100 yards away is a free shuttle than can have you riding the lifts within minutes.
Property.RoomDescription1: This kitchen was designed with cooking in mind! A gas range will allow you to cook your favorite meal to perfection. With plenty of shelve space, there is no need to store groceries on the counter tops. A double island allows you to work on dinner and socialize at the same time.
Property.RoomDescription2: A rustic picnic style table and bench lend to the cozy cabin feel of this condo. Two bar stools provide extra seating at the breakfast bar. The walk out patio is surrounded by pine trees and views of Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription3: A gas log fireplace and bear skin rug make this room super cozy. With a queen size sofa sleeper and leather club chair, this might be the most relaxing room in all of Keystone. The large wall of windows provides a view of the surrounding woods. A full home theater with surround sound and a 32" flat screen TV is the perfect way to unwind!
Property.RoomDescription4: After a day on the slopes of Keystone, or a night on the town, you will especially appreciate the comfortable king sized bed. With two chest of drawers and a window with spectacular views, you may never want to leave. The flat screen TV with DVD player makes it that much more tempting to spend the evening at your home away from home.
Property.RoomDescription5: There is a great outdoor hot tub located right outside in the Trappers Crossing complex, or if you want to venture into the River Run Village you also have access to the pool and hot tubs at the Dakota Lodge building.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This one bedroom one bath is open and spacious. With hard wood flooring throughout, it feels like a cabin in the woods! The jetted tub and walk out patio are true bonus features.
Property.FeatureDescription1: The bike path that leads all the way down the Keystone Valley is located right outside your front door. The path goes to Lake Dillon and eventually to Breckenridge if you're feeling really frisky. Perfect for an early morning jog or a winter wonderland walk.
Property.FeatureDescription2: The shuttle stop is 100 yards away and offers regular service throughout the year to any location in Keystone. Catch a transfer in River Run and ride the shuttle to Arapahoe Basin or Breckenridge if you like. No need to rent a car. Even though you'll feel like you're off the beaten path, you have full access to everything you need using Keystone's extensive free shuttle service.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Located less than 50 yards from the front door is a clubhouse that features locker rooms, showers, and an outdoor hot tub for your soaking pleasure. Towels are supplied, so you don't have to bring your room towels with you. Locker rooms mean you won't have to walk back to your condo in a wet swimsuit either.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Numerous smaller peaks are located very close by Trapper's Crossing in Keystone. Stunning views in all directions are one of the biggest features of Trapper's Crossing. Look to the East for a sweeping view of Argentine Peak and the Continental Divide. Look to the West and see glimpses of the slopes at River Run Village in Keystone.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Located about a mile East from River Run Village in Keystone, Trappers Crossing feels like it is off the beaten path, but truthfully, you still have amazingly fast access to shops, restaurants, and all the excitement of River Run Village. Don't let the extremely quiet solitude fool you.

Property.OneLiner: This condo is nestled in a forest of spruce trees that surrounds a quiet neighborhood in East Keystone. From the quality wood workings to the spectacular views, this property will make you want to kick off your shoes and feel at home as soon as you walk in the door.
Property.RoomDescription1: Beautiful furniture, gas fireplace, flat screen HD TVS and more! Enjoy every minute of your vacation in this townhouse. Spend time on the deck and take in the amazing surroundings! Don't forget the pull-out sofa sleeper for more sleeping space!
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen is fully equipped to create everyone's favorite meals. Every dish and appliance you need to cook a fancy feast for your family and friends!
Property.RoomDescription3: The Master Bedroom comes complete with a Queen bed and private TV! The attached bath has a jetted tub. The perfect room for mom and dad!
Property.RoomDescription4: Also appointed with a beautiful Queen bed; this property is ideal for couples traveling together!
Property.RoomDescription5: There is a great hot tub located right outside at Trappers Crossing. Or if you want to venture out to River Run Village, you also have access to the pool and hot tubs at the Dakota Lodge Building.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Located on the ground floor in Trapper's Crossing, this property has breathtaking views of the surrounding forests and mountains. This townhouse is fully furnished with everything you'll need to enjoy your winter or summer vacation in the Colorado Rockies! Trappers Crossing is one of the nicest and privately located places in Keystone.

Property.OneLiner: Looking for walk-to-slopes convenience, easy access, and a breathtaking view? Welcome to Oro Grande Lodge in Keystone Resort! This 1 bedroom features a \"Wilderness View\" that is breathtaking and private.
Property.RoomDescription1: Kick back and relax with the fireplace and TV in this cozy space. The living room has a colorful view beyond the balcony to the great outdoors of CO!
Property.RoomDescription2: This fully equipped kitchen is spacious and has plenty of counter space for preparing and cooking your favorite meals! The adjacent dining area has seating for 6.
Property.RoomDescription3: This bedroom features a Queen bed, large dresser with an attached mirror and TV/DVD player to help you relax after a full day on the slopes! The window provides a view of the North side of the valley.
Property.RoomDescription4: Complete with a full size gas grill, you will love spending time on your private deck! Enjoy your secluded retreat with views of Aspen trees and the surrounding mountains.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Oro Grande #315 is a large 1 bedroom ski vacation condo with great amenities and quality furnishings. The open layout allows your group plenty of space to socialize and relax. With breathtaking views from your 3rd floor balcony and a private grill, you'll fall in love with Oro Grande in Keystone Colorado!
Property.FeatureDescription1: Get a few laps in, or splash around with the kids. This pool is perfect for enjoying some down time. The hot tub is a great way to relax those sore muscles.
Property.FeatureDescription2: What a bonus - no scrapping ice required! The underground garage will keep your car snow free.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Oro Grande Lodge has a full view of the surrounding mountains. Look to the West and see Buuufalo and Red Mountains. Look to the East for a breathtaking view of the Continental Divide.
Property.FeatureDescription4: No need to fight traffic! This building is just a short walk to the slopes. If you like, you can hop on the shuttle and be dropped off right at the lifts.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Conveniently located a short distance from Mtn View Plaza, you will love the shopping and dining opportunities! Fine Mexican dining at Dos Locos Mexican Grill, or eat some of the best steak you've ever had at the Snake River Saloon.

Property.OneLiner: Oro Grande Lodge Condominiums in Keystone Resort Colorado. This large two bedroom unit has sleeping for eight and offers a real value for your money. Overlooking the wetlands and with a great mountain view range it is going to go fast so book today!
Property.RoomDescription1: Plan on cooking some meals to cut down on your vacation costs? You will be able to do that here, this fully equipped kitchen has everything your family chef will need! The open floor plan will also keep the chef in the conversation and with breakfast bar seating I wouldn't be surprised if there are some willing helpers.
Property.RoomDescription2: This corner bedroom has views of the preserved wetlands. The queen bed will welcome you home after long day on the slopes, with a full private bathroom there is also plenty of storage space in the closet.
Property.RoomDescription3: This second bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed and a trundle pull out single. The kids will love calling this home.
Property.RoomDescription4: Wind down with a glass of wine and kick your feet up. Enjoy the flat screen TV and a play station 2. After a day of great powder skiing and riding, soaking in the hot tubs, you can look out at the mountain range and relax! Book your Keystone Condominium online now!
Property.RoomDescription5: The fitness room is located right across the hall, perfect for a morning work out and stretch before hitting the slopes!
Property.RoomDescription6: The owners have created a library of music and books for your pleasure. Feel free to use them and enjoy yourselves in the ski condo.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Oro Grande Lodge #205 in Keystone Resort Colorado, this condominium is perfect for the large family or a couple who wants extra space. With the corner facing the preserved wetland and the mountain range in the backdrop, the views are second to none. Sleep 8 comfortably and enjoy the modern features of a high end hotel with the added plus of having your own kitchen!

Property.OneLiner: If you are looking for a great place for your Keystone Colorado Vacation you have found it. Full kitchen, sleeping for 5, pool, parking garage, and more!
Property.RoomDescription1: With a comfortable custom log frame queen bed and room to spread out you will enjoy the large space here in Oro Grande Lodge. You can also look over to the mountains from the bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen at Oro Grande 302 is fully stocked for your Keystone Vacation. With a full sized kitchen, oven, microwave and pots and pans you are ready to put a meal together for your family!
Property.RoomDescription3: A cozy gas fireplace, room to relax, and a private balcony you will enjoy the time you have in here! The couch pulls out into a queen sofa sleeper and there is a convert able chair that folds down into a single, great for a child.
Property.RoomDescription4: With a large wood table you will have space to bring everyone together for a nice warm meal.

With views of the Mountain House ski slopes and easy access to the ski slopes, hiking, biking and all of the things to do in Keystone! This well decorated condominium is perfect for your Keystone Vacation!

Property.OneLiner: Are you looking for an affordable, well appointed and centrally located vacation home for your next trip to Colorado? Look no further than this great two bedroom condo at the Oro Grande Lodge in Keystone where you will enjoy quality furnishings, a great indoor pool and hot tub, easy access to the free shuttle route and plenty of restaurant options within walking distance as well!
Property.RoomDescription1: This vacation condo kitchen is fully equipped so you can make all your favorite meals. Features granite counter tops, updated appliances and plenty of cookware and utensils.
Property.RoomDescription2: The vaulted ceilings throughout this home are one of the best features. The combination of high ceilings, warm colors, gas fireplace and a comfortable couch make for an inviting space to enjoy some rest and relaxation. The queen sleeper sofa provides additional sleeping while the gas fireplace and the flat screen TV are features the whole group can enjoy.
Property.RoomDescription3: Seating at the beautiful dark wood dining table and the adjacent breakfast bar allows for 7 people to comfortably sit down for a meal together.
Property.RoomDescription4: Featuring a full attached bathroom, private TV and a comfortable Queen bed, this Master bedroom is a great place to settle in after exploring the great outdoors of Keystone, CO!
Property.RoomDescription5: Complete with flat screen TV and DVD player, Queen bed and plenty of storage. Get settled into your cozy vacation getaway.
Property.RoomDescription6: This is the perfect place to kick back and watch the sunset! Take advantage of the table and chairs on your private balcony for some quality time drinking in the views. From the 4th floor vantage point, your views of the mountains to the west of Keystone is completely unobstructed.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Your group will love this 2 bed Oro Grande vacation condo! Centrally located on the North side of Keystone, you are only a short shuttle ride from the lifts and restaurants of Keystone. Oro Grande #401 is a beautiful vacation condo with amazing view from the 4th floor, sleeping for 6 adults and an indoor pool and hot tub!

Property.OneLiner: Located in the heart of River Run Village, Dakota Lodge is one of the most amenity-rich places in Keystone. Featuring the largest outdoor pool and hot tub area along with steam room and more, everyone in your group is sure to be happy.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Located in the heart of River Run, Dakota Lodge is the most amenity rich complex in the Keystone's River Run Village. Featuring a full size outdoor heated pool that is open year-round and 2 outdoor hot tubs, Dakota Lodge is the place to stay!
Property.RoomDescription1: This well stocked kitchen is just right for creating healthy meals for before, during and after your day of play. The dining room table seats six so your group can enjoy a few quiet dinners in.
Property.RoomDescription2: A comfortable sofa bed and two arm chairs face the large stone fireplace and the super nice Flat Screen HD TV and DVD player. This is an excellent pace to gather the family to talk about the day's adventures! Spacious and roomy for everyone.
Property.RoomDescription3: Furnished with two chairs and a table, this balcony can't be beat for enjoying a refreshing drink while you watch the crowds down below. If people watching gets old, take in the view of the slopes and all of the peaks surrounding Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription4: The charming rustic decor and king size bed make this Dakota Lodge bedroom all the more inviting after a day of Colorado outdoors. Spoil yourself by lingering in bed an extra few minutes. The attached full bath includes dual sinks and a built- in hair dryer.
Property.RoomDescription5: The log pine queen size bed adds to the western ambiance of this unit. Enjoy views of the slopes even while lying in bed!
Property.RoomDescription6: Unlike many other cramped condos in River Run Village, this property has a separate dining area and table with seating for 6. No more eating on the sofa or standing up...there is plenty of space for everyone.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Located in River Run, Dakota Lodge #8518 is close to everything! Within walking distance of the lifts, restaurants and shopping, your vacation will actually feel like a vacation. This two bedroom unit is stocked with everything you need for a fun filled Colorado getaway.
Property.FeatureDescription1: Dakota features the largest outdoor pool in all of River Run Village. With breathtaking views of the ski slopes and mountains, the whole family will enjoy the fun the pool area has to offer.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Located in the court yard, there 2 huge outdoor hot tubs with space for about 12 people. Sit back and take in the view of the ski lopes at Keystone Resort while soaking in the hot tub any time of year. There is also a dry sauna located inside the clubhouse near the pool.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Just a few minutes from the gondola at River Run Village, Dakota Lodge offers walk to slopes convenience. It's easy with small kids and you won't have to try to find parking or pay for parking any closer.
Property.FeatureDescription4: No worries with having to scrape snow and ice off of your car. The underground heated garage offers plenty of parking for the duration of your stay.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Interested in going to the Lakeside Village for a great dining experience and don't want to worry about driving? Hop onto the shuttle bu that stops right outside the property and you'll be there in no time. Easy access throughout Keystone Resort is accessible by bus year-round.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Located in the heart of River Run Village, Dakota lodge has easy access to many things to do in Keystone. Just outside is a kids play area and mini-golf for the whole family. Countless other activities are just a few steps away.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Wireless high-speed internet access is available in this condo so you can stay in touch.

Property.OneLiner: River Run Village is the center for Keystone's main events, best shopping and dining and offers easy slopesaccess with the gondola just steps away from where you stay. At Dakota Lodge 8491 you are right in the heart of River Run where you can enjoy the convenient location, the beautiful outdoor pool and hot tub, underground garage parking and more!
Property.RoomDescription1: Throw a pizza in the oven and kick back in your comfy clothes after a long day of shredding the slopes. This condo has a full sized to do just that. Also equipped with the dishes and utensils needed to do more creative cooking, you can take it easy on your budget and eat-in whenever you like.
Property.RoomDescription2: With seating for 5, everyone can enjoy a meal together or gather 'round for a game of cards.
Property.RoomDescription3: The comfortable sofa sits in front of the cozy fireplace. Pull out the sofa and sleep on the high quality memory foam mattress. Enjoy your favorite ski DVD on a giant flat screen TV to inspire you for the day ahead or just sit back and enjoy the view - either way you'll feel right at home in this cozy living room. The Living Room is also stocked with games and books for entertainment or relaxation.
Property.RoomDescription4: If you're looking for a place to relax in privacy, the Master bedroom offers an inviting King size bed, a private TV and an attached full bathroom. There is closet and dresser space so unpack your things and settle in for a vacation you'll never forget!
Property.RoomDescription5: Two twin beds in the Guest bedroom make this a great room for kids or single travelers to share. The Guest bathroom is adjacent.
Property.RoomDescription6: You have a clear view from this covered balcony. Bundle up and watch the ice skaters, mini-golfers or just enjoy the mountain view in the background. The high mountain air brings crystal blue skies and brilliant stars, all of which you'll see perfectly from this balcony.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Offering 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with comfortable sleeping for 6 adults, Dakota Lodge 8491 is the perfect vacation condo for any group or family wanting to stay in River Run Village. You are just steps away from the heart of the action in Keystone; including amazing shops and restaurants, as well as the small town market for groceries and supplies. Dakota Lodge features an outdoor pool and hot tub, Put-Put Golf in the Summertime and Ice Skating in the Winter!

Property.OneLiner: Looking for a large condo with all the amenities? Quicksilver is the one for you. Enjoy the close proximity to shops, a grocery store, pool, hot tub and more.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Quick Silver is one of the most accessible properties in all of Keystone. Located near the Keystone Conference Center and the Lakeside Village, Quicksilver has easy access to shops restaurants, a small grocery store and much more.
Property.RoomDescription1: The kitchen is fully stocked with all of the extras. At nearly twice the size of most condo kitchens, there is space for you to prepare even gourmet meals. There is seating for three at the breakfast bar and the dining room table seats six.
Property.RoomDescription2: This living room is spacious enough for the whole family to enjoy lounging around after a day of play. The huge sectional is also a full sized sleeper sofa. With a TV, VCR and DVD player, you can enjoy your favorite movies while you stay toasty warm near the gas fireplace.
Property.RoomDescription3: The king sized bed and attached bathroom make this master bedroom a perfect retreat. With windows that look down onto the living room, you can participate in the conversation below.
Property.RoomDescription4: This room is perfect for the kids, with a twin over full bunk bed. The view of the pines makes it impossible to forget that you are in the Colorado Rockies. Just off of the bedroom is a bathroom with dual sinks
Property.RoomDescription5: A large patio equipped with a Weber grill allows for outdoor cooking and entertaining in the shade of the tall pines.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Only a mile from the gondola and nestled among the tall pines, this Quicksilver condo provides both privacy and convenience! With a large patio, this condo allows you to easily get outdoors and enjoy the fresh mountain air.
Property.FeatureDescription1: You will appreciate the ski storage at the bottom of the stairs. No lugging your skis into the condo!
Property.FeatureDescription2: The tall pines surrounding Quick Silver remind you that you are in the Colorado Rockies. Through the trees you can see distance snow capped peaks any time of year.
Property.FeatureDescription3: The conference Center is within walking distance from the Quicksilver complex. If you are in town for a seminar, what better way to start the day than a short walk through the woods?
Property.FeatureDescription4: No need to drive to Dillon to pick up some milk for the morning. This convenient grocery and liquor store is within walking distance of the condo.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Enjoy a short walk along the pathways that lead to Lakeside Village. Keystone Lake is surrounded by restaurants and shopping. In the summer, enjoy canoeing and paddle boating, in the winter the lake becomes an ice skating arena.

Property.OneLiner: You have found it! This can be your home away from home, room for the whole family, great location, beautifully furnished and serves as a great base camp for your Keystone Vacation. Quicksilver #1660 is by far one of the nicest rental properties in Keystone so come and enjoy it.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Quick Silver is one of the most accessible properties in all of Keystone. Located near the Keystone Conference Center and the Lakeside Village, Quicksilver has easy access to shops restaurants, a small grocery store and much more. The free shuttle stop is just at the edge of the property and the bus comes by every 20 minutes.
Property.RoomDescription1: This kitchen is fantastic - granite counter tops provide plenty of room to cook a holiday meal. Features a full range, oven, microwave, and all the tools necessary to prepare a feast for your group. The kitchen overlooks the dining room and is connected by a breakfast bar.
Property.RoomDescription2: Pull up your leather dining room chair to this new rich wood table and enjoy a nice meal before and after your mountain activities. The table seats six and is next to a breakfast bar that will seat a couple more. Enjoy your breakfast while looking out into the peaceful woods of the mountain forest that surround you.
Property.RoomDescription3: Welcome home to this inviting living space... flip on the flat screen, start a fire and have your entire group relax in this wonderful space, seating for the whole group to share stories of your adventures of the day or to catch up with old friends. You might just enjoy dozing off while pretending to read in one of the chairs that allow you to gaze out into the peaceful pines. The living room also features a built in day bed.
Property.RoomDescription4: Step unto this balcony to breathe in the fresh mountain air. A private grill is provided. Enjoy the peaceful surroundings of Quicksilver Condo #1660.
Property.RoomDescription5: Enjoy this private retreat - Queen bed, private seating area, and beautiful views. Features a private TV, private bathroom and walk in closet.
Property.RoomDescription6: This bathroom offers his and her sinks, a full size bathtub and shower. Also plenty of room to get ready and features a built in hairdryer.
Property.RoomDescription7: This nicely decorated bedroom offers a deluxe queen bed, closet for your luggage, has additional seating, and a makeup counter with chair.
Property.RoomDescription8: This bedroom has 2 Single over Full bunk beds. A great room for the kids! Features a TV, additional seating and large closet.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Are you looking for a great 3 Bedroom rental condo in Keystone? Quicksilver 1660 will accommodate your group in style and elegance. This newly remodeled and redecorated unit offers space to spread out and get settled in. The fully functional kitchen will be a delight for the chef and the rest of the unit will provide everything else you need to call this your vacation home. Nestled back in the CO pines, you will enjoy the comfort of mountain living while being located a mile from some of the best skiing in the world. Come and stay in Quicksilver 1660 and experience today's mountain living.

Property.OneLiner: Quicksilver 1631 is in Keystone Resorts North Keystone neighborhood. This beautiful 2 bedroom condo has comfortable sleeping for up to 8 adults and plenty or room for your things too. Nice views, indoor pool and hot tub, and easy access to the Keystone conference center make this one of our most popular vacation rentals in Keystone Colorado!
Property.RoomDescription1: With floor to vaulted ceiling windows to let in the Colorado sunshine, you and your family will love relaxing in this spacious living room. Gathered around the large fire place or settled down to watch a movie, there is plenty of comfortable seating for everyone.
Property.RoomDescription2: With a table that seats at least six and seating for two more at the nearby breakfast bar, this vacation condo is the perfect place to gather for a meal.
Property.RoomDescription3: Recently updated, this fully equipped kitchen provides everything you need to make a meal for the family or a quick snack to go. The beautiful granite counter tops are just one more top notch element in this home.
Property.RoomDescription4: The bedroom on the main floor has a king sized bed and plenty of storage so you can get easily unpacked and settled in. And what better way to take in Keystone and your Colorado vacation experience than to wake up to the forest right outside the large picture windows!
Property.RoomDescription5: Located on the top floor of the condo the Master bedroom has a queen bed as well as two twin beds which means there is somewhere for everyone to sleep! High ceilings, a large floor plan and plenty of storage assure that you won't feel crowded in this huge bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription6: Nothing says mountain vacation like grilling out on the back deck and that is exactly what you'll be doing at this great condo. With a private gas grill on the large patio, your Keystone experience will be complete. Any season of the year you'll love having the outdoors just steps from your living room!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: When it comes to choosing a vacation home for your visit to Keystone, look no further than this conveniently located, spacious condo at Quicksilver #1631. Find your way to everything that Keystone has to offer by taking a stroll to the local grocery store or down to the nearby lake. Only 1 mile from the gondola you are only a minute by car or free shuttle to the slopes. Come home at the end of the day and soak in the hot tub and you've got yourself a Colorado home away from home!

Property.OneLiner: For a great combination of value, amenities and location look no further than Quicksilver #1608. This two bedroom is just minutes from the slopes, on the free shuttle route, walking distance to a grocery store and it also has a hot tub just to assure there is is nothing more you could want when you stay her\\e on your next mountain vacation!
Property.RoomDescription1: Find yourself gathered here around the fire and enjoying the flat screen TV as you unwind from a long day on the slopes. Two people can comfortably sleep on the queen sleeper sofa and everyone can find a place to get cozy when it's movie time for the family. The windows floor to ceiling have a great lawn and mountain view from here.
Property.RoomDescription2: If you are planning to cook in a few meals you will find everything you need for planning a meal with ease in this fully stocked kitchen. The counter has an attached breakfast bar and opens up into the main room which keeps everyone together no matter who gets clean up duty after dinner.
Property.RoomDescription3: Near the kitchen you will find a dedicated dining area with great window light as well as patio access. The table which comfortably seats four is perfect for gathering around a meal or a board game. No need to choose - you can do both during your relaxing vacation here.
Property.RoomDescription4: When you walk into this Master Bedroom it's a debate whether you will be drawn most to the beautiful vaulted ceilings and multiple windows or if you will center immediately on the inviting King sized bed. With an attached full bathroom this bedroom will welcome you home at the end of the day with rest in the large bed and send you off in the morning with warm daylight coming in the large windows.
Property.RoomDescription5: This room is a great place for the kids to stay. Two twin size beds provide sleeping and there is plenty of storage for their things in the chest of drawers and wall length shelving. This room is on the corner of the building and has great forest views from the windows on either side of the room. There is also a private TV in this room for when someone needs a little private getaway to relax in.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
This two bedroom condo at Quicksilver #1608 is great for any group or family. There is enough room for 6 people to sleep in beds and the floor plan is very spacious at 1400sq feet.
You will love the landscaping and forest view surrounding the property, the vaulted ceilings, the walk out patio and everything else this condo has to offer.
Its the perfect place to call your home away from home on your next Keystone vacation!

Property.OneLiner: Rent this great 1 bedroom ground floor oversized condo in North Keystone, just a short shuttle ride from the lifts and close to everything it is the perfect getaway in both the summer and winter.
Property.RoomDescription1: The tiled entryway has enough room to remove your shoes and boots after a long day on the hill.
Property.RoomDescription2: The bedroom features a Queen bed with a West facing window, perfect for those mornings you want to sleep in.
Property.RoomDescription3: The dining area is adjacent to the kitchen and seats 6 people. Open the blinds and enjoy the view of Keystone Gulch!
Property.RoomDescription4: Enjoy the open layout of the kitchen with lots of granite counter space for preparing and cooking a delicious meal.
Property.RoomDescription5: In the spacious living room, you will find yourself sitting next to the cozy gas fireplace with plenty of room for the whole group!
Property.RoomDescription6: Relax with views towards Keystone Gulch and the surrounding meadow.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This phenomenal Quicksilver condo is much larger than your average 1 bedroom unit. Enjoy the over sized floor plan and ground level patio with great views towards Keystone Gulch. Comfortably sleeping 5 adults, this is the perfect location for your family getaway.

Property.RoomDescription1: This spacious entryway welcomes you back after a fun-filled day. Hang your coats on the built in tree!
Property.RoomDescription2: The living room features a plush couch, perfect to relax on while warming up by the fireplace. The large windows allow for lots of natural lighting.
Property.RoomDescription3: This second floor balcony offers a private grill and plenty of furniture to help you relax. Enjoy views of Keystone Gulch and the surrounding forest!
Property.RoomDescription4: This charming kitchen has been recently updated and includes everything you need to make your favorite meals.
Property.RoomDescription5: This includes plenty of dining space for your group. Plus you are just steps away from the balcony that continuously beckons you outdoors!
Property.RoomDescription6: In the bedroom you will find a King bed, private TV and plenty of space to get settled into!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: In this spacious 1 bedroom Quicksilver condo, there is plenty of room to get settled in and comfy! A private grill, speedy shuttle service to the slopes, and a secluded, yet convenient location are just a few great features of this mountain vacation condo.

Property.OneLiner: Soda Springs #1917 is a very large 1 bedroom unit that comfortably sleeps 4 with room to spare. Lofted ceilings, warm fireplaces, and room for everyone everywhere, you won\'t feel cramped in this well appointed rental condo.
Property.RoomDescription1: Looking for a condo with a King bed that provides the privacy you need with the space and comfort you want? You have found it! This great upper level bedroom has a private bathroom with dual vanities and full bathtub and shower.
Property.RoomDescription2: Enjoy large vaulted ceilings, a wood burning fireplace, TV and DVD with surround sound and great couches in the living room! You have a queen sofa sleeper in here and access to the balcony as well.
Property.RoomDescription3: No need to eat out for every meal when you can use this fully stocked kitchen. You'll find everything you need to prepare a feast!
Property.RoomDescription4: This dining room has plenty of space. With enough chairs for six people, everyone can sit down for a warm meal or maybe even a game of cards!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Enjoy the luxury of one of the largest one bedroom condos in Keystone. Plenty of space, comfortable furnishings, great location, and easy shuttle access to the slopes makes this your perfect Keystone vacation getaway!

Property.OneLiner: This quaint and extremely well decorated property at Soda Springs is sure to charm! Spacious and fully equipped, there is room for the entire family without being all piled on top of each other! A perfect holiday escape!
Property.RoomDescription1: Featuring huge vaulted ceilings, a gas fireplace, and leather furniture, this room is sure to please! A queen sofa sleeper is comfortable and allows for extra sleeping space. The room is well lit from a skylight in the vaulted ceiling and from windows above the fireplace. Beautifully remodeled.
Property.RoomDescription2: The fully remodeled and modern kitchen offers everything you need to cook a full meal for your group. A serving counter opens to the dining area for easy serving and cleanup.
Property.RoomDescription3: The huge master bedroom features a King bed and flat screen TV. Very well decorated with tasteful colors and decor, this is the highlight of the entire property!
Property.RoomDescription4: The dining room is located in a seperate space just off the kitchen. A brand new Murphy bed folds down from the wall in the rear of the room for extra sleeping space. Shelves are filled with books, games, and videos.
Property.RoomDescription5: The back deck features breathtaking views of mountains and gives a secluded feel to the property. It is enjoyable to sit outside on a cool summer night or a warm winter afternoon.
Property.RoomDescription6: The Master bath is worthy of a description all it's own. Extremely well decorated and remodeled, this bath features a shower and bath along with a dual sink area that is downright beautiful. A unique rolling mirror allows for complete privacy or open view to the living room below.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This amazing remodeled condo at Soda Springs is top notch all the way! Decorated and outfitted similar to a luxury ski-in/out property, your group will not be disappointed! Over-sized and with a higher sleeping capacity than normal, everyone will have plenty of space to enjoy themselves.

Property.OneLiner: This Amazing property in the Soda Springs complex at Keystone resort is an absolute perfect mountain getaway. Ideally placed a short distance from the slopes, it is far enough away for peace and quiet but close enough so that you can easily get to everything. It\'s also right nearby the snake river for summertime fly fishing.
Property.RoomDescription1: Nice tiled entryway is spacious enough to take off your boots and shoes with ease. Ski storage is here too.
Property.RoomDescription2: As you ascend the stairs into the living room, you will love the high vaulted ceilings and spacious feel. Enjoy the gas fireplace and the TV, as well as the sleeper sofa. A small sleeper chair is available for increased sleeping capacity.
Property.RoomDescription3: As you move from the comfort of the flat screen TV and gas fireplace, you arrive in the charming dining room. The large table easily seats 6 adults.
Property.RoomDescription4: This attractive kitchen is fully stocked with all the tools necessary to cook a delicious meal for the whole group!
Property.RoomDescription5: Exit from the dining room onto the porch and you will find spectacular views towards Keystone Gulch. A private grill awaits the Grill Master of the group. View the Soda Springs Pool and Hot tub as well!
Property.RoomDescription6: On the ground floor, you will find a King Bed and a flat screen TV with an en suite bathroom. Also access to the lower level porch from here.
Property.RoomDescription7: The Guest bedroom features a Queen bed and a leather chair which converts into a sleeping space. It's perfect for a small family that needs to share a room.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Beautiful 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom property in Soda Springs with wonderful views of the Keystone Gulch. A very spacious, unique property with a private entrance and private grill on the upper deck.

Property.OneLiner: The Timbers is Keystone\'s most exclusive building. Enjoy the convenience of ski in, ski out in a luxury condo with all of the upgrades. Spend one night here and you will never stay anywhere else in Keystone Colorado again.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Located at the base of the resort and one of only two ski-in/ski-out properties in Keystone, the Timbers is exceptional in every way. Property amenities include an indoor/outdoor pool, hot tub, fire pit and dining area. In addition, the Timbers is within walking distance of shopping and restaurants. A heated driveway and sidewalks allow you to stroll around the property without fear of slipping on the ice.
Property.RoomDescription1: Why wait in line for bad ski lodge food when you can ski right to your unit at the Timbers and enjoy a gourmet sandwich that you prepared before heading out in the morning. This amazing kitchen has stainless appliances, granite counter tops, and a gas range. The breakfast bar seats two and the kitchen table seats four. The stick alder chairs and barstools are handmade, giving this unit a uniquely Colorado ambiance.
Property.RoomDescription2: The ten foot ceilings add to the spaciousness of this over sized one bedroom condo in the Timbers. A comfortable leather sofa and cozy chair are placed right in front of the fireplace and 37" LCD flat screen TV and DVD player. Don't worry - the view of the snow falling through the trees will keep you motivated to hit the slopes instead of watching TV all day. A queen sized Murphy bed in the living provides extra sleeping space, with the comfort of a real mattress instead of a sofa sleeper.
Property.RoomDescription3: The large furnished patio at Timbers 3058 is the perfect place to relax with a cup of hot chocolate. Grab your warmest ski parka because you will absolutely love peering through the tall pines and breathing in the fresh Keystone air.
Property.RoomDescription4: This queen sized bed is about as comfortable as it gets! Spend the day skiing Keytone hard, but remember you have an amazingly comfortable room to return to at night. With a flat screen TV and DVD player in the bedroom, you might just want to head to bed a little earlier than usual. The attached master bath with dual sinks and a jetted tub will be your own private retreat in Timbers when your ready to call it a day.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: The Timbers 3058 is one of Keystone's premier units. Ski in ski out, incredible views and amenities such as a heated outdoor/indoor pool, waterfall, hot tub and a fire pit make this one of the most sought after slope side units in the rockies! Perfect for a honeymoon, or a vacation for those who enjoy the finer things in life!
Property.FeatureDescription1: No need for lugging your equipment around River Run. When you stay at the Timbers, life is simple! Just minutes from the gondola, you have every advantage for getting first tracks in the morning. There is even a bridge across the property allowing you to ski directly to the building.
Property.FeatureDescription2: The only parking available at the Timbers is under the building. Since this condo is ski-in ski-out, you dont need to worry about driving anywhere or scraping ice from your car windows. However, if you do want to drive somewhere, youll be able to get into a warm car.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Among the best features for you is luxury indoor/outdoor pool and hot tub. Situated right at the base of the slopes, you can watch all the action on the mountain while sitting in the hot tub. If the outdoor pool is a bit too chili, just swim into the indoor part. The patio itself is heated, so you dont need to worry about walking through any snow or cold tile to or from your condo.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Just walk over the bridge and you'll be in River Run within just a few minutes. River Run has lots of shops and restaurants to appease any person or appetite. Lone Eagle is located slightly away from the crowds and noise of River Run Village, but you'll be in the middle of the action during the daytime and night time ski sessions.

Property.OneLiner: Timbers 3067 is a premier two bedroom condo in one of Keystone Resort\'s only true ski-in/ski-out locations. Relax in this luxurious Colorado vacation home on your next visit and don\'t forget to check out the beautiful indoor/outdoor pool!
Property.RoomTitle7: Third Full Bath and Private Laundry
Property.RoomDescription1: Designed with entertaining in mind this kitchen offers plenty of counter space with the center island, which has seating for three, beautiful stainless steel appliances and it even has a wine rack over the sink for that special vintage you brought for the holiday! This kitchen provides all the tools you will need for a gourmet meal or a quick snack on your way out the door.
Property.RoomDescription2: Throughout this home there is a distinct attention to detail and stylish decorating. Custom painting on the walls and several pieces of original artwork are the perfect compliment to the wood floors, stone hearth and soft lighting. Add the flat screen TV and the french doors opening onto the private patio and you may never want to leave. It's the complete luxury getaway you're looking for!
Property.RoomDescription3: Offering warm overheard lighting and seating for four the dining area makes a perfect setting for a cozy dinner in for the evening.
Property.RoomDescription4: Stroll out the french doors first thing in the morning and take in the view! Looking over top of the adjacent forest to the mountains on the north side of the Snake River Valley this balcony will be flooded with light in the morning. Complete with an additional dining table for 4 a cup of Summit Cove's signature blend coffee and the fresh mountain air will be the perfect start to any day!
Property.RoomDescription5: Featuring an irresistibly comfortable king sized bed, an additional TV and a private balcony the master bedroom at Timbers #3067 really shows off the added value of a corner unit by having windows on two sides of the room which provides beautiful natural light all day long. The master bathroom attached offers a jacuzzi tub and mural artwork inside.
Property.RoomDescription6: With another complete bathroom and a queen sized bed this second master bedroom is a cozy haven to retreat to at the end of a long day playing in the snow. Including a TV, plenty of closet space and an inviting decor this is a room to look forward to waking up in.
Property.RoomDescription7: The hallway is where you will find an additional full bathroom, perfect for guests when entertaining, and a private, stacked washer and dryer closet which is wonderful for drying wet gloves or washing your ski gear before you go out again the next day. Don't be afraid to pack light, you can wash while you're here!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Staying at Timbers #3067 will provide an unforgettable experience with luxury and convenience unparalleled anywhere else in Keystone. Your vacation will leave nothing to be desired as you enjoy the one of a kind indoor/outdoor pool, the outdoor hot tub and the true ski-in/ski-out lobby access. While making yourself at home in this tastefully decorated two bedroom and three bathroom condo you're sure to want to return here year after year!

Property.OneLiner: Need that special place with high sleeping capacity and a location that is sure to please everyone? This is it! Located right off the River Golf Course in Keystone, Colorado there is easy access to bike paths, hiking trails, horse riding and more.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: This private home on the golf course is loaded with extras! The private hot tub, gourmet kitchen, two car garage and butler's pantry make this home a perfect choice if you are traveling with a group or extended family.
Property.RoomDescription1: This spacious living room is just the place for an after dinner game of "Pictionary" near the wood burning fireplace. If you're not feeling creative, put a Warren Miller movie in the DVD player and get ready for your day at Keystone! The sleeper sofa adds extra sleeping space to accommodate your group. The view to the West reminds you of why you choose this Colorado vacation home.
Property.RoomDescription2: The butler's pantry makes it easy to entertain in this home! Prepare martinis with ease. A gourmet kitchen with all of the upgrades is perfect for preparing that special meal. With granite counter tops, a gas range and built in microwave, you will want to dine in for a couple nights. The kitchen table seats four and is right next to the two sided wood burning fireplace. The dining room table seats six and has views of the north, east and west. Cozy dinners are default in this home.
Property.RoomDescription3: With a gas grill and a great view of the tall spruce surrounding Keystone, grilling that steak will be a breathtaking experience!
Property.RoomDescription4: That's right, a private hot tub surrounded by tall trees! What could be better than enjoying a dip in the hot tub and watching the stars in the Colorado Rocky Mountains?
Property.RoomDescription5: This basement allows you to travel with all of your friends! Two bunk beds, each with a queen on top and queen on bottom. Plus, there is an extra twin bed provided, as if there wasn't enough sleeping space! With a built in TV/VCR, this area is self contained.
Property.RoomDescription6: Full washer and dryer allow you to pack light and wash your belongings while you vacation.
Property.RoomDescription7: This bedroom is furnished with a queen bed and has an attached bathroom as well as a small desk and chair. If you have to work, you might as well do it in a place with excellent views of the Colorado Rockies!
Property.RoomDescription8: If you have a group of kids, this room will make them feel like they have gone to summer camp! With three queen beds and one twin bed, the sleeping capacity for this room is 7! An attached bath allows your little ones to stay in their own space.
Property.RoomDescription9: A queen bed and a TV/VCR allow you to relax after a long day on the slopes. With several large windows, the view becomes part of the room. The attached bathroom is spacious and boasts dual sinks, which makes getting ready in the morning easy as can be. The windows overlook the golf course and you will see the surrounding peaks first thing in the morning.
Property.RoomDescription10: A large and gorgeous dining table fills this beautiful room In Saw Whiskers 92. Bring your family around this with a large meal during the holidays or anytime of year.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: The Saw Whiskers Home is the place to stay if you are traveling with a large group! This private home is on the golf course and features a private hot tub as well as a high sleeping capacity. With a rare wood burning fireplace, you can enjoy an authentic Colorado Winter holiday!
Property.FeatureDescription1: No scraping required! In the summertime, this is the perfect place to keep mountain bikes, fishing gear and whatever else keeps you entertained while on vacation.
Property.FeatureDescription2: This makes cooking feel more like play than work. Entertain all day long with access to an outdoor grill and butler's pantry.
Property.FeatureDescription3: So close you can see the golf balls flying! Only a short stroll to the golf course....enjoy an brisk evening walk in the summertime or strap on your cross country skis for some winter time fun
Property.FeatureDescription4: This home is located close to the bike path that leads up the Keystone Valley along the Snake River. Easy access is one of the best features of this location. Just up the road is Keystone Gulch, which allows access to numerous hiking trails and legendary mountain biking. There is even close access to the Colorado Trail!
Property.FeatureDescription5: As with any private home, the 6 person hot tub right out the back patio is sure to be a hit after a day of playing in Keystone Resort no matter what time of year.

Property.OneLiner: Looking for a quiet place for the family, but still want all of the amenities? Settlers Creek is the place for you. Nestled away from the noise of River Run, you will love the scenic views and quiet area. Access to Minnie\'s Cabin where there are hot tubs, an outdoor pool, and picnic areas is a huge plus.
Property.RoomDescription1: This modern, fully equipped kitchen features full granite counter tops, stainless steal appliances, a gas range and cherry cabinets. Even if you don't enjoy cooking, you will want to make at least one meal here just to say you did! The dining room table has seating for six, and the breakfast bar has two bar stools. A sliding door allows easy access to the patio.
Property.RoomDescription2: The large windows provide a view of the hillside directly outside. If you look close enough, you might spot foot prints of the wildlife that scamper through the yard. The gas log fireplace is surrounded by natural rock. The large sleeper sectional sofa allows everybody to enjoy a movie on the 42 inch flat screen TV. This room is also equipped with a stereo system and MP3 player.
Property.RoomDescription3: A queen bed and a flat screen t.v. allow you comfort and privacy. Take some time for yourself before joining the group. With a pack and play and a stroller stowed away in the closet, this room is fully equipped so all you have to bring is the baby!
Property.RoomDescription4: Get to the condo before everybody else in order to stake your claim on the master bedroom! The king sized bed is dressed in luxurious linens and will be irresistible after a day in the Colorado sun. The 32" flat screen TV has a built in DVD player allowing you to watch and re-watch your favorite movies. Look at the window and peer through the tall pines straight up the hill. What a sense of privacy. An attached bath with a large jetted tub, dual sinks allows you a sense of pure relaxation after an adventurous day.
Property.RoomDescription5: Enjoy dinner on the patio. Enjoy the gas grill patio furniture. Dine alfresco and take in the sights and sounds of the Keystone mountains before calling it a night.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Newly built and furnished in 2008, this townhouse will delight even the most selective guest. Remarkable upgrades make this townhouse one of the most coveted properties in Keystone.
Property.FeatureDescription1: What is more enjoyable than a day of skiing? How about an evening of swimming in a heated pool against the back drop of snow covered mountains? The hot tub is the perfect way to work out those sore muscles and enjoy a view of the stars.
Property.FeatureDescription2: This log cabin has it all! Pool tables, locker rooms, a sitting area create the perfect clubhouse located at Settler's Creek.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Settlers Creek is located about a mile to the East of the hustle and bustle of River Run Village in Keystone. It is a quieter area where you will feel like you're "away from it all", yet only minutes away are shop, restaurants, and much much more.
Property.FeatureDescription4: One of the best features of Settlers Creek is that is is located close to the Snake River. If you're a fisherman, you'll love the secret "holes" where brook trout hang out. Numerous trails and incredible views are all around.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Settlers Creek is located to the East of River Run in Keystone. There are numerous trails and history in the area. Its easy to find an old trail nearby used in the mining era of Colorado to explore on an early morning walk to make a whole day of exploring new trails. Many forest service trails are also in the area and you also have the unique ability to HIKE to Arapahoe Basin ski area, which is just over the hill to the North.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Settlers Creek has a free shuttle that runs every 30 minutes. No need to drive to the ski slopes or River Run. Just come out your door for easy pickup and you'll be on the slopes within minutes. All shuttles have ski carriers, so it's quick and easy.

Property.OneLiner: Welcome to the Mountains in Keystone Colorado. You have just found the perfect Family Getaway in Keystone Resort. This spacious 4 Bedroom will host your needs effectively and your surroundings could hardly be better.
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Settler's Creek has the feel of a secluded oasis in the Colorado Rocky Mountains, yet you are just minutes from a world class ski resort. Make sure to plan some down time during your stay so that you can appreciate the pure relaxation that such a fine complex has to offer.
Property.RoomDescription1: This exquisite kitchen will be your group's favorite spot to hang out. Walls of windows brighten the work space while preparing your gourmet meal. Everything you need to entertain is here, including a wine chiller.
Property.RoomDescription2: Kick your feet up, warm your toes by the fireplace and relax by the new Flat Screen TV. With access to a back deck from the living room, you might be called to attend a friendly snowball fight or watch the kids play in the sprawling back yard. Features a Queen sofa sleeper for added sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription3: This is the real secret in this wonderful house. Enjoy the King bed and jetted tub in your private bathroom. Open the windows and fall asleep to the sound of a babbling brook caressing its way down the mountain in your back yard. Make sure you claim this room as yours.
Property.RoomDescription4: This Queen Master room is also a real gem. With a private patio overlooking the mountains and a private bathroom, some might wonder how they got so lucky as to sleep here.
Property.RoomDescription5: This nicely appointed Queen Guest Room will welcome you into a night of restful sleep and wonderful dreams. The comfortable bed will do the trick and prepare you for another fun-filled day in the Mountains of Keystone Resort Colorado!
Property.RoomDescription6: This room offers a Twin over Queen bunk bed. This great bedroom offers plenty of space for all your luggage and sleeps up to 3 comfortably!
Property.RoomDescription7: Room to park 2 cars out of the snow in this heated garage!
Property.RoomDescription8: This home has as much to offer outside of its doors as it does inside. From the dining area, you can access the main level deck; from the living room, you can walk out to the forest facing patio; and from the Queen Master bedroom, there is private balcony access. You never have to worry about spending too much time indoors here!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Settlers Creek #6565 is your Ideal Keystone Family Vacation Getaway! Located in East Keystone, this beautiful end unit backs up to a small mountain stream with nothing but forest to surround you. With unobstructed mountain views, this townhouse will constantly amaze you.
Property.FeatureDescription1: What is more enjoyable than a day of skiing? How about an evening of swimming in a heated pool against the back drop of snow covered mountains? The hot tub is the perfect way to work out those sore muscles and enjoy a view of the stars.
Property.FeatureDescription2: This log cabin has it all! Pool tables, locker rooms, a sitting area and a gas grill create the perfect clubhouse located at Settler's Creek.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Settlers Creek is located about a mile to the East of the hustle and bustle of River Run Village in Keystone. It is a quieter area where you will feel like you're "away from it all", yet only minutes away are shop, restaurants, and much much more.
Property.FeatureDescription4: One of th best features of Settlers Creek is that is is located close to the Snake River. If you're a fisherman, you'll love the secret "holes" where brook trout hang out. Numerous trails and incredible views are all around.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Settlers Creek is located to the East of River Run in Keystone. There are numerous trails and history in the area. Its easy to find an old trail nearby used in the mining era of Colorado to explore on an early morning walk to make a whole day of exploring new trails. Many forest service trails are also in the area and you also have the unique ability to HIKE to Arapahoe Basin ski area, which is just over the hill to the North.
Property.FeatureDescription6: Settlers Creek has a free shuttle that runs every 30 minutes. No need to drive to the ski slopes or River Run. Just come out your door for easy pickup and you'll be on the slopes within minutes. All shuttles have ski carriers, so it's quick and easy.

Property.OneLiner: Settlers Creek #6503 in East Keystone at Keystone Resort. This well appointed and well furnished 3 bedroom town home is your vacation dream home in Keystone Colorado!
Property.RoomDescription1: This Settlers Creek unit has a designer living space with an open floor plan. As part of the great room, the living room flows through to the dining room and custom kitchen. The room features comfortable couches, a large flat screen TV, iPod station and a PS3. Flip the switch to the gas fireplace and reminisce about your great day in the Rocky Mountains. Welcome to life in Settlers Creek!
Property.RoomDescription2: This lovely dining area seats 10, with seating for eight at the table and two bar stools at the adjacent breakfast bar. Enjoy the great views while you dine-in with friends and family.
Property.RoomDescription3: Retreat to the private upper level of this unit for the master escape. Featuring a custom log frame King bed and a cozy fireplace. Enjoy a morning cup of coffee on the private master balcony as you plan your Keystone adventures for the day. Luxurious master bathroom has a custom glass block double shower with multiple shower heads. Don't forget your personal music collection, as the master suite also houses an iPod dock!
Property.RoomDescription4: This main floor bedroom features a Queen bed, a roomy pine armoire and Eastern views across Settlers Creek. This bedroom is three steps away from a full bathroom, complete with a granite tiled shower. Also, just down the hall are a washer and dryer in the unit.
Property.RoomDescription5: The third bedroom comfortably sleeps six. With two single-over-full bunk beds, this room is perfect for the kids or four adults. The room is kid-ready with a flat screen TV and Game Cube. The attached bathroom features a full tub, shower and dual vanity sinks.
Property.RoomDescription6: If you actually have to put in a little work time or simply want to email spectacular photos of your Keystone adventures, have a seat at the computer station; complete with high-speed internet access, plug-in monitor and printer.
Property.RoomDescription7: This over sized single-car garage provides plenty of storage for your gear at the end of your Rocky Mountain day. Nice extra touches: spare fishing poles and swim noodles for the kids. The pool is less than a minute's walk away and river fishing is easily accessible.
Property.RoomDescription8: This Settlers Creek Townhouse has a custom designed gourmet kitchen, large enough for multiple cooks. There are stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and plenty of storage. Stocked with all the kitchenware you will need to prepare wonderful meals for your family and friends.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Settlers Creek #6503 in Keystone Resort, Colorado. This Settlers Creek 3 bedroom, 3 level townhouse is located in one of the loveliest spots in Keystone! This beautiful townhouse features hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, custom showers and upscale rustic decor. When you are finished playing outside, entertain yourself with all the little extras - a large flat screen TV, Game Cube, Play Station 3 and fully equipped computer desk with wireless internet access. Shuttle available to anywhere in Keystone Resort!

Property.RoomDescription1: This Settlers Creek townhouse offers a gourmet kitchen for the chef. With upgraded appliances and lots of space, you can easily prepare your group's favorite meals!
Property.RoomDescription2: Enjoy your secluded getaway in the CO mountains! Your group will love the comforts of this Settlers Creek vacation rental. Unwind in this comfy space while warming up by the fireplace. Catch a sports game or watch a movie with your family on the flat screen TV!
Property.RoomDescription3: Settlers Creek has amazing amenities, especially in the master bedrooms. Vaulted ceilings in this King Master give it great light and lots of space. It opens to a beautiful and spacious bathroom complete with jetted tub and walk in shower.
Property.RoomDescription4: This bunk bedroom has a comfortable single over full bed, great for a group of people looking for separate beds. This room can also double as an office. Get some work done in comfort on the office desk.

Property.OneLiner: This Setters Creek unit in Keystone Resort Colorado is perfect for your family vacation. Right across the street from Minnies Cabin you can stroll over and soak in the hot tub or lounge in the pool. Great layout for kids with the bunk room plenty of room for everyone.
Property.RoomDescription1: You will be reminded why you chose this gorgeous town home when you step into the Master Bedroom. You will find yourself wanting to jump into this welcoming bed and turning on the flat screen TV. This bedroom features a full size jetted tub, dual vanity sinks, and loads of space. You can also catch a nice secluded view of Setters Creek.
Property.RoomDescription2: The kids and friends will love this bedroom. Two sets of comfy twin bunks will hold the whole group. And the beds are comfy enough for any adult as well. These beds are welcoming after a day of exploring the mountains or swimming in the pool. Settlers Creek 6516 features another full size bathroom right outside the door to this great bunk room.
Property.RoomDescription3: This upscale kitchen comes complete with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and all the tools necessary to prepare meals, cocktails and more. The open floor plan of this Settlers Creek kitchen allows the cooks to be included in the great conversation of the day's fishing trip, bike ride, or fresh powder turns! You will love it here.
Property.RoomDescription4: After a long day, there is not a better spot to relax. This Settlers Creek unit has leather furniture, thick carpet and rugs, and great lighting. Enjoy a good movie on the large Flat Screen with a blu ray player and 5.1 Dolby Digital HD Surround Sound!!! If music is more your taste, just use your iPhone to connect to the airplay system.
Property.RoomDescription5: Meals are a great way to bring everyone together and this table is your meeting place. Lots of room, comfortable chairs and great lighting will make your meals even more enjoyable.

Property.OneLiner: This private home is the top platinum of offerings anywhere in Keystone. One of the very few private homes in River Run Village with walk-to-slopes access. Newly constructed and features galore - this is THE PLACE!
Property.RoomDescription1: This beautiful kitchen is not just for looks. With granite counter tops, dual sinks, double ovens, convection oven, six burner gas range, custom full size appliances, and enough space to create your culinary masterpiece, it is built to perform. With the built in wine cooler and access to the patio, entertaining is a breeze.
Property.RoomDescription2: Keystone Retreat offers your party a multitude of areas to relax in. Our favorite however, is the Game Room; a perfect space to accommodate a variety of needs and pleasures. It is large enough to hold a cocktail reception, yet cozy enough for a friendly game of poker. The wet bar is ideal for serving refreshments after a successful day of hitting the slopes or for celebrating your business achievements. In this living room you might try catching the game on the large flat screen TV or reading a book by the fireplace. The sofa also pulls out into a queen size bed.
Property.RoomDescription3: A luxurious main floor master bedroom offers accommodations fit for royalty. A private gas fireplace and flat screen television are within view from the comfortable king sized bed. This sanctuary is complete with a lavish bathroom including a couple's shower with dual shower heads, a deep bathtub, granite counter tops, cherry cabinets, and radiant in-floor heating. The walk in closet can accommodate your entire wardrobe.
Property.RoomDescription4: This loft bedroom is huge. Four single beds await the weary traveler. This room offers incredible views not only of the beautiful scenery, but also of the impressive vaulted ceilings and rich, wood beam work. There is plenty of additional space to hold all of your belongings and a TV to watch your favorite shows!
Property.RoomDescription5: Make sure you get in early to call this master bedroom your own! This room features a king sized bed, a flat screen television, and its own private bath. This master bedroom is the closest to the game room and the outdoor hot tub!
Property.RoomDescription6: This beautifully furnished guest bedroom has a queen sized bed. It is located in the downstairs sleeping area, which is down the hall from the game room. This bedroom is connected to a jack and jill bathroom; perfect for parents or nannies caring for small children.
Property.RoomDescription7: The kids will be excited to call this room their own. There are two single beds and space for games and toys. This bedroom is connected to a jack and jill bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription8: Beautiful stone work adorns the over sized fireplace. The considerable amount of space available is perfect for large gatherings. There is plenty of seating for your group to collaborate, share ideas, or to enjoy your stories of great mountain adventures. Conveniently located from the entry way and the kitchen, this room is calling for your reception. The room is complete with vaulted ceilings, custom wood beam work, and breathtaking Keystone Resort Mountain views.
Property.RoomDescription9: Choose from several Keystone Retreat dining areas. The grand wood, formal dining table comfortably seats eight and is conveniently located near the breakfast bar, which seats four additional diners. During the summer you can also enjoy dining in the mountains on your upper level patio dining table. Downstairs there is room for ten more.
Property.RoomDescription10: There are three full bathrooms (attached to the master bedrooms upstairs and down stairs, and a connecting Jack and Jill bathroom downstairs) and two half bathrooms (off the kitchen on the main floor and off the game room downstairs).

The retreat is located in the Heart of keystone, River Run Village, where you can walk to restaurants, shops, and the Gondola, but it will be hard to bring yourself to leave the luxury you will find inside. You have found the hidden gem of Keystone!

Property.RoomDescription1: A King sized bed is located on a raised area above the living room. An extremely large closet behind the bed area allows everyone to stow luggage and gear out of the way of the living area. A folding free-standing screen allows for some privacy between the bed area and living areas.
Property.RoomDescription2: The sunken living room is extremely spacious and features a Queen sofa sleeper. A Colorado vacation condo would not be complete without a wood burning fireplace. An ample supply of wood is outside. Views in all directions will make you extend your stay.
Property.RoomDescription3: Unlike most studio condos, this full sized kitchen iscomplete with microwave, full range and oven, dishwasher and more. Another reason this studio resembles a 1 bedroom condo.
Property.RoomDescription4: The most unique feature of this unit is the separate dining area. Say goodbye to eating on the sofa. Sit down and dine with amazing views of mountains, ski slopes, and Keystone Lake.
Property.RoomDescription5: Montezuma condos are surrounded by mature, tall pines, shading the windows and patios, but still allowing for amazing views of the surrounding mountains and lake. The outside patio is literally the picture-perfect place to drink your morning coffee and take in the sheer beauty of Keystone Resort!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Montezuma #1769 is by far the largest studio condo in our inventory. You'll be amazed at how much space you have. It is not your typical compact ski condo. Enjoy all of the benefits of a full kitchen, separate dining area, King size bed, spacious living room and monster closet! Don't forget the wrap-around windows for full mountain and lake views!
Property.FeatureDescription1: Situated right next to Keystone Lake, Montezuma has amazing views from East to West with Keystone Lake in the foreground. The best part is all the fun surrounding Keystone Lake. From paddle boats and kayaks in the summer to ice skating in the winter, you will always have something to do besides ski.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Take a quick stroll around the 5 acre Keystone Lake area and you'll find numerous shops and restaurants in the area. No need to get in the car and drive....everything you need is right here.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Getting to the ski slopes is easy with the free ski shuttle that stops right in front of Montezuma condos. Show you key card, hop on and you'll be there in no time.
Property.FeatureDescription4: The free shuttle that stops in front of Montezuma year round will take you wherever you want to go. If you have already eaten at all the places around the Lakeside Village in Keystone, it's easy to get to places like Mountain House or River Run without having to drive or park.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Getting to the ski slopes is easy with the free ski shuttle that stops right in front of Montezuma condos. Show you key card, hop on and you'll be there in no time.
Property.FeatureDescription6: With direct views of the ski slopes, Keystone Lake and the Continental Divide, Montezuma condos offer some of the best views in all of Keystone. Literally 360 degrees all around the building is nothing but Colorado Mountain Beauty!
Property.FeatureDescription7: The Keystone Conference Center is just a quick walk underneath US Hwy 6. This property is one of the best located properties if you are attending any conference or meeting in Keystone Resort.

Property.OneLiner: You might be attending a conference in Keystone or just on vacation with your family. Either way, be prepared for easy access to tons of fun and views that will downright amaze during any season in Keystone Colorado!
Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Montezuma Condos are located on the East side of Keystone Lake and feature breathtaking views of the Continental Divide, Keystone Lake and the impressive ski slopes of Keystone. You'll find fun everywhere you look at Montezuma since it is located close to just about everything you would ever need
Property.RoomDescription1: When you first walk in, you'll be stunned with the high vaulted ceilings and spacious living room. The large, picture window allows natural lighting and amazing views of the ski slopes and Keystone Lake. Just a bit further in the distance is a direct view of Tenmile Mountain Range. Cozy up to the wood-burning fireplace and relax...this is home!
Property.RoomDescription2: The fully equipped kitchen is open to the huge living room and supplies everything you need to cook a full meal. Serving food is a breeze at the breakfast bar.
Property.RoomDescription3: The outside deck is one of the biggest we have seen in Keystone. There is plenty of room for everyone to sit back and take in the views of Keystone Lake and the ski slopes. A gas grill is supplied, and plenty of firewood is stocked on the deck.
Property.RoomDescription4: This bedroom is best described as a loft, but has it's own private bath and views that will impress anyone. Direct views of the Continental Divide and the mountains near Arapahoe Basin are downright amazing. This room features 2 single beds and shutters along the ledge to block noise from down stairs.
Property.RoomDescription5: The master bedroom features a comfortable King sized bad and views to the North. Directly across the street, the Keystone Resort Conference Center is within walking distance.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Montezuma 1766 is located close to everything; Keystone Lake, Conference Center, and shops and restaurants in Keystone Village. Soon, this will be your closely guarded secret to the best vacation spot in Colorado!
Property.FeatureDescription1: Situated right next to Keystone Lake, Montezuma has amazing views from East to West with Keystone Lake in the foreground. The best part is all the fun surrounding Keystone Lake. From paddle boats and kayaks in the summer to ice skating in the winter, you will always have something to do besides ski.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Take a quick stroll around the 5 acre Keystone Lake area and you'll find numerous shops and restaurants in the area. No need to get in the car and drive....everything you need is right here.

Property.FeatureDescription4: The free shuttle that stops in front of Montezuma year round will take you wherever you want to go. If you have already eaten at all the places around the Lakeside Village in Keystone, it's easy to get to places like Mountain House or River Run without having to drive or park.
Property.FeatureDescription5: Just steps away is the East Lake clubhouse with a large indoor heated pool, locker rooms and a hot tub. The clubhouse also has a deck that overlooks Keystone Lake and has patio furniture and a gas grill for cooking.
Property.FeatureDescription6: With direct views of the ski slopes, Keystone Lake and the Continental Divide, Montezuma condos offer some of the best views in all of Keystone. Literally 360 degrees all around the building is nothing but Colorado Mountain Beauty!

The open floor plan lends itself perfectly to a family friendly environment or a romantic couple's retreat.

You have plenty of room for sleeping two families, walk to Keystone Lake for some ice skating in the winter or for paddle boat races in the summer. If you are skiing at Keystone Resort, hop on the free ski shuttle and be on the ski slopes in minutes.

A wonderful sanctuary when you're in need of some privacy and relaxation. Get cozy and enjoy a relaxing show or movie on your own personal flat screen TV!

Property.RoomDescription6: After cooking a wonderful meal, sit down and enjoy it in the dining area. Because of its close proximity to the balcony, enjoy amazing views of the mountains while you dine!

Think of a cozy mountain cabin with rich wood furnishings, large comfortable beds and a roaring fire...you've found it!. You are a short walk from Keystone Lake, where you can paddle boat in the summer and ice skate in the winter. Or take a shuttle ride 1/2 a mile down the road and hit the slopes!

Property.OneLiner: Stay in this spacious and newly updated condo with the best view in town. Overlooking both the lake at lakeside village and the slopes, you get the best of both worlds while living in luxury at this condo!
Property.RoomDescription1: This warm and inviting living room boasts a leather couch, reclining chairs, and plenty of room for the whole family! Warm up next to the wood burning fireplace and take in the views!
Property.RoomDescription2: You will have plenty of room for everyone with seating for 6 at the dining table and overflow seating for 3 at the bar! Plenty of open space and room to spread out and enjoy your meal!
Property.RoomDescription3: Beautifully remodeled with new cabinets, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and all the amenities you could want in a kitchen! You will love cooking meals in this bright kitchen with views of the lake right out the window!
Property.RoomDescription4: This huge and luxurious bedroom has plenty of space! With a walk in closet, dresser and private bathroom access, this bedroom has all the comforts of home. Huge windows make this room bright and inviting!
Property.RoomDescription5: This porch has views that are unmatched! Look to your right to see paddle boaters in the summer and ice skaters in the winter on Keystone lake. To you left is the Mountain House base area where you can see skiers riding up the Peru lift and skiing down the mountain. Look straight ahead to see the walking/biking trail and the Snake River! You cannot beat the views from this porch!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This bright condo has it all! Newly remodeled with granite counter tops, stainless appliances, new furniture and flat screen tv's you will be living in luxury in this condo! Situated between beautiful views of the Keystone Lake and Mountain House Base area, you are close to everything! Just outside your door is paddle boating on the lake, bike riding on the bike path, and fishing on the Snake River in the summer as well as easy access to skiing in the winter!
