Property.OneLiner: Bring the whole family when you stay at this over sized one bedroom Liftside Condo. With sleeping for 7 adults and 940 square feet you will love being all together and at an easy walking distance to the chair lifts!
Property.RoomDescription1: Complete with an open breakfast bar seating two and plenty of counter space for food prep the kitchen, Liftside #204 is a great place to gather your group for a bite to eat. You'll find this condo fully functional with plenty of utensils, an oven and range, as well as a full size fridge.
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining area provides comfortable seating for six people with two additional seats at the nearby breakfast bar. Enjoy a good breakfast before heading to the slopes!
Property.RoomDescription3: It will be hard to decide what you like best about this living room. Will it be the two comfortable couches? The flat screen TV and cozy fireplace? Or will it be the floor to ceiling windows that look out over the balcony to an amazing view of the nearby slopes? The sleeper sofa and queen Murphy bed means there is sleeping for four in this room - so you can stay and decide for yourself!
Property.RoomDescription4: Are you traveling with a little one who needs a place to go to sleep early? The twin bed in addition to the king bed in the master bedroom is the perfect place for someone who likes to go to sleep early. Just one more feature that makes this one bedroom condo unique.
Property.RoomDescription5: Step outside your living room for a breathtaking view over the tops of the Mountain House Village straight to the slopes! There is patio furniture, as well as a private gas grill, making this balcony a wonderful feature to this gorgeous Keystone vacation condo!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Liftside #204 is located right in the center of the Mountain House Village and it is less than 400 yards from the slopes! At 970 square feet, this is an exceptionally spacious one bedroom condo with sleeping for 7 adults. Slope views to greet you in the morning and a hot tub to warm you at the end of the day, make this vacation home the perfect place to stay and play in Keystone!

Property.RoomDescription1: The large floor to ceiling windows facing the balcony allow you to enjoy the slopes which are in full view from the comfortable couch seating. Relax in front of the large tile hearth surrounding the fireplace and enjoy watching a DVD on the flat screen TV or pull out a board game for the whole family to play.
Property.RoomDescription2: Complete with an adjacent breakfast bar which seats 3 and a large dining table which comfortably accommodates 6 this dining area is the perfect place to gather for a home cooked meal or maybe even a great local pizza ordered in.

This is great if you've got a traveler who needs to hit the hay earlier than the rest of the group. A separate TV and plenty of storage space makes this room a comfortable retreat for anyone.

Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Third floor slope facing views of Keystone from the balcony here means you can wake up to the sight of fresh groomed tracks every morning. It's just the motivation you'll need when your muscles are sore from riding hard the day before. Looking over the surrounding Mountain House Village condos from your private balcony at Liftside #302 is just one of the things you'll love about this over sized one bedroom vacation condo.

Property.PropertyDescriptionOverview: Edgewater #1444 Condo in Keystone Resort Colorado will offer your family everything you need for your Keystone Vacation. Whether you are hear for a conference at the Keystone Conference Center or you want to go Skiing and Ice Skating with your friends and family. Edgewaters Condo Location on Keystone Lake and in Lakeside Village is second to none.
Property.RoomDescription1: This kitchen was just recently remodeled! Stainless appliances, slate floors, superautomatic espresso machine, and more! Your groups chef will appreciate the upgraded appliances and finishes in this Keystone condominium.
Property.RoomDescription2: This large bedroom has two very comfortable Queen sized beds. You will have plenty of space in here to store your luggage and spread out.
Property.RoomDescription3: This living room has great mountain views. The couch in here will fold out and sleep 2 more. If you need to relax while in Keystone enjoy the flat screen TV and the comfortable couch seating to catch up on the game or maybe a cat nap in Keystone!
Property.RoomDescription4: A great place to bring everyone together! Sit back and enjoy your company on your trip to Keystone Colorado. Book today this one will fill fast!
Property.RoomDescription5: So close to the Keystone Conference Center you could actually just walk over to your meeting! Enjoy the shops and head to your conference on your schedule not on your bus schedule!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Edgewater #1444 is located right on Keystone Lake, in Lakeside Village, Keystone Resort Colorado. This property was just remodeled and you can now enjoy this beautiful Keystone Condo!
Property.FeatureDescription1: You have full access to the Keystone Lodge's spa and pool. A highly rated Rock Resorts lodge, the spa and pool are as high end as you can get in Keystone. The Spa features a huge pool, hot tubs, a spinning studio, a full size workout facility make this amenity the best in all of Keystone.
Property.FeatureDescription2: Surrounding Keystone Lake are numerous shops and restaurants so you don't have to drive anywhere to go out to dinner or have a good time with your family or friends.
Property.FeatureDescription3: Located on the bike path that takes you to River Run Village or down the hill to the golf courses, and to Lake Dillon in the other direction. Perfectly located for a quick bike ride either direction and see all that Keystone has to offer.
Property.FeatureDescription4: Edgewater is very close to the conference center in Keystone Resort Colorado. A tunnel goes right under US Hwy 6. You'll be there in less than 1 minute walking!
Property.FeatureDescription5: During the Summer Keystone Resort lights fireworks off every Saturday night over Keystone Lake. These are AMAZING as they are set off just across the lake. You'll never see fireworks this close in your life. Simply amazing.
Property.FeatureDescription6: In the winter months, Keystone Lake becomes the largest outdoor maintained skating rink in North America. Skate rentals are located at the Keystone Adventure Center and you'll never forget the fun. The lights turn on at night, so you can skate late into the evening.
Property.FeatureDescription7: Surrounding Keystone Lake is all sorts of fun from fly fishing, paddle boats, ice skating, hiking, biking, kids play area and more. There is no shortage of things to do at the Keystone Lakeside Village.
Property.FeatureDescription8: Although The Mall is not ski-in ski-out, you have extremely close access to a free shuttle that will take you directly to the ski slopes. Just down stairs is the heated, indoor shuttle stop so you don't have to walk very far.

Property.OneLiner: Awesome 2 Bedroom 2 bath unit in the Tenderfoot lodge near mountain house at Keystone is only a short walk away from the lifts. Relax in comfort and style with your own Grill and Balcony!
Property.RoomDescription1: Kick off your boots on the tiled floors and hang up your coats on the convenient wall hooks. Welcome home!
Property.RoomDescription2: Make sure you stop by the grocery store in Dillon on your way up to Keystone. This Full Kitchen has all the amenities you need to cook a nice family dinner, including a dishwasher, stove, oven, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. There is plenty of preparation space for all of your cooking needs. PLUS, a private washer and dryer are hidden in the kitchen closet! NICE!
Property.RoomDescription3: The suede couch doubles as a sleeper sofa. Gather the group for movie night on the flat screen or relax around the gas fireplace and cozy hearth.
Property.RoomDescription4: Head out onto the deck and check out the Keystone action! Look down into the Tenderfoot courtyard at the hot tub. Or look over to the base area at the Magic Carpet and Discovery Lift!
Property.RoomDescription5: This Master Bedroom features a Queen sized bed and an En-suite full bathroom!
Property.RoomDescription6: In the second bedroom you will find a bunk bed with Single over Queen beds. Perfect for the kids or younger people of the group.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Beautiful 2 bed 2 bath condo on the second floor of the Tenderfoot Lodge. Only a short walk away from the Mountain House Base Area. Great condo for a small family!

Property.OneLiner: Tenderfoot Lodge in Keystone Resort Colorado offers you two amazing bedrooms and wonderful views of the Ski runs in the winter and the mountain river running in the summer. Enjoy walk to the slopes, and bike paths out back here at Keystone Tenderfoot Lodge 2621 Condominiums. Better than Keystone Hotels, have your own Keystone Condominium.
Property.RoomDescription1: This Queen Bed with a feather top mattress is situated perfectly in the condo. You can lay in bed and watch the skiers come down the slopes, it is a little harder to get out bed because you are so comfy in here. You also have access to the private balcony from the Master Bedroom. The private bathroom features a full size jetted tub. The master bedroom has a separate TV and VCR/DVD player in case you want to fall asleep to a good movie.
Property.RoomDescription2: With spectacular views of Buffalo Mountain and the Ten Mile Range this comfortable queen size bedroom is great for your friends or family. You have a small TV and VCR in here for putting a kids movie on so you can enjoy the living room with yourself and friends.
Property.RoomDescription3: Seating for six at this long table right in front of a couple of slope side windows. It is a great place to enjoy a warm meal after a day of skiing and sit back and watch the snow dump for another great day.
Property.RoomDescription4: Come home, kick back, start the fire and relax. You will find your group coming back in here to take a load off and relax. You can spend hours watching the skiers glide down the mountain out the windows, TV, VCR, DVD and a stereo system to entertain yourselves. This Tenderfoot Lodge unit has a Queen sofa sleeper in the living room for additional sleeping.
Property.RoomDescription5: This upper level deck boasts incredible views, table and seating for four, and a private gas grill. You can see the continental divide, Peru Lift, Ski Slopes, Bike Path, and the Snake River. This will be a popular place to gather in the summer!
Property.RoomDescription6: This is one the biggest kitchens in Keystone; modern, well stocked, and fully equipped to handle all of your cooking needs. You will also enjoy the custom bar style seating for 4 people, grab a quick meal or maybe set the kids here while the parents head over to soak up more night skiing views from the dinner table! Book this Tenderfoot Lodge Condo Today!
Property.RoomDescription7: This Tenderfoot Lodge features a private stacked Washer and Dryer. Not required to use but nice in case you would prefer to bring home some clean clothes.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
Tenderfoot Lodge #2621 Keystone Resort Colorado. This gorgeous two bedroom Keystone Condo is an upper level corner unit with some of the best ski slope views Keystone has to offer! Tenderfoot Lodge combines the amenities of an upscale resort with the features you enjoy of your own home at unbelievable prices! You can comfortably sleep six in these luxurious accommodations.
Watch skiers enjoy the Colorado powder day and night and be sure to watch the Saturday Night Fireworks from the comfort of Tenderfoot Lodge 2621! Book your Keystone lodging today!

Property.OneLiner: STaying here at Tenderfoot Lodge #2647 you will love how the slopes within easy walking distance, the Snake River is in full view and the bike path is just steps away from this Mountain House Condominium in Keystone Colorado. Complete with convenient garage parking, a relaxing hot tub and ski slope views from your private balcony this two bedroom condo is the perfect ski vacation home.
Property.RoomDescription1: No need to eat out for every meal. This kitchen comes fully equipped with a full size fridge and convenient island with bar area. Everything you need to make dining in a breeze!
Property.RoomDescription2: With sliding glass door access to the amazing views off of the deck This cozy space of the condo has a warm gas fireplace, TV and DVD player, as well as comfy seating. Fall asleep by the firelight on the sofa sleeper.
Property.RoomDescription3: Adjacent to the kitchen, there is seating for six. Need more eating space? Bar stools are close by in the kitchen.
Property.RoomDescription4: Just outside the living room is the large private balcony. Kick back and enjoy the beautiful slope and mountain views. Just below, you will see the outdoor hot tub and the Snake River wetlands beyond.
Property.RoomDescription5: Complete with an attached full bathroom, this Master Bedroom gives you the space and privacy to relax after a long day of carving the slopes. Unwind on the comfy Queen bed and private TV. Sleep well and dream of your next day of vacation!
Property.RoomDescription6: This bedroom features an inviting Queen bed and plentiful closet space to settle in comfortably. You'll feel right at home in this comfortable bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription7: Don't worry about packing new clothes for each day of your stay. You can wash and dry your layers for fresh warm clothes each morning in the convenient private laundry.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This beautiful 2 bedroom vacation condo overlooks the Snake River, ski slopes and the attractive hot tub courtyard. Great location at the Mountain House Base Area. Enjoy the complete ski vacation experience!

Property.OneLiner: Very cool quiet and relaxing 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo near the mountain house at Tenderfoot lodge in Keystone, Colorado. Walking distance from the slopes with great views of the slopes in the winter and the Snake River in the summer!
Property.RoomDescription1: This large tiled area provides maximum space for removing dirty and wet clothes before enjoying your night in. The private washer and dryer are right here in the entryway as well!
Property.RoomDescription2: This beautiful remodeled, fully equipped kitchen features granite counter tops, modern stainless steel appliances and stylish features. With plenty of cooking space, you will enjoy creating a delicious meal for the group!
Property.RoomDescription3: This welcoming room features a flat screen TV, gas fireplace and access to your private deck. Enjoy great views, or just relax and enjoy the television on the couch, which turns into a sleeper sofa!
Property.RoomDescription4: This room is BIG, and features a flat screen TV and a King bed. Perfect to come back to after a long day of skiing or hiking. The windows face east, so welcome the natural light in the morning!
Property.RoomDescription5: This room features a Queen bed and private flat screen TV. Sleep well after a fun-filled day!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This remarkable 2 bed 2 bath condo at the Tenderfoot Lodge features amazing Keystone views and a beautiful remodeled kitchen. You will enjoy every minute staying here during your Keystone Vacation!

Property.OneLiner: Well known as the largest and most luxurious property in River Run Village, Keystone, Mill Creek will not cease to impress. Lots of space and extremely close to skiing, you simply cannot go wrong at Mill Creek.
Property.RoomDescription1: Beautiful open living room with vaulted ceilings. Supplied with wireless internet, flat screen TV and kids toys, this room has it all for entertaining. Cozy up by the gas fireplace on the leather sofa, which holds a queen sleeper for additional sleeping space.
Property.RoomDescription2: Enjoy mountain views from the dining area. Table has seating for eight. This is definitely a terrific gathering spot.
Property.RoomDescription3: The full kitchen is equipped to meet all your needs while you're on vacation. With a dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot, oven/range, you'll have everything you need to cook meals or order in.
Property.RoomDescription4: The Master bedroom comes with a luxurious king sized bed. Unwind with a movie or late night TV on the flat screen!
Property.RoomDescription5: With a king sized bed in the 2nd Master bedroom, its tough to choose where you prefer to sleep.
Property.RoomDescription6: Single bunk beds in the guest room is very convenient for any kids in the group. With children's toys and a flat screen TV, they will be happily entertained!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Well known as the largest and most luxurious property in River Run Village, Mill Creek does not cease to impress. Lots of space and extremely close to skiing, you simply cannot go wrong at Mill Creek!

Property.OneLiner: Walk to the slopes from this large and luxurious $1.5 Million dollar Townhome. Featuring a private elevator inside property, 2 car private garage, vaulted ceilings, luxurious amenities and the absolute best view of the ski slopes and wetlands that you can find in Keystone!
Property.RoomDescription1: You can't find a better view of Keystone then from this room which includes elegant decor and a breathtaking view of the wetlands and ski slopes. Access to the back patio with stairs down to the ground level make it convenient to get outside. Sitting and relaxing in this great room will give you an unparalleled experience of beauty and relaxation.
Property.RoomDescription2: Featuring stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and plenty of room to cook a gourmet meal, this kitchen boasts everything you need. Fully stocked with plenty of kitchenware and appliances to cook the best of meals. Look outside the kitchen windows to see views of the ice rink in the winter and mini-golf in the summer at Dercum Square!
Property.RoomDescription3: This huge bedroom has plenty of room to spread out and get comfortable. Relax and kick back on the full size couch or cozy up in the king size bed and enjoy the incredible view outside your bedroom window. Featuring an oversize private bathroom with a Jacuzzi tub and steam shower, private washer, dryer and utility sink and surround sound system.
Property.RoomDescription4: This bedroom boasts plenty of space, great views, private oversize bathroom and walk in closet. Overlooking Dercum square, you will be able to see the ice skaters in the winter and the mini-golf course in the summer. This incredible wood bed frame is the highlight of the room and will remind you that you are in the heart of the Rocky Mountains!
Property.RoomDescription5: This room sleeps 3 and still has plenty of space to move around. Incredible views facing the wetlands and ski slopes combined with a large private bathroom and walk in closet makes this bedroom a perfect fit. This bedroom is conveniently located next to the washer and dryer closet.
Property.RoomDescription6: Located on the first level, this large room sleeps 5 and includes a seating area and private bathroom. With direct access to the back porch, this room is the perfect place to be.
Property.RoomDescription7: These wooden bunks are tucked away at the end of the hallway and make a great place to get some rest. Also near the half bathroom, with a view of Dercum Square.
Property.RoomDescription8: By far the most fantastic views you can get! This porch backs up to the protected wetlands where you will likely see fish, beavers and other wildlife. Just beyond the wetlands, you will see an unobstructed view of the ski slopes. Enjoy watching skiers come down the slopes day and night.
Property.RoomDescription9: This 2nd story deck is near the kitchen and includes your private full size grill. This porch is perfect for people watching as they pass by on their way to the slopes!
Property.RoomDescription10: This unique and stylish office will provide everything to get what you need done. Lavish chair with an oversize desk, unique decorations and views of passerby's as they walk to the lifts. This office is tucked away in the master bedroom and you can close the door for more quiet and privacy!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This elegantly furnished 4bd/4.5ba townhome has everything you need - high end furnishings and decor, a fully stocked gourmet kitchen and a private elevator makes this the perfect vacation home. You will not believe the unmatched view from this condo - pristine wetlands and protected beaver ponds are your immediate backyard, with unobstructed view of the ski slopes as well. Walk outside to find yourself in River Run Village - the perfect location for shopping and dining and many other activities. One of the very closest luxury properties to the slopes, it is a shorter walk to the gondola from this condo then from the parking lot!

Property.OneLiner: Cabin in the Pines #4 is a unique place to stay for your Keystone Vacation. You will enjoy this large and luxurious cabin for your whole family and friends. This cabin sleeps 8 people with plenty of room for everything.
Property.RoomDescription1: With a comfortable King size Bed this large master suite has it all. A TV, mountain views, private bathroom, you will love this ground floor Master bedroom.
Property.RoomDescription2: This large room has a queen bed and a single, perfect for a couple with kids or a couple of single friends, there is enough room in here for everyone, there is a full bathroom right across the hall!
Property.RoomDescription3:
Sleep above the rest when you stay up here. There is a regular queen size bed and plenty of space up here. The kids will fight for this one because it is such an amazing space!
WARNING WARNING WARNING This enclosed loft is accessible by a ladder only! There is a danger associated with this ladder that adults must determine if it is suitable for their children!
Property.RoomDescription4: This kitchen has it all. It is fully stocked and has all of the necessary equipment you should need to whip up a great meal. There is a neat window seat in here to sit down and enjoy your first cup of coffee. There is also bar style seating. In case you forget something there is a store down the road for the last minute ingredients. With a BBQ Grill off the back deck you can enjoy grilling year round!
Property.RoomDescription5: Relax with the fire going, a warm drink, good friends, and a good meal. The vaulted ceilings, warm atmosphere, and this wonderfully decorated room will make your trip complete. There is also a pull out single sleeper in here.
Property.RoomDescription6: Cabin in the Pines #4 has a private laundry room. No need to haul the clothes anywhere, this is a great feature for the longer vacations and to help cut down on the luggage fees.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Cabin in the Pines #4 at Keystone Resort Colorado. If you are looking for a place that offers plenty of room for your friends and family then you have come to the right place. Cabin in the Pines has two large bedrooms plus a loft. Large, kitchen, dining room, living room and three bathrooms you will enjoy all of the luxury comforts at affordable prices. Cabin in the Pines #4 has in floor radiant heat, solid surface counter tops, and upgraded appliances, and fixtures through out. Book your Keystone Cabin today!

Property.RoomDescription1: Large living room with plenty of seating for your group. It is located right off the kitchen and dining room with a very open floor plan. Relax in here with family and friends enjoying the fireplace and beautiful views off of the front deck of this property. The couch pulls out to a queen size bed.
Property.RoomDescription2: The dining room has a large table to seat your group for meal time or just sitting around talking about your day. There is additional seating at the breakfast bar in the kitchen.
Property.RoomDescription3: This great kitchen has everything you need to fix a complete dinner or just a quick breakfast before you head out the door. It overlooks the living room and dining room so the chef of the group will not feel secluded.
Property.RoomDescription4: This large master bedroom has a king bed, TV and attached bathroom. This is a great place to relax if you want to take a few minutes to yourself. There is plenty of storage with a dresser and closet space in here.
Property.RoomDescription5: This bedroom has 2 side by side twin beds for the kids or 2 adults. There is plenty of storage space in here with a large dresser and a closet.
Property.RoomDescription6: The single over single bunk beds in this room make it perfect for 2 people to sleep in here. There is a TV and an attached bathroom too.
Property.RoomDescription7:
sleep above the rest when you stay up here. There is a twin bed with a pull out twin trundle underneath it. The kids will fight for this one because it is such an amazing space!
WARNING WARNING WARNING This enclosed loft is accessible by a ladder only! There is a danger associated with this ladder that adults must determine if it is suitable for their children!
Property.RoomDescription8: Private laundry is located in the laundry room/utility room for your convenience. It will be great to be able to do laundry if needed in the privacy of your own town house.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Cabin in the Pines #8 three bedroom town home with additional loft at Keystone Resort is a perfect vacation home. There is plenty of space here for a large group and with the size of this property you will feel right at home!

Property.OneLiner: Enjoy this luxurious Keystone Mountain house with your friends and family and make your trip truly memorable! This beautiful house is undergoing a huge remodel this summer that will surely impress!
Property.RoomDescription1: Starting with GE commercial appliances including dual convection oven, over sized side by side fridge and freezer, gas range, griddle, grill, food warmer heat lamps, wine chiller, and the necessary equipment to back it up, your dream kitchen is ready for your chef.
Property.RoomDescription2: The upstairs living room takes advantage of the perfect views, with a separate seating area you can grab a glass of wine and sit back and relax next to the fire. There is a private patio outside of this living room with additional seating.
Property.RoomDescription3: When you are on vacation in Keystone and staying in the North Fork Lodge you have room for 8 at the long table and seating for four more at the breakfast bar! There is an additional table in the downstairs living room with seating for four as well. Your family will appreciate staying here for your Keystone Vacation!
Property.RoomDescription4: The master bedroom is one to write home about. With a large king sized bed, vaulted ceilings with wood beams, private slope view patio, fireplace, TV, jetted tub, dual vanity sinks, walk in closet, rain shower with body jets, and plenty of room to spread out. This room is located on the main floor with the kitchen and living room.
Property.RoomDescription5: This second master bedroom is located on the lower level. It has a king sized bed, fireplace, private patio entrance leading to the back deck, two person jetted tub, rain shower with body jets, plenty of storage and privacy.
Property.RoomDescription6: Enjoy a movie on the big screen TV with Bose surround sound on the leather furniture down here. There is a table down here for a friendly card game and challenge your friends to a game of fusball. You have a fireplace in this living room as well as a private balcony.
Property.RoomDescription7: The guest room has a queen sized bed, tall ceilings, TV and VCR and is located off of the lower level living room. You have a large closet in here and access to the bathroom with a full tub and shower across the hall.
Property.RoomDescription8: The bunk room has a single over custom wood log bunk bed. The kids will love it and they can spread out in here with plenty of room! There is also a TV and DVD player in here for the kids. They will have access to the jack and jill bathroom with dual vanity sinks, full tub and shower, and vaulted ceilings. This room is located on the main floor.
Property.RoomDescription9: This bedroom has a Full and Single bed for more sleeping, plenty of storage space and access to the jack and jill bathroom with the bunk room. This room is located on the main floor.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: North Fork Lodge #577 in River Run Village at Keystone Resort Colorado. Looking for a large custom built home within walking distance to the gondola, luxurious amenities, multiple fireplaces, body jet showers with rain faucets, wet bar and more? This house is your ideal vacation headquarters and is being remodeled this summer to feature upgrades such as flat screen TV's, new flooring, new furniture, new bedding, and updated decor that will surely be fit for a king!

Property.OneLiner: This studio is one of the nicest in the building. Faces the slopes, sleeps 6, and has a giant walk out patio, you will love this Slopeside Condo and you might book it for your next vacation to Keystone before you even leave!
Property.RoomDescription1: Living area has plenty of seating and great views of the slopes. Dining area for four overlooking the Mountain House Base Area. Living area features a Queen bed, Queen Murphy bed, and sofa sleeper to sleep up to 6 people!
Property.RoomDescription2: Full size bathroom features a full bathtub, shower, and hairdryer for your convenience.
Property.RoomDescription3: Well equipped kitchenette with small refrigerator, dishwasher, coffee maker, and microwave. Great for a quick bite before you start the day!
Property.RoomDescription4: Relax on the spacious balcony. Take in the Colorado sun while you enjoy mountain and ski slope views!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Slopeside 2777 has one of the best location in Keystone! Sit out front and see the slopes! Great views, space for everyone and sleeping accommodations for 6 people. Lots of upgrades too!

Property.OneLiner: This Keystone Slopeside studio condo is located in the building closest to the slopes and is right next to the hot tubs and BBQ grill, with easy access to the ski slopes it makes for the perfect ski condo. Wake up to views of Buffalo mountain and head out for another great day.
Property.RoomDescription1: The kitchenette has 2 electric burners, microwave with convection heating, toaster, coffee pot, tea kettle, and dishwasher, making Slopeside 2782 a condo that you will enjoy. While you won't be cooking gourmet feasts, you can sure whip up some fajitas or quesadillas and still have the popcorn ready for movie time. Awesome!
Property.RoomDescription2: This Slopeside condo is located close to the hot tubs, making the dash back to your condo with your towel a piece of cake.
Property.RoomDescription3: With a Queen bed, Day bed, and Trundle bed in this Keystone Slopeside Condo, everyone is sleeping on a real mattress. Catching a good night's sleep will be easy. After all, you are on vacation in Keystone Colorado! A good night's rest should be a part of your enjoyable trip!
Property.RoomDescription4: Wake up and open the blinds for your Keystone ski report. Grab your skis from the locker and you're on the lift in 2 minutes! No waiting for shuttles or walking a mile to get on the lifts.
Property.RoomDescription5: You're only a minute's walk to the base area restaurants and Last Lift Bar from this condo. If you want to hang with the locals, head over the pedestrian bridge to The Goat, The Snake River Saloon, Haywood Cafe, or Dos Locos for a fun filled night. Or if you'd rather, take a 2 minute shuttle ride to River Run Village and enjoy one of the many options there. Slopeside Condos are very convenient to everything in Keystone Resort.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This is a skier's perfect pad. Slopeside Condos in Keystone are right next to the Mountain House Base Area and a minute's walk to the Peru lift. This is a prime location. Leave the car in the heated garage and you're on the mountain in no time. After skiing, drop your gear in the ski locker, hit the hot tub right outside your door, and relax while watching the HD TV with Blu Ray. Enjoy a good night's sleep on comfortable mattresses and you're ready to do it all again the next day!

Property.OneLiner: This Amazing 5 bedroom 3.5 bathroom House in the Elk Run area of Keystone, only steps away from Keystone's Award Winning River Course and less than 3 miles from River Run Village at the base of Keystone Resort, Located adjacent to the 8th Green of the River Course, this House is the perfect getaway in Keystone Colorado
Property.RoomDescription1: When you enter into the unit you will notice how wide open and spacious the property feels, there will be a sense of awe at how gorgeous it is...but dont forget to take off your boots!
Property.RoomDescription2: the main level living room has a gas fireplace and a flat screen TV. Attached to the living room is a large dining room and table and is just next to the entrance to a huge porch with great views of the golf course. The porch has a very large BBQ grill and a heater above the table so you will never feel like it is too cold to be eating outside in the spring or fall
Property.RoomDescription3: The Kitchen is absolutely huge making it incredibly inviting for cooks looking to make a huge impression on the vacation by cooking a great meal
Property.RoomDescription4: The downstairs living room features a flat screen TV and a gas fireplace, It also is ideally located between the 3 guest bedrooms, making it perfect for get togethers and games
Property.RoomDescription5: A study is located on the same tier as the Kitchen and main living room and has a Fax so you can get any and all work you need to get done complete, even while enjoying your vacation
Property.RoomDescription6: The bunk room is 1 flight up from the Main living area and has twin bunk beds and a great view of the golf course
Property.RoomDescription7: The Downstairs bedroom has a queen bed and is directly attached to the great Downstairs Living Room
Property.RoomDescription8: The 2nd downstairs bedroom is right next to the first one, and has a queen bed and is directly attached to the downstairs living room as well
Property.RoomDescription9: The Downstairs guest master has an ensuite bathroom and is slightly elevated towards the entryway, but also features a queen bed and easy access to the lower level
Property.RoomDescription10: The Master Bedroom is located on the top floor of the house, and has spectacular views of the Golf Course and the surrounding area. It also has a flat screen TV and ensuite bathroom. The Bathroom features a Steam Shower and a Jacuzzi tub along with the double vanity. A true luxury accommodation.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This beautiful property in the Elk Run area of keystone is fully furnished with a generous wide open floor plan and plenty of space. Perfect for a larger family looking for a quiet private home in Keystone. 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, a full kitchen with butler's pantry and a wet bar downstairs. Private laundry room downstairs and a 2 car garage with room for bikes skis and golf clubs. Its the perfect getaway..

Property.OneLiner: The Enclave in Keystone is an amazing vacation rental for your large family! With lots of room, amazing views, and amenities like a private hot tub, private sauna, and steam room you will find it hard to stay anywhere else in Keystone Colorado!
Property.RoomTitle1: Private Hot Tub, Steam Shower, and Sauna!
Property.RoomDescription1: After a long day of skiing some world class powder runs at Keystone resort your body will thank you for choosing accommodations with a Private indoor hot tub, steam shower, and dry sauna! You won't regret booking this Enclave property for your next Keystone vacation!
Property.RoomDescription2: Double ovens anyone? This fully equipped kitchen can handle your large group, with plenty of everything, fully decked out to enjoy even full service for your Thanksgiving Dinner in Keystone Colorado! You will enjoy cooking in this Enclave vacation rental.
Property.RoomDescription3: Upstairs you have the Enclave Bunk Room with two sets of single bunks and a single sofa sleeper!
Property.RoomDescription4: The living room in The Enclave is large and features plenty of seating for your group. You have a wood burning fireplace which is very nice after a long day in Keystone. There is a flat screen TV and DVD player for your entertainment. The living room also has two sofa sleepers out here! There is also a patio off of the front that has amazing views of Keystone Resort.
Property.RoomDescription5: The two car private heated garage leads you right into the Enclave at Keystone! No need to clear your car of snow or ice just hop in and go!
Property.RoomDescription6: This Enclave town home has a large dining room right off of the kitchen with a long table with seating for 12 and additional seating is also available at the breakfast bar! No need to eat dinner on the floor...unless you want to, after all you are on vacation!!
Property.RoomDescription7: Taking home wet ski gear is not the most fun, however when you vacation and you are staying at the Enclave in Keystone you can enjoy a full size washer and dryer!
Property.RoomDescription8: This bedroom is off of the living room and has a TV/VCR. There is a queen bed and private walk out patio that looks out back up to an un-developed mountainside! You have access to the bathroom in here as well.
Property.RoomDescription9: This guest bedroom is located downstairs in the Enclave town home and has a queen size bed and antique ski decor. Perfect for a couple in need of a little privacy.
Property.RoomDescription10: This large king sized master has a great view, private TV, king sized bed, stereo system, and a sofa sleeper in here as well! The newly remodeled master bathroom has nice dual vanity sinks, a full sized jetted tub and a large shower. You will love this Enclave vacation Rental in Keystone! Book it today!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: The Enclave at Keystone Resort is one of our favorite developments! Enclave town homes offer more amenities than your family will expect, surprise them with this vacation home! It is big enough for a couple of families to enjoy! This Keystone town home has a private hot tub, steam room, and dry sauna all indoors for you to enjoy!

Property.OneLiner: It\\\'s hard to get closer to the ski lifts than this two bedroom, two bath condominium that sleeps six comfortably with fireplace and balcony overlooking Snake River.
Property.RoomDescription1: The master bedroom at Cinnamon Ridge offers a King bed and views of the ski slopes. A sliding door leads to the outside patio. Enjoy a cup of coffee on a chill summer morning and listen the the Snake River just 50 feet away.
Property.RoomDescription2: The full kitchen is stocked with everything you need to cook a full meal for your group. Outfitted with all the appliances and utensils you need, it is open to the rest of the living room so the cook will not feel left out of the group.
Property.RoomDescription3: The spacious living room features a wood burning fireplace, TV, DVD player, and a view that will not be forgotten. Cinnamon Ridge supplies the firewood, so you can enjoy a cracking natural fire inside on a chill winter night. A game console is supplied in the living room for some evening fun for the family.
Property.RoomDescription4: The guest bedroom offers 2 single beds. It is the perfect place for the kids to hide away. Ski slopes views are plentiful in this room as well.
Property.RoomDescription5: The outside patio is probably the best feature of the Cinnamon Ridge condo. Sit on the deck and enjoy the straight on views of the ski slopes and the sound of the Snake River. 180 degree views from East to West make it the perfect spot for relaxing and enjoying the Colorado outdoors.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This charming 2 bedroom property is located right on the banks of the Snake River in Keystone with sweeping views of the ski slopes from all rooms. The outside patio offers a great view and enjoyable sound of the river nearby.

The open floor plan which includes a breakfast bar with stool seats is another great feature of this Cinnamon Ridge kitchen.
Property.RoomDescription6: You have a wood burning fireplace in here, the wood is provided as well so no buying wood when you are on vacation. You will find a large flat screen TV and DVD player for your enjoyment as well

Property.OneLiner: Walk to the slopes that you can see from your living room when you stay at this completely remodeled Cinnamon Ridge Condo #B202. Centrally located with convenient parking, steaming hot tubs and free internet you will not find a better value for the quality and convenience this updated two bedroom condo has to offer!
Property.RoomDescription1: Floor to ceiling windows in the sliding glass door give you an unobstructed view of the slopes of Keystone from your own living room. The crackling wood fireplace makes this a warm space, perfect for relaxing after a long day of riding the slopes. Complete with flat screen TV and DVD player as well as a Wii gaming system and several board games the whole family will enjoy spending time together here. The large, comfortable couch with chais lounge makes room for everyone to get cozy. There is even a pullout bed so two people can sleep here.
Property.RoomDescription2: Custom wood breakfast bar, unique tile back splash, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances are just a few more highlights from the recent remodel of this entire condo. This kitchen comes fully equipped with the tools you will need to prepare a quick snack or a delicious sit down meal with your friends and family.
Property.RoomDescription3: Situated near the kitchen this dedicated dining area has a great table which can comfortably seat up to six with the removable leaf in place. There is a breakfast bar nearby with additional seating for three making plenty of room for a cozy night of eating in with your friends.
Property.RoomDescription4: Warm colors and a comfortable queen bed make this master bedroom an inviting place to come home to. With inspiring ski slopes views you will love waking up to the sight of freshly groomed runs calling your name. Of the many improvements recently added to this Cinnamon Ridge condo the Master Bathroom really stands out with the custom tile work featuring beautiful granite counter tops as well as travertine and slate tile accents. The Guest bathroom has been updated in the same style as well.
Property.RoomDescription5: Whether you've got a group of friends with you or you need a private space for the kids to bunk in at night this guest bedroom offers the perfect place. A bunk bed with a full on the bottom and a twin bed on top makes room for three to sleep comfortably. Nothing feels better than sleeping somewhere cozy when you're on an adventurous mountain vacation and you will certainly feel at ease staying here. There is also a private TV and closet storage for everyone's things here too.
Property.RoomDescription6: With gorgeous slope, river and surrounding mountain views this private balcony will be a favorite spot for many guests. Complete with comfortable chairs for relaxing and easily accessible from your living room through sliding glass doors you will want to spend more time outdoors even when you're relaxing in your condo.
Property.RoomDescription7: Save space when you pack because when you stay here you will be able to wash and dry all of your gear from the convenience of your own condo. Nothing feels quite as nice as a fresh warm towel or clean socks in the morning!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: With unbeatable slope views from the living room and bedrooms you can be the first one to lay your eyes on each morning's fresh snow when you stay at this completely remodeled two bedroom condo. Cinnamon Ridge #B202 is a walkable distance from the lifts and you will not find a better value for the quality and convenience than this deluxe vacation home. Overlooking the Snake River, right on the shuttle route, walking distance to the surrounding shops and restaurants - this place gives you great access to everything!

Property.OneLiner: Chateaux DuMont 2723 in Keystone Resort Colorado is your premier rental condominium for your Keystone Vacation! Private hot tub, wood burning fireplace, walk to the slopes, trails and more!
Property.RoomDescription1: Encased in exquisite beveled glass, this room is the paramount room of the whole condo. Beyond the glass there is a full size hot tub right inside this condo! There is also a mini bar complete with a bar sink and checker board playing table. You will not believe the views of the Mountain House village and multiple ski slopes that you will see from your own private hot tub from INSIDE your condo. If you want to step outside for some fresh air, this room also opens up to the balcony. The hot tub room is unique to this property and one that you will undoubtedly adore.
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen is big and open and has all newer appliances. There is a breakfast bar for a quick meal or to chat with the cook. If the breakfast bar isn't enough, there is an elegant dining room table that comfortably seats five. There are also multiple wine racks and an external ice maker in this luxurious kitchen.
Property.RoomDescription3: Capable of sleeping 5 this living room is large enough that everyone will want to hang out in it. A huge wrap around couch with pull out bed and another pull out couch bed line this room with plush comfort. There is a wood burning fireplace and television that complete the room's amenities. This room is undoubtedly a great place to gather.
Property.RoomDescription4: A king size bed with a gorgeous wooden bed frame are only the beginning to this great master bedroom. There is also a single pull out couch next to the entertainment center in this room. Dual sinks and a lock off toilet and shower make this master bedroom convenient and if that's not enough, there is a huge walk in closet to store all of your luggage. This room also has its own private balcony with views of the Snake River.
Property.RoomDescription5: Equally large this bedroom also holds a king size bed along with reading chairs and an entertainment system. A single sink and lock off toilet and bathroom make it very suitable to any guest. There is also an oversized closet that has plenty of room for luggage.
Property.RoomDescription6: Equally large this bedroom also holds a king size bed along with reading chairs and an entertainment system. A single sink and lock off toilet and bathroom make it very suitable to any guest. There is also an oversized closet that has plenty of room for luggage.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Chateaux DuMont 2723 in Keystone, Colorado is one of the most unique and amazing properties in all of Keystone. Its decor, location and layout are like nothing you've ever seen. Its location, quite literally, is a 10 second walk away from the Peru lift, which is the closest you can get to the lifts on the Mountain House side of Keystone!

Property.OneLiner: Red Hawk Townhomes in Keystone Colorado at River Run Village is the premier town home location for your next family Keystone Vacation! Book your vacation to Keystone Colorado today!
Property.RoomDescription1: Open kitchen has everything the Chef of the group needs to cook everyone's favorite meals. Beautiful wood cabinetry, sparkling stone counter tops, and new appliances make this a great place to spend some time. Opens up to the living room with a bar seating area, as well as a small high-top dining table.
Property.RoomDescription2: Cozy living room with great views of the mountains. Warm up near the fireplace while watching a movie on TV or playing a game of chess. There is plenty of seating for everyone here!
Property.RoomDescription3: You will love spending time out here no matter what the weather. Your spacious backyard is just a few yards away from the Sake River, with a backdrop of the CO Rockies. Bundle up and breathe in the fresh mountain air! A private gas grill is provided.
Property.RoomDescription4: Wake up to an incredible view right from your King bed! Relax in the jet bathtub. Double sinks in the spacious master bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription5: Comfortable Guest bedroom with Twin over Queen bunk beds. Features a large closet and office desk. Also offers a perfect view of the front yard. Guest bathroom complete with a beautiful pedestal sink and full bathtub with shower
Property.RoomDescription6: You have a private washer and dryer when you stay at the Red Hawk Town Home 2352, making it convenient to do laundry!

Property.OneLiner: Rustic Luxury perfectly describes this amazing private home in Keystones River Run Village. Built with the typical style seen in Southern Colorado, this private lodge is among the most exclusive properties in all of Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: This is the kitchen of all kitchens! Featuring all commercial grade Thermador appliances and 2 islands, this is a cooks paradise! One island is a dedicated wet bar, the other is intended for food prep and is large enough to use as a buffet style serving area. A large flat screen TV is mounted on the wall in the kitchen so the chef will not be left out of watching the game with everyone else. A finely crafted table sits to the side of the kitchen and has seating for 10 people.
Property.RoomDescription2: Hold your chin....your jaw will drop when you walk into the main living room area upstairs. Huge exposed wood beams support a sky-high vaulted ceiling. The huge gas fireplace in the living room is the centerpiece of this room with a tall rustic chimney and a wide hearth that will make you feel you are part of a picture out of Mountain Living magazine. A large comfy sofa and several chairs in front of the large picture window make this room a dream come true.
Property.RoomDescription3: The main master is on the Eastern most wing of this keystone lodge. The huge picture window to the South features a full 180 degree view of Mountains, and the front side of Keystone Ski Resort. This bedroom features amazing architecture of exposed wood beams and high vaulted ceilings. A king bed populates this room along with all the furnishings you would expect in such a luxury retreat. The attached bath features a palatial steam shower with overhead rain shower head. A stacked washer and dryer are also located in the closet of the master bedroom so you don't have to run downstairs to the main laundry room. A flat screen TV on the wall completes this room.
Property.RoomDescription4: The western wing of this Keystone house features the 2nd master bedroom, also furnished with a king bed. The attached bath features a jetted tub with a flat screen TV mounted above. The ladies will love stepping into this private spa and pampering themselves with silence and tranquility.
Property.RoomDescription5: The downstairs master bedroom features a large King bed and an attached bath. Furnished in all high-end furniture and bedding, this room will make you feel like you're staying in a palace. A flat screen TV completes this room to perfection.
Property.RoomDescription6: The available 2 bays of the garage feature a massive amount of space for 2 large vehicles plus space for extra gear such as skis, bikes, and more. The heated concrete slab means that your cars and gear will be toasty warm and ready for top performance. Scraping ice off a windshield is something you do not need to worry about.
Property.RoomDescription7: These side-by-side rooms are separated by a shared Jack and Jill bath. These 2 rooms are ideal for kids and feature sleeping capacities of 4 people each, for a total of 8. These rooms are located downstairs right off the downstairs living area.
Property.RoomDescription8: Located on the bottom floor, this room features a large 50" flat screen TV and an extremely comfortable sofa. To the rear of the room, opposite of the TV, there is a full wet bar complete with microwave, sink and fridge. Step outside to the ground level patio and hop into the large hot tub after a long day of skiing. A huge gas fireplace is the centerpiece of this room and is perfect when coming inside from the hot tub.
Property.RoomDescription9:
While at the home, enjoy the collection of original artwork assembled by the owners. Original oil paintings by Native American Farrell Cockrum of the Blackfeet Nation of Northern Montana greet you in the Great Room, including Cheyenne Visitation, a bold impressionistic work depicting Blackfeet Indian warriors on horseback. Also adorning the walls is an original landscape by Barbara Coleman, a New Mexico artist represented by galleries in Santa Fe and Taos. You will undoubtedly enjoy a portrait of cowboy singer/songwriter Michael Martin Murphy by Colorado painter William Matthews, once hailed by Forbes Magazine as the new Frederick Remington of American painting.
The kitchen and master bedroom on the west side of the home feature original works by Kim Stanfield, a Midwest-born painter represented by galleries from New Mexico to St. Louis. The master bedroom on the east side of the home contains vintage barn doors dating back to the early 1900s and original oil paintings of barns by Sally Schoch, a Chicago area artist whose work is shown in galleries around the Chicago metropolitan area.
Property.RoomDescription10: The front deck is probably one of the most popular places in the home. Straight on views of the entire front side of Dercum Mountain will amaze you. Located right off the main living room, the deck is made of fine Brazilian hardwood and is the perfect place to relax on a warm winter day after being on the ski slopes all day long. The best part is that this deck is a southern exposure and gets full sun all day long, so there is usually no snow or ice built up.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Rustic Luxury is the way to perfectly describe this amazing home in River Run. This home was designed with a motif found only in the most exclusive areas of Colorado and you'll be stunned by the exposed wood beams and craftsmanship throughout. Furnished to the hilt with all high end appliances, multiple wet bars and living areas this private home is perfect for a large gathering of 2 or even 3 families.

Property.RoomDescription7: Features a Queen bed, private flat screen TV with DVD player, and iHome iPod hookup. The perfect place to call home at the end of a great day in Keystone Colorado!
Property.RoomDescription8: The kids will love this room! They'll find a single over queen bunk bed and their own private TV, DVD player and PS2 game station. No question they will stay entertained in here.

Premier features include a private Hot Tub, heated garage, separate game room and gourmet kitchen. Don't pass up the opportunity to stay in this amazing vacation home!

Property.OneLiner: Summit Mountain Retreat is a gorgeous 5 bedroom home overlooking the Snake River with wide open mountain views! There are beds for 16, two living rooms, a large yard, patio and upper level deck as well as a private hot tub! If thats not enough its also got access to the clubhouse at Soda Springs if you want to use a swimming pool!
Property.RoomTitle6: Downstairs Living Room with Foosball Table
Property.RoomTitle7: Two Car Garage and Private Laundry
Property.RoomDescription1: As if the vast square footage wasn't enough to make this spacious home inviting the high vaulted ceilings add height and style to Summit Mountain Retreat's Great Room. There are multiple couches arranged in the living room so that everyone can be comfortable whether you are engaged in private conversation or grouped in front of the fire for a game of family charades. Nearby is a round table perfect a board game or a lighthearted game of poker. The warm gas fireplace and tall windows provide a cozy indoor haven while you can still enjoy the breathtaking views outside.
Property.RoomDescription2: When it's time to gather around for a gourmet holiday feast or a warm pancake breakfast the dining table here has a place for everyone. Seating up to 12 at the table, along with a nearby breakfast bar which has seating for 6, this dining room has both elegance and functionality for your group to enjoy. Access to the deck from the sliding glass door in the dining room makes it just as convenient to BBQ outside as it is to dine in.
Property.RoomDescription3: For the gourmet cook in everyone this kitchen is a perfect place to create a memorable meal. Two stacked ovens, a 6 burner gas range top, ample counter space, large refrigerator and all the dishes you need for cooking a great meal - it's all here. Complimented by tasteful hanging lights and attractive tile floor and back splash the kitchen at Summit Mountain Retreat has it all.
Property.RoomDescription4: Wrapping around two sides of the great room on the main level the spacious upper level deck is a wonderful place to sit out and enjoy the sun, cook up a barbecue on your private gas grill or to kick back and enjoy the sound of the Snake River flowing by below.
Property.RoomDescription5: As large as any two other bedrooms combined this room defines what it means to stay in a Master Bedroom. You won't even want to leave the luxury of this bedroom suite. The inviting king bed, couch and sitting chairs, private TV and striking vaulted ceilings all add to the comfort and character of this room. Complete with a large attached full bathroom with dual sinks and a separate bath and shower there is just the kind of privacy you need to relax and recharge after a long day on the snow or in the sun.
Property.RoomDescription6: If your group has a variety of ways they like to spend their time then this second living room is the perfect way to make that possible.Whether it's time for a kids movie, a rowdy game of Foosball or perhaps a place for the guys to watch the big game this second living room is the ideal place to make that happen. From this room you also have access to the ground level patio and private hot tub outside.
Property.RoomDescription7: Inside heated parking for two cars is included when you stay at Summit Mountain Retreat. You can leave your gear in the garage to dry off and come inside to the convenient storage room where there is a bench for taking off your boots and hooks for your jackets, gloves, etc. And since no one wants to pack a new warm layers for every day you will love having your very own washer and dryer in the private laundry room also downstairs.
Property.RoomDescription8: Just off the downstairs living room you will find two rooms each with an attached full bathrooms with dual vanity sinks offer privacy and two queen beds. These rooms also have large closets and a chest of drawers so there is plenty of room for everyone to settling in and put away their things. Private TV's also make these rooms a great place to get away for some time to relax on your own.
Property.RoomDescription9: Another downstairs bedroom with an attached full bathroom with dual vanity sinks has both a queen bed and a bunk with two single beds - another room that comfortably sleeps four.
Property.RoomDescription10: This corner room downstairs has a comfortable queen bed and an attached full bathroom as well as a private patio. With the privacy you enjoy here you will feel like you've rented a studio all to yourself!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
Right on the banks of the Snake River Summit Mountain Retreat is one of Keystone's most inviting private vacation homes. The high vaulted ceilings, large yard, terrific mountain and river views, wide open living rooms both upstairs and down along with a private two car garage, hot tub and access to the nearby Soda Springs Clubhouse leave nothing to be desired for any group who stays here. Sleeping 16 adults comfortably and being located only a mile away from the slopes on the Keystone Resort shuttle route there is no better place to stay than this deluxe vacation home.
Notice to Potential Renters Regarding Large Group Functions:
This property is spacious and can accommodate group vacations. It will sleep 16 people. Potential renters should be aware, however, that the property is not available for group functions such as wedding receptions, rehearsal dinners, family reunions, training seminars, etc. If your plans include a group function of this nature, please do not plan on using this property as the venue. Summit Coves rental agreement will include a clause limiting the number of persons allowed to occupy the property at any given time.

Property.OneLiner: Take a trip to the old Colorado in the old miner\'s town of Montezuma. Just 6 miles east of Keystone you and your 4X4 can stay at the beginning of too many great back country roads available for exploring to count! Three bedrooms and two bathrooms make this a great place for a group to come and play in the mountains!
Property.RoomDescription1: Exposed beams and vaulted ceilings makes this cozy living space as beautiful as it is welcoming. This room features a wood stove and huge pictures windows for breathtaking views of Saints John Mountain range. Enough comfortable seating in this room for the whole group!
Property.RoomDescription2: Adjacent to the living room is the dining area, which looks out the sliding doors to an expansive deck and, of course, views galore!
Property.RoomDescription3: This expansive kitchen offers everything needed to prepare the simplest meal or a huge feast. Stainless steel appliances, an espresso maker and ample counters space are a few of the highlights.
Property.RoomDescription4: A private retreat during your stay at the Montezuma Hideaway. This main floor bedroom offers a Queen bed, plenty of storage and a welcoming, cozy decor. A beautiful stained glass door is the entrance.
Property.RoomDescription5: This bathroom is beautifully finished with an footed bathtub and beautiful sinks. It is truly a treat to pamper your self in this bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription6: This cute room is perfect for the kids. It offers a full bed and bunk beds. The kids will love sleeping here!
Property.RoomDescription7: The third floor offers a beautiful loft and bird's eye view to the living room below. A great room for additional sleeping. Contains a twin bed and plenty of room for air mattresses.
Property.RoomDescription8: This artfully done bathroom truly shows the craftsmanship of this house. This bath offers beautiful tile and a glass shower.
Property.RoomDescription9: This romantic bedroom, tucked away from the main loft area, offers the utmost in privacy. The vaulted ceilings and timber framing are elegant features of this lovely room. An inviting down comforter covers the Queen bed.
Property.RoomDescription10: Finally, tucked away off of the laundry room is a secret little hideaway. This TV and game room has the feel of an old mind shaft. Offering leather furniture and old mining decor, it is a room like no other. You will enjoy the flat screen TV and Nintendo Wii any time of year!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview:
This Colorado home is uniquely beautiful. Located in the historic mining town of Montezuma, this property truly reflects the history of its surroundings. Huge picture windows and skylights give ample views of the incredible neighboring mountains.
THE BEST FEATURE: Front door access to cross country skiing, back country skiing, snowshoeing, sledding, snowmobiling on the many spectacular trails surrounding this home.
WARNING: In the winter months FOUR WHEEL DRIVE is required to get to this property. Roads are plowed, but it is not guaranteed that you will be able to get up the driveway to the home with only 2 wheel drive. Free parking is available in the Town of Montezuma and it is a short walk to the home itself.

Property.OneLiner: Private Vacation Home for rent in Keystone Ranch. This Keystone Vacation rental is the newest lodging available in Keystone Ranch, we are in the process of updating this rental home so please check back often to see new photos and a tour of the wonderful private home in Keystone Colorado.
Property.RoomDescription1: A cozy den with a flat screen TV, surround sound and a Wii for the kids to play games. This room also has a Blu Ray player, a comfortable sectional couch and nice carpeting. Right next to the den is a wet bar.
Property.RoomDescription2: Inviting Master Bedroom with a flat screen TV and a queen bed and an attached full bathroom for privacy and convenience.
Property.RoomDescription3: A second bedroom downstairs features a Queen Bed and a flat screen TV with shared bathroom to the bunk room nearby. This room is located cross the hall from the downstairs master bedroom and laundry room.
Property.RoomDescription4: Featuring a Captains Bunk (a single bed over the top of a Queen Bed) with shared bathroom the Downstairs Bedroom #2 this lower level bedroom offers an excellent room for the kids.
Property.RoomDescription5: This outdoor porch, connecting in two places, give great access to the hot tub.
Property.RoomDescription6: Located on the main level of the home and open to the kitchen and dining area this inviting family room features ample seating, a large television and a gorgeous custom stone hearth. With vaulted ceilings and large picture windows displaying the views to the northwest you will never get tired of taking in the scenery from here. The access to two decks, including one with a private gas grill, and outside seating the great room in this home is your vacation central.
Property.RoomDescription7: For the chef in any family this custom gourmet kitchen features a gas range, a large refrigerator and dual ovens, along with ample counter space for easy food preparation. The Kitchen also features a mini fridge, two sinks, and two dishwashers as well as a pull out broiler. With plenty of seating at the island this is a great place to enjoy each others company while a meal is being prepared.
Property.RoomDescription8: The master bedroom on the main floor features a large flat screen TV and a inviting King bed. The luxurious private bathroom features a shower as well as a jetted tub.
Property.RoomDescription9: Like the downstairs master bedroom, has an ensuite unshared bathroom with a shower and a jetted tub, Also has a large TV, a queen bed access to a private upper balcony.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This premier Keystone Vacation Home located near the Keystone Ranch Golf Course offers an attractive lodging option with five bedrooms plus a loft to accommodate groups of 5 to 15 with style. Call and book this home to make your next visit to Keystone the Ski Vacation of your dreams!

Property.OneLiner: While on Vacation in Keystone Colorado you will enjoy this rental townhome. Starfire 1990 is a large 3 bed that sleeps 8 adults in beds comfortably. Located only a short shuttle ride from the ski resort and a 1 minute walk to the hot tub your Keystone Vacation just got better when you reserve Starfire 1990 with SummitCove.
Property.RoomDescription1: What an comfy living room! This big flat screen TV and gas fireplace is great for movie night after a long day on the mountain! There is extra sleeping capacity here thanks to the Queen Sleeper Sofa in the living room
Property.RoomDescription2: This beautifully furnished Master bedroom makes for a great place to crash when you are done skiing. Relax in the attached double vanity Master bathroom with Its inviting jetted tub
Property.RoomDescription3: In this cozy downstairs Master bedroom, you will find a King bed and private bathroom.
Property.RoomDescription4: The downstairs Guest room features two Twin beds, along with another private bathroom and access to the lower level patio.
Property.RoomDescription5: This Loft area provides more sleeping space. The kids will love sleeping in the Twin bunk beds.
Property.RoomDescription6: In this fully equipped kitchen, you will find everything you need to make a home cooked meal. Don't forget to stop at the grocery store in Dillon on your way here to fill the fridge!
Property.RoomDescription7: Enjoy the sunny CO days while lounging on the wooden deck furniture under large umbrella. Bundle up in the winter and breathe in the fresh mountain air!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This gorgeous 3 bedroom plus Loft Townhouse is the perfect location for your Keystone vacation! With a private, welcoming entrance, two outdoor patios and heated garage, you will vacation in luxury. You will adore the secluded, yet convenient, location of this lovely Starfire Townhouse in Keystone Resort!

Property.OneLiner: Rent this beautiful 3 bedroom townhome and you will not be disappointed. Equipped with everything you need for your vacation trip to Keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: A nicely tiled entryway welcomes you home after a long ski day on the hill. Get ready to relax!
Property.RoomDescription2: Enjoy the leather couch and loveseat as you sit around the gas fireplace and watch TV. This spacious living room is the perfect gathering place for family and friends!
Property.RoomDescription3: The dining area you will find a large table with plenty of seating for the entire group.
Property.RoomDescription4: This spacious kitchen is fully equipped to cook any type of meal. The breakfast bar is a convenient feature for grabbing a quick bite before heading out for a fun-filled day!
Property.RoomDescription5: Downstairs will find the 2nd Guest bedroom with 2 Twin beds. There is an exit to the lower porch and the covered area makes it a perfect place to sit and get out of the summer sun.
Property.RoomDescription6: Downstairs to the right is the Guest room with an en suite bathroom and a queen bed, perfect for that second couple traveling in the group.
Property.RoomDescription7: Upstairs is a loft leading to the Master bedroom. In the loft there is a coffee table and a sleeper sofa for added sleeping capacity.
Property.RoomDescription8: In the master bedroom you will find a comfy King bed and lots of natural light streaming through the large windows. The attached master bathroom is complete with dual vanities, a large mirror and a jetted jacuzzi tub. Enjoy!
Property.RoomDescription9: The private porch is includes a grill for cooking anything from burgers to veggies or that elk steak you've been waiting to try.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Gorgeous and spacious 3 bedroom property with sleeping capacity for 8 adults. Situated on the end of the Starfire Townhome neighborhood, this mountain vacation townhome has it all!

Property.OneLiner: Starfire vacation rentals in Keystone Colorado are perfect for your ski vacation in Keystone. You will enjoy the large floor plan, the great location that is just minutes from the slopes via free shuttle but tucked into the woods for a private feeling. In the summer you can walk to the Keystone Village and enjoy all the amenities.
Property.RoomDescription1: Very large, open living room with plenty of seating for your group. New furniture, flat screen TV, gas fireplace and beautiful views make this a perfect Colorado Vacation Condo!
Property.RoomDescription2: This kitchen is fully equipped, complete with crock pot and ice maker. So feel free to make all your favorite meals while on vacation!
Property.RoomDescription3: Great dining room with a large table, vaulted ceilings and windows with views make this a perfect place for eating in. Chat around the table or enjoy a game night!
Property.RoomDescription4: Wonderful King bed, large master bath and plenty of storage. And of course, great views!
Property.RoomDescription5: The second bedroom comes with a Queen bed, attached bathroom, dresser for storage and a private TV.
Property.RoomDescription6: Gorgeous Queen over Queen rustic bunk beds make this room perfect for the kids. Includes a private TV, seating space and large dresser.
Property.RoomDescription7: This beautiful deck comes complete with views, patio furniture and gas grill to use year round!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Welcome to North Star #1955, a 3 bedroom 3.5 bathroom townhouse located in the beautiful West Keystone neighborhood. Amenities include hot tubs, private grill, private laundry and flat screen TVs in every bedroom. With sleeping space for 10, your large group will love staying here!

This condo is great for multiple families and has all the amenities you\'ll need in Keystone! This property is also near a shuttle stop giving independence to all!

Property.OneLiner: Saints Johns Condo is a hidden gem of keystone, although slightly older than river run it is very modern, with very nice, unique condos with phenomenal views of the Keystone Lake, and Dercum Mountain
Property.RoomDescription1: The Kitchen is located to the left of the entryway and comes fully equipped with everything you might need to make a great home cooked meal.
Property.RoomDescription2: Relax after a fun-filled day on the comfy couches as you unwind by the flat screen TV and a gas fireplace. The dining are is close by for enjoying meals, having a drink or playing games.
Property.RoomDescription3: Stunning panoramic views of Ski Slopes of Dercum Mountain, all the way to the River Course at Keystone. Enjoy the gas grill for group cookouts!
Property.RoomDescription4: Both bedrooms are downstairs. In the Guest room, you will find a Queen Bed and twin bunk beds. Bathroom is attached.
Property.RoomDescription5: The Master features a King bed and a Queen Sofa Sleeper, along with a large window for another view of the mountains!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This beautiful 2 bedroom 2.5 bathroom condo is located in the Saints Johns Building, just up the hill from the Keystone Conference Center. It features a full kitchen, private deck, and flat screen TVs. With proximity to Keystone Lake and the conference center, this property is ideal for vacationers and those in town on business. Located just a shuttle ride away from the slopes, you're close to everything you need in Keystone!

Property.OneLiner: Rent this unbelievable unit in the Sts. Johns Building. Incredible Views of Keystone and the surrounding area including the keystone lake, and all the way from Arapahoe Basin to past the River Course. A perfect quiet condo in north keystone.
Property.RoomDescription1: As you enter into the unit there are carpets throughout and stairs up to the main floor. A stuffed bear is on the landing on the way up to the main floor
Property.RoomDescription2: In the living room there is a very nice leather sofa that is positioned perfectly for watching TV on the very large flatscreen TV. You will also find a wide open area and access to the porch. The large windows give a great panoramic view all the way from Arapahoe Basin towards Lake Dillon and summit cove. In the living room on the landing there is an actual chair from one of the original Aspen ski lifts!
Property.RoomDescription3: In the Kitchen you will first notice the great granite counter top and the stainless steel appliances. Along with that, the cabinets have been designed in such a way that whoever is in the kitchen and of a normal height can easily see out towards the living room and the windows. The sink is also a Granite sink, quite the upgrade from the standard metal sink!
Property.RoomDescription4: The first bedroom is located behind the kitchen, with 2 Twin beds and views of the mountain behind and an elk trail is just up the hill
Property.RoomDescription5: The second bedroom is located on the right of the chairlift chair and has a queen bed and a full bed, as well as a flatscreen TV. This bedroom also looks out onto the elk trail up the mountain
Property.RoomDescription6: In the Master Bedroom you will also find an ensuite bathroom, and a king sized bed, along with another flat screen TV. The master bedroom has access to the porch as well as a view of the Keystone Gulch, Dercum Mountain, and all the way towards Arapahoe Basin
Property.RoomDescription7: On the spacious porch you will find nice patio furniture and a stainless steel grill. Perfect for cookouts both in the winter and the summer!
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Rent this awesome refurnished property on the top floor of the Saints John building. Phenomenal views of the surrounding area and of Keystone Resort itself.

Property.OneLiner: Enjoy this awesome Studio Condo in the Lakeside village of Keystone Resort in Keystone Colorado. Mere Steps from the shuttle route and right on Keystone Lake, this is the Ideally located Condo
Property.RoomDescription1: Light filters in through the large picture windows, giving this property a bright, airy feel! Step on your private deck and take in the sights over Keystone Lake. Sip a warm drink in front of your fireplace and enjoy your mountain vacation!
Property.RoomDescription2: The kitchen is equipped to help you cook up a great meal or whip up a snack before heading out on the slopes.
Property.RoomDescription3: A cozy king sized bed is tucked in the main room. With a queen sized sofa sleeper, this studio will sleep up to 4 comfortably.
Property.RoomDescription4: Common area laundry is available. Enjoy indoor pool access, as well as access to the common area hot tub. A free shuttle will take you to the slopes at River Run Village--just a short ride away.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: This Lakeside Village studio is located right beside Keystone Lake and offers spectacular views right from your very own deck! Cozy up by the fireplace or curl up and watch movies on your flat screen television. The full kitchen has everything you need to cook a great meal after a day of all the nearby on-mountain activities!

Property.OneLiner: Picture yourself in this fully refurbished Cinnamon Ridge #1 Building Condo. Only a short walk from the mountain, relax in the private hot tub at night and watch the skiiers come down the hill!
Property.RoomDescription1: A large entryway with benches and storage cubes makes it easy to keep your outdoor gear out of the way.
Property.RoomDescription2: This gorgeous kitchen features granite counter tops, full stainless steel appliances and separate bar seating. Fully equipped to cook a simple dinner or a Thanksgiving feast!
Property.RoomDescription3: There is seating for 6 at the formal, high top dining table. Need more seating space? There is bar seating close by.
Property.RoomDescription4: Come home and relax on the comfy leather furniture while you warm up next to the wood burning fireplace. Mounted above the hearth is the flat screen TV, perfect for an evening movie or watching the big game!
Property.RoomDescription5: Check out the night skiers while lounging on your private porch with a relaxing drink.
Property.RoomDescription6: Your private hot tub is the highlight of this beautiful condo! 180 degree windows surround you while you unwind in luxury!
Property.RoomDescription7: Features a Queen bed, slope views and private flat screen TV.
Property.RoomDescription8: The 3rd bedroom features 2 twin beds and 2 trundle beds, as well as an attached bathroom complete with stone counter tops. Spoil the kids with their own flat screen TV!
Property.RoomDescription9: This gorgeous bedroom is in a class all its own. Stretch out on the King bed and enjoy the views of Keystone, CO. Complete with attached bathroom and private TV.
Property.PropertyFeaturesOverview: Step into luxury when you enter this gorgeous Cinnamon Ridge I three bedroom condo. Located in the Mountain House Base Area, you will be thoroughly impressed with the ski slope views, quality furnishings, private laundry, hardwood floors, granite counter tops...not to mention the private hot tub! This is the ultimate ski vacation destination!
